title: Superb movie
text: Nice and humorous movie that surprises and amuses while using a formula that has been used before many times. The action moments are really well done and very enjoyable, and every scene is fun and very beautiful in the movie.

title: Cliche train
text: The movie started off with a very unique approach and made me think that this is going to be a pleasant ride. Brit Pitt as a Woody Allen like character was a very nice touch. However, in one third of the movie, all the promises just fell away, and made me realized this is going to be a cliche train traveling through just another typical action movie elements one after another. This movie wasn't really that bad. It was just boring sometimes because again, there's nothing new in this movie. The story and the action, you've seen these in many other movies. The only notable thing from this movie was Aaron Taylor-Johnson's looks and acting. He looked really cool unlike him in Kickass movies. This movie seems to showcase the beginning of action movie career of Aaron Taylor-Johnson.

title: Good job
text: Be prepared for a film joyride that will leave you reeling from excitement, good action sequences , hilarity, and the delight of sincere sentiment. Well done keep it up.

title: Nice
text: The characters of Tangerine (Taylor-Johnson) and Lemon (Brian Tyree Henry) provide balance to the film. Brad plays an older male action movie hitman with elegance and charm. As a result of the movie's rapid speed, some of the detail might have slipped your mind if you weren't paying attention when you were busy laughing at the punch line. The battle scenes were absolutely excellent, especially those involving Brad Pitt.

title: WHAT A RIDE!!!
text:
Just saw Bullet Train and I have to say that this is one of the best movies I've seen this year. I got the feeling I was watching a Quentin Tarantino flick. It has that very stylistic approach to the violence, dialogue, music
and humor. Having said that, the director, David Leitch, gives this movie a fresh style by injecting a lot of humor into the incredible action scenes. I was simultaneously gasping and cracking up. Brad Pitt is at his charming, hilarious best and "Tangerine" and "Lemon" could have their own series. I'm a huge Sandra Bullock fan and wish she had more screen time. I love her and Brad Pitt's chemistry and have always felt that she is the female Brad Pitt and he the male Sandra Bullock. They both have that charismatic yet self deprecating manner.(and self deprecating is hard to pull off when you're that gorgeous) This flick was an exhilarating escapist thrill ride that left me wanting more.

title: Best movie
text: It's a humorous action blockbuster that made me chuckle while simultaneously making me feel the tension in the situations. The bullet train scenes are fascinating and exhilarating. The second half of the film is the greatest since it cranks up the heat and enjoyment.

title: disappointing
text:
We raised the bar a lot when we saw Brad Pitt and Sandra, but unfortunately it is a stereotypical movie that does not contain anything new
1- The chattering brothers' dialogue is repeated several times
2- The scene of needles and the antidote between Brad Pitt and Hornet is incomprehensible, it is not clear
Where is the poison and where is the antidote and how can she inject him with the antidote and how the poison needle fell on his hand and he was not affected
3- The scene of a lemon falling into the river and found by the chiming of a mechanism in the water, it is almost like a scene from an Indian movie of low quality
4- Metaphysical events wholesale: a train in which shooting occurs repeatedly and stops at stations and does not take place any interference by the authorities????? What is this nonsense
5- Breaking unbreakable glass with simple tools and sticking to a train from the outside traveling at a speed of more than 400 km per hour.And other paradoxes and cheap falls
The story itself is style 007, which was repeatedly saturated with cinema, mission, old revenge, wife-killing, etc. Etc. All topics were repeated hundreds of times, nothing new was added, unfortunately, disappointing.

title: Best movie
text: I was sceptical about Joey King having the lead role because I identify her with cliched Netflix adolescent romcoms, but she did wonderfully. There were a lot of celebrity cameos, but my personal fave was Channing Tatum, who felt tit-for-tat after Brad Pitt's appearance in The Lost City.

title: Wonderful movie
text: I have never been a fan of Hollywood movies until my boyfriend took me to see this light film. I am blown away by the visuals and interesting concept of this movie. We need to see more movies like this.

title: Bullet Train Is My Second Pick For Best Films Of The Year So Far, It Is A Hell Of A Fun Train Ride, I Am Super Adoring This Film
text: Like Top Gun: Maverick, i'm watching Bullet Train in the theaters leaving a badass feeling and a smile appreciation to every single people that work on the film because Bullet Train is fire!!!, it is one of the most thrilling, intense, funny, enjoyable and exciting ride of the year, Bullet Train is a perfect definition of a roller coaster ride, a fun 2 hours film fills with stunning cinematography, beautiful color, fascinating set as always everytime a movie take place in Japan, a very intriguing engaging story, and what a incredible performances by these all super talented people, i mean Brad Pitt is Brad Pitt so you know what he's gonna delivered, but the rest is no less amazing than Pitt himself, second best act is Joey King, she delivered some of if not the best double acting in movie i've ever seen, and if you watch the film you know why i think she is having a double acting on the film, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Bryan Tyree Henry as a duo is a perfection, Bad Bunny have a great small memorable role in the film, Hiroyuki Sanada was just badass, and the rest including a pleasantly surprise cameo was just great and entertaining, all of the main key characters in this movie every each one of them is convincing and perfect in itself, the whole fight sequence is also undeniably exciting, great, and entertaining, oouuhh and brutal!, yes, brutal and i love it, overall Bullet Train is now my second pick for best films of the year so far still behind Top Gun: Maverick, it is a hell of a fun train ride, i am super adoring this film.

title: Over dramatized
text: Had the acting been less overdramatized maybe i'd have given it 6 stars, but everyone was acting like they were playing a theatrical play. The plot is a jumble of random chances that don't make sense. A lot of random stuff!I'm guessing it is trying to be some mix of pulp fiction and some other Tarantino movie, but fails miserably . The in between acts are some what entertaining at best. The cinematography is O. K. and the storytelling in itself with a lot of flash backs is not a bad way of telling it. As I said, it is trying to be Tarantino but missing the fines, that is needed in a "want to be verbal instead of taking instant action"-kind of movie.

title: I love Bad Bunny
text: Absolutely loved this movie it had everything thing I wanted, violence and humor mixed in. Bad Bunny a new great Hollywood star. Brad Pitt, was incredible like ever before. Amazing.

title: Outstanding movie
text: Loved the little detective part when they found the briefcase, the part when I saw it...................... Shinkansen is a great great movie................

title: What a story
text: David Leitch is a legendary director for action movies. His work is unbeatable and cannot be matched by any other director in the industry. The element of humor also adds a nice flair!

title: Amazing movie
text: I had a bit of a language problem, but I loved this action-packed comedy movie with an all-star cast................. Why aren't Brad Pitt's movies so great?

title: Amazing movie
text: Story is not so new. Its predictable as well. But the cinematography and action part is stupendous. Full movie is an exciting bullet train journey indeed. Brad Pitt is behaving and he had fun while the shoot for sure.

title: Rollercoaster with story, laughs, snake and Fiji
text: Fun to watch. Things tie up together nicely and no part felt unnecessary. Characters were Quirky, grew on you and were entertaining.Overall a great light watch after a long time.Biggest question is how much Fiji water paid for this movie üòÇ

title: I never give movies a 10
text: I'm so glad I found out this was playing earlier than expected. I went in 4DX and it created something beautiful. It was almost a mix of Tarantino's Pulp Fiction and Deadpool and I surprisingly loved that. Brad Pitt has made a comeback, I cared for characters I thought I wouldn't have, and the action was 10/10. The comedy hit right on the nail at the right time and it was perfect. No review should be bad and if it is they were expecting some 2010-ish action flick lol.

title: Such an unexpected hit
text: Bullet train was such a good time. Just go see it, it's absolutely hilarious and all the action is top notch. There's a few unbelievable moments, but at that point you're fully strapped in. Every actor in this movie kills it and it is excellently written and directed. You won't regret checking it out.

title: If I could give a -1 I would
text: I usually like action films that combine comedy but this one definitely misses the mark. I don't mind a simple story in an action movie that's why I really like John wick but this is not even a little bit close to that.Character development? You would need characters for that. The script seem to be written by a 10 year old. And not a smart 10-year-old. I understand that it's based on a book I hope it's better than this movie otherwise it's garbage.It's a shame to have such great cast when you don't use their talent!Honestly the only reason for this movie to exist is for people to waste their time. Me personally I would prefer to waste it on stupid YouTube videos than this.

title: Nice
text: I laughed while watching this comic action film, yet I could still sense the intensity in the situations. The movie has excellent music combining and a compelling plot with a beautiful story at its core, and the characters have an interesting interaction and are funny and delightful. The scenes on the bullet trains are both fascinating and exciting. The movie's second half is the greatest since it amps up the excitement and passion.

title: Really appreciate
text: David Leitch directed , A fun and enjoyable action comedy. The action set pieces in the movie are entertaining. The tale was good, it had some intriguing twists and turns, and because the majority of it takes place on a bullet train, the writers did a pretty good job of keeping us interested. Characterization for each of the several characters in the film was strong. In particular, Lemon and Tangerine stood out and were largely responsible for the film's increased entertainment value.

title: Very good scene
text: Fantastic film! Loved the action comedy and Brad Bit's return with a bang, David Leitch's direction is fantastic, I am a Deadpool fan and Brad Pit's appearance in Deadpool 2 created the hype around the picture, movie is funny as hell, and some of the action scenes transport us back to nostalgic Deadpool fighting scenes. Hiroyuki Sanada and Andrew Koji have a good sense of humour and mocking.

title: Mind Blowing movie
text: Second half is the best part of the movie as it steps up the heat and fun.............................. Total entertainment......................... I suggest everyone.....

title: Worst movie of this decade so far
text: There have been many bad movies....all for different reasons but Bullet Train might be one of the worst movies of all time for all the reasons.A blatant attempt to rip off a Tarantino style that can only really be done by Quentin. The attempt to be "cool" in every other scene ala walking in slow motion, screen tilted, hair blowing, rock music blasting can really only be done once. Not 12000 times in one movie.Jokes in the middle of fight scenes can work, if done correctly....it was not done correctly. Oh btw the jokes should be funny...they were not.Why was Pitt in this garbage is beyond me. He must be board with his multi millionaire life.

title: amazing
text: The action in this movie picks up right away, and it's a lot of fun to watch. It also features some really funny gags and fantastic characters. Additionally, it is quite colourful and bright, which is really appealing to the eye. Although the story isn't the best I've ever seen, I thoroughly enjoyed the entire movie!

title: Fantastic story
text: The film is a 10 on 10 in all regards - directorship, acting, soundtrack, everything! A masterpiece for the industry and it's going to be remembered for a long long time!

title: best movie since Pulp Fiction 1994
text: Hilarious comedy paired with blood splatter action in a twisted and surprising story.Not everyone's taste - if you liked pulp fiction - you will probably like this one. If not - then maybe not.

title: Nice
text: Brad Pitt and Joey King do fantastic work as actors! Brad Pitt is the film's heart and soul, and the character's expanded sensitivity and emotional bandwidth bring real depth to this action-packed comedy. Surprisingly humorous and eccentric villains match up extremely nicely for this action packed comedy Brad Pitt shows through as unfortunate assassin.

title: Very bad
text: Very bad. Trying to emulate a certain director's style, pacing and dialogue but failing so miserably. Even the choice of music was bad. Brad's Pitt is always going to be Brad Pitt no matter what movie he is in. Would've been fine if he was still a looker but that's all gone. That irritating "lead" actress's attempt at an English accent deserves a -47/100. I'm not Japanese but I felt like they were also disrespectful of Japanese culture and people. Heck it was even disrespectful of Japanese toilets. The other actors deserved a lot better than this material. Yes, even Aaron Taylor-Johnson. I didn't mind Channing Tatum too much but that this better be the last time he tries this schtick. Overall a waste of time.

title: The poster sold me the movie!
text: When I watched the poster on a movie theater, I knew that I wanted to watch this film. Wonderful poster. And now that I was able to watch the movie, I can tell that I loved it. The film is like "The Suicide Squad" meets "Kill Bill" with some of "The Fast and the Furious" franchise. Awesome cast performing perfectly their roles with a superb direction and a smart script. I have to admit that some scenes are absurd but still in a fun way letting to keep enjoying the movie. Definitely one of the best films of 2022 in my humble opinion along with "The Batman", "Prey" and "Top Gun: Maverick". Highly recommended.

title: Beautiful story
text: The movie had me hooked from the very beginning till the very end. Just what I wanted - Absolute masterpiece! A must watch for anyone who likes action movies!

title: What a ride!
text: What a ride, great humour super action scenes and brilliant acting. So we'll cast throughout and excellent storytelling. If it was Tarantino had his name to this you wouldn't be surprised.

title: Wonderful
text: This film has everything an action and thriller film fan could want. It blends a wonderful story with an excellent cast led by an excellent director. Brad Pitt's acting was excellent. One of the film's more engaging storylines Laughable occurrences Several successful confrontations with the other Assassins at various points in time. Outstanding casting and writing.

title: Can Someone Please Tell Me What This Movie Was About?
text: Bullet Train was one of those movies full of pyrotechnics, flashes of explosions and shootings, all at brake neck speed. It is no understatement that the movie is short on character development. But the characters, such as they were, fought over a bundle of cash. Other than that, I could not really see any plot. This is a movie geared for people raised on video games-the movie IS a video game, with every conceivable plot twist thrown in the mix. If this is what you are looking for, you have found the movie for you. If not, when the movie finishes you are going to rub your eyes and wonder how you spent the last two hours.

title: Heart touching
text: The movie has all the right ingredients in appropriate proportions - A great cast, the perfect director, the right level of action and comedy. Perfection!

title: Like this
text: This film is similar to Knives Out and John Wick combined with a dash of humour. Ladybug, played by Prad Pitt, is the offspring of John Wick and Beatrix Kiddo. With its interesting plot and comedic violence, the direction is something akin to a Tarantino movie. What else can I say about the film other than the fact that it is fantastic without giving anything away.

title: Nice
text: For everyone who enjoys action and thriller films, this film has everything you could want. It's a perfect blend of a wonderful tale, a perfectly cast, and the ideal director! Definitely on pace with the novel's story, and the performers performed an excellent job!

title: What a story
text: The movie is really thrilling. It's made on the lines of the Deadpool series but it definitely has more charm because it stars Brad Pitt of course. He has a certain kind of charm.

title: Juvenile
text:
This movie wants to be a blend of Kill Bill, Snatch, Deadpool and probably some others. The problem is that is all feels very forced, contrived. The "cool" dialogue, the nonchalant acting of stereotypes (hey, we even have a Bri-ish duo with a 'funny' fixation on Thomas the Tank Engine). The over stylized violence....
It can only work if if it's countered by something real. When things and people are at stake that we can relate to, care about.It's actually quite boring to watch. It's also just not funny or smart, if that is what the movie tries to be. If no character takes him- or herself seriously, if everything feels like carton, if there are no true emotions and relatable backstories... Then why should I care?I don't understand the positive reviews here.

title: Awesome story
text: The film is spectacular through and through. Every second of the movie is going to keep you at the end of your seat and the humor element is just a bonus.

title: Intresting
text: I am a sucker for ragged looks and what better than to see Brad Pitt adorning that beard. His acting was also truly commendable, looked so dope in his role!

title: Nice
text: This film offers everything an enthusiast of action and thriller films could want. It combines a fantastic tale with an ideal cast led by an ideal director. Acting by Brad Pitt was One of the film's more enjoyable narrative arcs Laughable incidents Several successful encounters with the other Assassins during various moments. Excellent casting and flawless writing.

title: Amazing
text: The characters have an engaging relationship, are witty and enjoyable, and the movie has wonderful music blending and a moving tale with a beautiful story at its core. Many of the supporting cast members were as well. One of the funniest assassination on a mission movies ever made Pitt's performance was faultless, and the screenplay and directing were both great.

title: Don't Go
text: Terrible movie, senseless gore and extensive, very foul language. Very disappointing that Sandra Bullock and Brad Pitt would lower themselves to be in a movie that is so base.We considered walking out after about 10 minutes but hung in, hoping the language would lighten up after the shock factor. It did not. There probably was not a single sentence that was free of a cuss word.Save your money from being wasted and your mind from being filled with garbage. What has happened to standards of common decency?This is a very sad commentary on what much of movie and television "entertainment" has become and what society has accepted as enjoyable. It is no wonder that we no longer live in a gracious and kind world.

title: Full of surprises and endless laughs
text: Went to watch this movie without knowing much of background. Was just hoping it will be good enough. Got really surprised *not giving any spoilers*, unexpected characters and full of laughs filled with style and amazing cinematography.

title: Bravo!
text: Absolutely well done! Great movie! A lot of humor and action. I was enjoying every minute of it. Very engaging and I can't say enough compliments to everyone who made the movie. Hopefully there's sequel!

title: Emotional
text: Brad Pitt is such a versatile actor and so fearless at it. He just immerses himself in the character he plays and that's not something that can be said about everyone in the industry.

title: There is no bad film with Brad Pitt in it
text: Bullet Train is what happens when you put Deadpool 1&2 in a jar, add John wick to it before garnishing it with Thor: Ragnarok and Hangover trilogy -- Served by the OG Brad Pitt himself.The film is steeped in non linear narration with characters juxtaposing central theme." An absolute dark humorous ride that goes 500mph and refuses to stay unfunny. Mad, Dark, Irreverent, Stylish, and Iconic at same time."David Leitch witty dark humor stays intact by not getting carried away with its intercutting screenplay and belly-aching humor. The maker deploys every troop of an action-comedy with a formidable star presence of Brad Pitt.It's smart, hilarious, funky, sleek and gripping.If you are a Brad Pitt fan, God! You are going to witness one hell of a Pitt-phenomenon.Must must must watch.

title: Sooo Great!
text: I walked in the movie with no expectations only seen the trailer and what can I say.... I was blown away. Where should I start....The actors were soo good and their Characters are written soo good too. I have to say I loved nearly every Character especially Lemon and Tangerine. They're just so funny and I loved every scene where one character met another character, they were just great.The Story is amazing, the jokes were great, the cinematography was on point and the Soundtrack was over the top good. I love it when Directors make use of great songs and David Leitch absolutely hit the nail on the Head with this Soundtrack.One of the best movies I have ever watched. If you want to blown away too, go watch this movie!

title: Entertaining movie
text: Towards the second half, it did get a little slow but overall....................., definitely worth watching!................I am totally satisfied with this.................

title: Mind blowing
text: The movie's trailers was one of the best I've seen till date honestly so I was skeptical about the movie doing justice but the movie is just as great.

title: Stupid Dumb Violence
text: No enough plot, and too much graphic violence. Ugh. The dialogue was not well written and the gratuitous violence was unnecessary. Give me well written dialogue and plot and leave out the gross shock and awe. So many movies these days are full of violence and sick story plots. I like action movies but it gets to be too much. Most of humanity is better than this, but there is so much depravity one would never know. The locations were lovely, if that was all I saw it would have been more interesting. I get it that actors need to work, but can't scripts be much better written. It seems like so many movies are just trying to portray the worst of humanity, and not enough focusing on the best and interesting.

title: David Leitch's Best Film Yet.
text: Bullet Train is a non-stop, entertaining thrill ride with phenomenal action, great character work and an engaging story. Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry steal the show. The banter between the two is incredible. This is one is definitely in my Top 3 favorite films of the year so far.

title: Fantastic movie
text: It's a funny action blockbuster that made me laugh out loud while also feeling the tenseness of scenes. Scenes in bullet train is gripping and exciting.

title: Interesting movie
text: I had been waiting for so long for the movie to come out since it was in talks for quite some time. The movie makes up for all the excitement though!!

title: 1 star only because Zero is not available.
text: What a hot mess of nonsensical rubbish. Congrats to Bullet train on being just the second film in my life that I've walked out of. It is now officially the worst movie I've ever seen.

title: Awesome movie
text: Bullet train is a real seat filler. I had super expectation as it is from the same director of Dead Pool. Super good story line and action sequences. Good to see Brad Pitt in his full glory.

title: Loved it from start to finish
text: There's more than a bit of Guy Ritchie meets Quentin Tarantino meets Die Hard in this movie. Zany characters, rapid-fire scene changes, goofy conversations, and a lead protagonist who is very good at what he does, but can't believe that he's been surrounded by this many crazed killers.It was amazing how it all comes together. Every so often, something like "35 minutes ago" appears on the screen, and a flashback shows how the thing you just saw came together. The near absence of loose ends in such a grand, comic action film is extraordinary, and leaves you awestruck that someone had such a grand vision to bring it all together.Henry and Taylor-Johnson are spectacular; they are reminiscent of Kidd and Wint in Diamonds are Forever, if Tarantino had written their lines. You were just waiting for them to talk about "Royales with cheese." Ditto for Joey King who does wonders with a multi-layered role.Finally, I loved Brad Pitt; he's a bit of a Southern Californian John McClane (who happens to be an assassin).We saw Bullet Train in a theater with (I think) 4 others. Only our second movie in a theater in the past couple of years. Seeing it on a big screen may have added to me giving the movie a 10.But I really did have a great time!

title: FUNNY, Action and Not boring
text: The movie was very entertaining funny and was never boring. That it is about revenge and takes place in Japan top, with the Samurai Skills also still in addition. The film reminds me how Quentin Terentino has written in. Only to recommend.

title: So good movie
text: I adore this genre of film. Both of the newcomers gave outstanding performances. The director was excellent. Action scenes and stunts are flawless. Brad Pitt, though, did a fantastic job. Renowned action movie.

title: Perhaps if I were 14 again...
text: Sophomoric humor, gratuitous violence, blood, gore, assassins, a bullet train... What could go wrong?Quite a bit actually.Granted, I was raised on Agatha Christie and have settled into a grudging admiration for unique and powerful films like 'Fight Club' and 'Pulp Fiction,' but this movie can't compare with these. It is chaotic, brassy, self-aware, tired (in truth) and I suppose post-modern. (Post-modern is a term I hardly understand. It seems like an excuse to me for things that are obscure and so wry in their humor and intent that the uninitiated are left at the proverbial station.)Perhaps that is what I can recommend to the serious viewer over the age of maturity. Don't board this train. Instead, take a walk among cherry blossoms and head for more mature entertainments.

title: For a 2022 movie, it was very good
text: My bf and I have been disappointed with so many newer movies. This one sounded good, and Brad Pitt so obviously we had to check it out. It kind of reminded us of a Tarantino movie but better. It was weird, odd, but funny and had good and not try hard comedy. I don't think it was too scripted like most movies. The action part was really fun and entertaining. Good fight scenes and interesting circumstances that just seemed to work out but not in a super obvious way. I loved the addition of different ethnicities. There were some pretty heartwarming parts and clever, witty lines. I would watch again. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

title: Hilarious and captivating
text: Loved everything about this movie! Equal parts humorous and action packed! Amazing cast! Everyone has great chemistry. Perfect timing. I'm honestly going to see it again tomorrow. Thank you regal unlimited.

title: A FREAKING MASTERPICE !
text: This film literally elevates action it is a Non-Stop ride on this train so many well choreographed fight scenes such funny characters and interesting dialogue and Back stories that really connect you to these characters and that's another thing not a single one of these characters feels like they don't belong in this epic Thrill Ride. Another thing is the story really brings the heart there were some moments in this movie where I genuinely cried. Finally again to go on the action it was stupendous and great but that soundtrack mixing with it always made me jump out of my seat especially towards the end.

title: Must watch
text: Fantastic movie I was very engrossed the entire time, and Brad Pitt did an excellent job. The narrative felt brand-new and untold, therefore I wasn't disappointed. I'll probably watch it again. The way it addresses the events and Brad Pitt's appealing lead performance make movie worthwhile to watch. It moves quickly, has an entertaining and intriguing story, and is self-conscious throughout.

title: A traincrash of a movie.
text: You may be disappointed if you want to watch this film because you've liked many of Brad Pitt's past films and love a good action movie.The story is nonsensical, and not in that it's an OTT action movie; there are plenty of great action films with silly plots. It's nonsensical because I hardly knew what was happening; I'm still unsure.The film has a few well-choreographed fight scenes and occasionally mildly amusing one-liners, but I wouldn't bother trying to connect the dots or fathom who is who and what is going on. The characters are unendearing, the script is pretty lame, and the usual CGI explosions are as predictable as they are boring.I'm surprised Brad Pitt took on this role; it's the worst film I've seen him in, and I've seen most of his films. I couldn't wait for Bullet Train to end and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

title: Funny movie
text: I thoroughly enjoyed this film in the end and would watch it again, but I would watch this with my other room mates too , its too hilarious and I really liked the star cast and direction is unto the best level of the standards. A movie to be remembered forever.

title: Fun & Funny movie
text: This was a ton of fun! I enjoyed every minute of this movie. It was fast paced but easy to keep up with. I really enjoyed all the characters especially Tangerine & Lemon! I would watch a spin-off movie staring those two guys. You shouldn't take this movie seriously, it's just supposed to be fun.

title: Best movie
text: I had been anticipating the release of the film for quite some time, as it had been in the works for quite some time. But the movie makes up for all of the excitement!! Brad Pitt delivered another hilarious performance in "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood." Ladybug is one of Brad Pitt's most memorable roles. Action, Laughter, and Entertainment.

title: Great movie
text: In any case, the acting was excellent throughout, and Brad Pitt didn't have to do all the hard lifting. Many famous people made cameo appearances; Channing Tatum stood out for me since he felt tit-for-tat after Brad's appearance in The Lost City. Kimiko from the lads finally speaking was something else that made me happy.

title: There should be warning "For audience up to 14 years old"
text: I insisted for about 25 minutes (yes, I'm patient), but then I just couldn't watch it anymore.I didn't check any reviews before watching this movie. I just though, Brad Pitt had few decent movies in past, so it shouldn't be a total waste of my time -I was wrong, obviously.And then I check imdb and see rating of 7.5 stars. I assume these ratings come from teenagers, who don't care about how pointless the story is and how moronic dialogs there are... as long there are "cool" guys and gals -welcome in Tarantino's world.Just to fill up the last 50 required characters: I think, movie industry was never at such low level as it is now.Thanks for reading.. but then, nobody cares, though.

title: Please support this movie
text: The best action movie in years.Every fight is executed perfectly.ATJ steals the show.That's all you need to know, highly enjoyable and something different than the usual safe blockbuster.

title: Beautifully written characters with amazing fight scenes, gore, acting and comedy!
text: Just watched this film at the cinema, absolutely loved it! It merges fight scenes and gore with comedy whilst not being overly stupid. Brad Pitt delivers a fantastic character which he executes perfectly, merged with the other brilliantly written characters, this film is easily one of the best of 2022 as of yet. Definitely worth a watch, go to the cinemas to watch this whilst you can!

title: Funny Action Movie
text: I was pleasantly surprised by how entertaining movie was. From the description I was skeptical, as it didn't seem like a movie that would typically be my speed. It's a funny movie with a fair share of action, that doesn't take itself too seriously. The characters are unique and the story pieces all falling into place near the end leaves for a satisfying conclusion. There were even some surprisingly emotional moments that tug at the heartstrings. The actors all did a good job in playing their respective roles. Overall, a good movie to watch in the evening for a laugh. There is some language and mild gore/violence, but nothing too bad or over-the-top.

title: Great!
text: Its great! Well written, tons of action very funny and witty, and great casting. Well done indeed! Brad Pitt played this role to perfection. I'm so happy he decided to do this film.

title: No Continuity, Terrible Writing
text: This was one of the worst movies I've ever watched. Excessive use of montages & flashbacks instead of character development. The writing made me think of what used to be considered B movies, but they had A list actors, some of which only had cameos & no lines. I have no problem suspending belief for fantasy films, but when everyone is getting stabbed or shot & continuing to fight on, or needing to be hit in the face more than once with a fire extinguisher, or holding onto a bullet train from the outside, or punching through the glass of a bullet train windshield, or we're shooting guns all over a train in Japan which suddenly becomes vacant of workers & passengers, it's more of a crap adventure film than a fantasy B movie.I'd prefer my 2 hours back than the few chuckles it provided. I never write reviews, but this was so bad, & was trending #1 on Netflix (because it was a straight to Netflix production) that I had to attempt to warn others. For a film supposedly being shot in Japan, very few of the leads were even Japanese. Sometimes there would be subtitles, other times they would just say "announcement in Japanese" or "speaking in Japanese."Not enough high spots to make up for the consistently terrible writing. Oh, we're in the quiet car? Well either you make it a running joke or you have no continuity of the old white lady shushing them! Did we really need a video montage of the life of the water bottle? I'm just surprised they didn't take us through its previous life when it had to be recycled to get to this point.I've taken dumps with better consistency. If this film wasn't consistently bad, it would have no consistency to speak of.

title: Bloody hilarious
text: I wasnt sure I'd like this movie when I read the bio but thought I'd give it a go. Oh boy am I glad I did, dry humour script with precision timing from brilliant actors was to die for. This story of deadly assassins on a bullet train is unbelievably stupendous action packed surprises galore. I have never laughed out loud where tears rolled down my face watching a movie maybe 'A Weekend at Bernie's" a long time ago. There was no way at any point where you would have time to leave for a quick pee an not miss a vital part of this enthralling fast pace journey. I would definitely catch this superb movie at the flicks again.

title: Amazing Cool and funny
text: Superb work done by Brad Pitt and all the other cast,A must watch this year. Movie looks really cool and its comedy is very nice. You will never get bored for a single second while watching. The climax and the plot is outstanding. The action in this flim is outstandingit looks really good.

title: Best Summer Movie Yet
text: Exhilarating, laugh out loud funny, paced to cause exhaustion and more fun in a theater in ages. Yes, leave your mind at the door and just enjoy the ride at BulletTrain speeds. Highly recommended for a summer movie.

title: Boy farm working OT
text: This was was worst Pitt film ever. 7.5 rating? Gtfo.Terrible script not fun to watch zero character development and the action scenes are stupid.Whoever paid to see this film I'd ask for refund.Pitt getting desperate for a paycheck a la Bruce Willis, I suppose.I'm a ATJ fan and his character was boring.Hollyweird is either puking up remakes, comic films or terrible scripts like this.Direct to a Walmart dvd bin near you!

title: Kill Bill wannabe, fail.
text: Kind of interesting for the first half, even though already over the top. It tries to be a 90's movie, a Tarantino movie. Kind of a Kill Bill for the 2020's. The thing is, Tarantino can make movies that are really over the top, but serious all a the same time. He can make us feel for the characters, add drama, even if it's all surrounded by surreal unbelievable events or even kinda silly dialogue.But that's Tarantino's gift, and he's basically the only one who can do it well, even to this day (we're way past the 90's). These guys are trying to do that, but they don't have the skills, or confidence, so they do a lot of bad jokes, lots of CGI, and turn a story that started out as interesting into a big dumb mess. Two thirds in, it starts hitting you: this is gonna get really really stupid isn't it? And boy does it, and quickly. For the last 20 minutes or so, you just want it to end...It's too bad really, cause at it's core the story idea was at least original. And all these actors, all those cameos: wasted. This thing isn't any better than say "Red Notice". "Hey let's not take ourselves seriously, that way they can't dump on us". Seems to be the usual attitude nowadays.

title: Finally a great movie that has focused on FUN!
text: Lately, most of the movies were focused on lecturing the society and had to pass all the checkmarks of every culture. I was very disappointed after watching Thor: Love and Thunder (The movie I watched before this one). There are many fun twists along the movie which are amazingly directed. The fight scenes are not cartoonish and has a feel to it. All the characters and scenes are in sync. The direction is superb. The casting excellently done. This movie checkmarks all the aspects of FUN. Loved it.Also, the story takes place in Japan which gives a color to the movie. Watch it and I assure you that you'll enjoy it to the fullest.

title: Friday Night, Premium XD, Rear Left, Spot!
text: August 5th, 2022: Friday Night, Premium XD, Rear Left, Spot! Woo Wee! 9:00 PM, Central, at the Cinemark, former home of Front Row Joe. Somebody burned some popcorn so I had to tell the young cutie slinging snacks a Mitch Hedberg joke about Hot Tubs. Why? Seemed appropriate. The joke? Oh! Sorry! It goes like this: "Hey, have you ever walked up to somebody in a hot tub and asked if you can join them?" "When they said yes, did you start chopping up carrots and celery and tossing it in the hot tub and ask them how they were stewing," Or some variation? Pretty funny. Anywho, the film...Bullet Train (2022) was a stone cold gas of a summer flick! Lots of action, never a boring minute to witness. The XD theatre was huge with lots of recliner seats; all faux leather bound and comfy. The screen was gigantic, and the sound system? Better than any I've ever witnessed! The Icee was cherry & Coke, and the Reese's Pieces were crunchy and fresh. I was fortunate enough to lease the far left, rear spot, which is my favorite. So, all of the precursors were there for a perfect film to be seen. I had so much fun with Ladybug's self absorbed karmic evaluations and the random happenings within the plot that I probably over enjoyed the summer flick that deserves a watch on the big screen and not to be overthought. I also was really happy to see Channing Tatum in his brief comic relief. If I tell you anything about the actual movie, it would keep you from going to the theatre to see it for yourself, so I do not want to be that guy. The ticket for my premium opening night spot was $17. 59 plus it was about $10 for the Icee (Slur-Pee) and Pieces. So, was Bullet Train worth almost $30 USD--Americano or not? My answer is, YES! It was like a cross between Spy Hunter the 1983 Atari 2600 video game, with happy James Bond's and Mahayana Buddhism seeking John Wick's, that somehow look like Brad Pitt. So, I guess you could say Brad Pitt was the S--t, in this Japanese train ride. Real Fun! 10/10 P. S. If you run across a poisonous snake, anybody that looks like the owner of Mint Mobile/Deadpool, or a water bottle...ever...in the rest of your life.... Just walk away.

title: Loads of Action and Fun!
text: It was perfect timing that I was able to catch Bullet Train on a matinee after a shopping trip. I had no idea what the movie was about, except that it starred Brad Pitt. It actually delighted me and filled me with joy.The acting is wonderful, I enjoyed the dialog, and laughed at the jokes and gasped out loud at some of the violence. There is something for everyone.I always stay for the credits and you should too. Some surprises thrown in. However, reading some of the user reviews, I actually missed some of the cameos.I definitely plan to see it again.

title: Don't listen to the critics - Amazing movie! Spoiler free

And I really effing enjoyed this movie.The action is really fun and intriguing, you feel on the edge of your seat on every scene. Brad Pitt really spices up the action too, being comedic and badass at the same time. Brad Pitt and Sandra Bullock's acting really stands out here, not to say the others are not great also. But my only complaint is that Joey King (kissing booth) acting is awful in this movie, every scene I cringed at her wacky, cliche, dialogue and acting. But the rest of the movie really outshined this awful actor.Overall, I really recommend it, but remember to bring earplugs, it's a loud, fast ride.

title: Utter nonsense made for the ADHD afflicted current generation
text: Basically, it's a Bullet Train full of assassins that are trying to kill each other to get a briefcase to the bad guy at the end of the movie. And in between there's lots of forced comedy, mayhem, lots of blood spraying everywhere, lots of gunshots, lots of people getting their heads chopped off, lots of John Wick style choreographed fights, there's lots of vomit shooting out of every hole. There's an abundance of profanity and gore for cheap shock value to compensate for the weak script.Within the first 10 minutes, I was already tired of the trifling snarky banter between characters attempting their best shot at comedy. Blatant Tarantino ripoff. Brad Pitt's performance is lazy, uninspired and bored. The movie itself has zero character development, zero suspense, zero class and artistic expression. A nonsensical, convoluted plot offering no reason to continue watching beyond 30 minutes. If you're the kind who enjoys Deadpool style juvenile humor, then you might enjoy it.This is a movie with not one original bone in its body. Everything you see in this movie has been done a million times better. The comedy is SHOVED down your throat over and over again. Everything is just forced, there's no natural progression or rhythm.

title: NPC Train
text: Written and Directed by some people who watched Kill Bill, Snatch, and Burn After Reading comes last year's action movie of the week - Bullet Tooth Tony Train.When quirky Brad Pitt boards a quirky Japanese train looking for Marcellus Wallace's briefcase, he unwittingly fights quirky bad guy after quirky bad guy as scores of NPC's sit idly by, too busy in their loop-lives to react to any of the nut-kicks, head-slams, gunshots, dead bodies, or over-the-top ultra-choreographed fight scenes happening right next to them - all of it leading up to a pulse-stopping climax that nobody under the age of three will ever see coming!

title: Fun ride
text: "Bullet Train" delivers an exhilarating ride from start to finish. The pulse-pounding action sequences, coupled with a cleverly woven plot, keep you on the edge of your seat. The ensemble cast, led by charismatic performances from A-list stars, adds depth to the characters. The film's sleek cinematography and seamless editing enhance the overall viewing experience. "Bullet Train" is a thrilling joyride that seamlessly blends suspense, humor, and heart, making it a must-watch for fans of high-octane cinema. Fast-paced and full of surprises, it's a standout addition to the action genre. A must watch for action junkies !!

title: Surprisingly phenomenal
text: I wasn't expecting much going in, and I was blown away. Maybe it's my low expectations but this was absolutely phenomenal! Honestly a top 3 film I saw so far this year and maybe a new favorite of mine! I can't really find anything wrong, I'm not kidding. The Carver cameo, the holding out for a hero, all the little details are so good! It's ironic that this movie doesn't take its plot seriously, and a lot of people say it's not good. But because this movie knows what it is and embraces it the plot is amazing. It's a dumb plot but since the movie knows that it doesn't feel like a problem, especially compared to other movies of similar style. Several other movies have generic, even dumb plots that it feels the audience needs to take seriously, and maybe it still works but not as well. This movie has a dumb plot and knows it, saving more time for the good stuff, and ironically making its plot feel much better than some similar movies. It also handles character death so well, like this movie has STAKES. The jokes were all really solid, the action was surprisingly phenomenal, I wasn't expecting much with the characters but I was very pleasantly surprised when so many were so good and so many fantastic moments. The plot was a little confusing for most of it but everything was revealed in one scene, and it didn't feel wrong because of how intentionally dumb this movie is. I don't mind scenes like that anyway, at least when done right. Minority Report and the Knives Out movies do a great job of having a character explain the villains plot to the villain in a really petty yet epic way. This movie has the villain explain their plot, but it gives us answers and again, this movie knows it's dumb so I don't mind. Overall I really don't have any reason not to give this a 10/10, everything was done so well. Definitely really underrated and worth your time, if nothing else it is PERFECT airplane movie (but it's still perfect anyway)

title: Better than average
text: You know people complain the production quality of Hollywood popcorn movies have been decreased a lot from covid-19 broke out because most of them are too political, but Bullet Train is like fresh air coming to the room, it's funny, well scripted and staged. But the Japanese element in the movie is still stereotypical as usual, even the movie is not shot in Japan, as a Asian, I would say the movie will be much better if it can delete all the Japanese stuff which would make it more consistent. Inappropriate usage of Japanese element in the movie only shows the orientalism is still deeply rooted in the western world.

title: One of my new favorite movies!
text: This is certainly one of the best movies I have watched in a really long time. I love the casting, I think everyone was perfect for their role. I do hear a lot of complaints about the usage of the f-word with the characters Lemon and Tangerine. I honestly think that it just adds to their character and it's an important part of their personality, and I think it was extremely funny. The dialogue was interesting, hilarious and engaging. The characters were beautifully written as was the story. The story is so intricate and complicated but simple enough for anyone to understand, and all of the character's fates are woven together, and it's brilliant. Overall, Bullet Train is a funny, laugh-out-loud movie that is also extremely suspenseful and action-packed, and you will fall in love with these amazing characters!

title: What were you expecting?
text: It's clearly a tribute to Tarantino and Guy Ritchie, but stands up in its own right as a great bit of entertainment. Brilliant casting, good acting and direction which entirely suits the film.There is comedy in Pulp Fiction and Lock Stock; surely no one took those films entirely seriously. While this is not a comedy film, it is definitely played more for laughs and it's more of a homage than an attempt to better them, If you don't like those films then probably give this a miss. The filmmakers knew exactly what they were doing and it's perfectly pitched to the audience they knew would appreciate it.I think the bad reviewers have completely missed the point. I'm already looking forward to the sequel! üòÅ

title: Non Stop Fun
text: A superb and raunchy fast paced action thriller all jam packed into a bullet train in a semi-fictional Japanese railway system setting. Brad Pitt scores (and kills) his role in here as a goofball-of-an-assasin. While funny at the behest of its rigid humour at certain sequences, it lacks a few methodical (and logical physics) approaches but nonetheless it's a film with a combustion of gunpowder, blades and poisonous venom, and quite frankly that's all you action loving movie-goers need to know. I wholly recommend this movie if you guys love a film that gathers its inspirations from Tarantino-esque flicks and Edgar Wright-styled filmographic work. It's a truly an enjoyable experience to see this fascinating, hilarious and altogether bloody film. This one is truly a thrill til' the credits roll.

title: One of the funniest movies I've watched ever
text:
This movie is very entertaining, from the moment one of the main characters appear on scene until the very end.The cast is spectacular, the plot is amusing and the film aesthetics makes you to not get up from your seat.The plot is about a thief or thug who is asked to perform an action inside a bullet train. What he doesn't know is that there are another thiefs and hired killers that would perform actions in that train too.It is very funny how they interact between each other, and there are hillarious moments.I recomend watching it, with the family, friends,...

title: A Bullet To Kill Normalcy, This Is A Train To Wild Fun
text:
LIKES:The Pacing (Mostly): It takes about a half an hour for the movie to find its stride, but once it does the pace is surprisingly spread well to remain entertaining. The speed like the train is fast, and yet, there is still enough time to explain and put together all the moving pieces that are in this complex Thriller puzzle. By the end you'll be caught in the ride, though you might also be ready for the movie to be over too depending on how much of the other antics you are enjoying. Nonetheless, a nice job on a very tight and time consuming pace.The Music Use: Loved the music in this film. Like Deadpool, the director and his team drum up some great talent to pull covers, mixes, and original tracks to the movie. They selected the songs very well, the emotions making half of these odd relationships sparkle and pop as they pulled more surprises into the mix. And in terms of being humorous, again Leitch really makes the right choices for fun and friends. Nice work there guys.The Acting: Like the premise of Deadpool, the cast of this speeding train are a hoot to watch. Almost everyone is a fun caricature and ridiculous character to latch onto in this coliseum of chaos. Each person has their own edge, comedy style, and gimmick that work well together to entertain the masses. Taylor-Johnson is not one of my favorite characters, but his rude, crude, and brash style is like the dark comedy character that many love. He's sarcastic and a bit of a jerk, but he works very well with the other characters that it balances out and has an offset to keep it entertaining. Joey King was super impressive, another example of an actress that can play a lot of roles with her range and do it so well. Her character requires a lot of acting, and there is even a set of jokes about how good her acting was. She impressed me so much, and though not my favorite role she has played, it was phenomenal to see how she could pull so many emotions and styles into one role. As for Pitt, the dude is funny. If you've seen the Lost City movie, it's this role, but essentially smarter and more competent and it works well. His interactions with everyone are dynamic and fun, he delivers his roles with little trouble, and he somehow maximizes every scene he is in with his style of range. I really enjoyed him in this role and what the writing team did with this character to make the central focal point engage me so well.The Effects: Mind blowing? No, but the movie looks good and has the unique flare and style the trailers promised. Like a Japanese comic book exploding into the real life, this is a movie that handles source material well and does not feel like a stretch of a beloved series. Flash lights, trippy car moments, horrifying build ups of each characters, and the flare of the country are all brilliantly displayed on the big screen. Once the more effects loaded moments happen, that's when the effects get a little more "realistic", but they are smooth and worthy of a video game matching theme. Much like Deadpool, the visualization really works with this movie. Even the sound editing is a champion in this, lighting up the theater with the zany, goofy, overbearing sounds that a Japanese centered tale blows up. Quite awesome indeed.The Action At The End: When the ending sequence finally starts, the action the trailer promised really kicks in and the theme of the movie takes a different turn. Bullet Train's final fight is funny, intense, and has a lot of stakes and consequences with it. Bad guys and sort of bad guys all fight their own battle, and it leads to mirroring the ludicrous combat that one finds in a video game motion. This was a fantastic cherry on top, and was the climactic finale that was fun to wrap things up in, if a little too late to occur at the end.The Comedy: This is a movie that has a lot, and I mean a lot, of dark comedy styles coming together. It's a bit dryer than your typical stoner comedy movie, relying on banter, insults, and babbling about the most random things to get you to laugh at first. Soon, the movie gets into the more slapstick, clumsy fights where the dialogue and reactions are so dumb, but yet are cleverly used to narrate the fight. And then, it goes into the aftermath and banter with the person, alongside some movie reference jokes that help add a little more polish to the weird, shadowy humor. If you can handle this awkward and dangerous style of comedy, then this is the movie for you to enjoy and feast your eyes on.The Overall Tie In Of Tales: My favorite component of this film. Bullet Train's biggest advantage for me was the story and character use in this film. There are a lot of characters in this movie, and every person has this odd integration into the film to make this complicated thriller story work. Why all these people were on the train gradually comes out and the histories of the characters with them as the big picture is revealed with each act. The twists that came in are subtle at times and when you revisit the scene, you get to see the connections you might have missed. And then all the layers neatly stack up and organize to eventually give you a more dynamic way of telling the story. However, the tie in to the tales was very well panned and the impressive part of the thriller, which a lot of the movie built off of.DISLIKES:Some Characters Kind Of Not Needed: I won't lie, several of the characters, are a bit of a stretch for their inclusion. They serve little purpose and are a bit of the hasty work sewn in for another character and potential fight. Sure, comedy wise, it worked, but there were two characters whose purpose were a bit shoe horned in.Effects Get A Bit Cheesy: The movie eventually goes to the level where the effects get a little fake. I can't' say much without ruining the plot, but there are times the limit of technology still has not been breached and the realm of CGI still looks fake. Did I hate it? No, but given the style of the movie during other parts, I would have liked to avoid the ending's theatrics and keep to the flare instead of the messy CGI..Back And Forth A Little Tedious: The plot was complex, and the twists were welcome as it added originality and style to the mix of the movie. Sometimes though, the back and forth gets a little excessive at times and did not quite feel like the right place to put it in the movie. Most of these had to do with the characters mentioned earlier that were not needed. Continuing to revisit these scenes over and over eventually added more bulk to the mix and for me, sort of dragged out the movie when the other parts were more pertinent. This back and forth did work, but like many movies took a little too much liberty and overdid it for me, which in itself was a dislike for me.The Action Not What Trailers Suggested: The biggest disappointment for me, was the action of the movie. Most of the fight scenes are more comedic than actually intense. Several of the fights have most of the choreography in the trailers, leading to unfortunately not the best use of time. I'd have liked a little more of the anime style action and investment in the other character fights that I had expected from my synopsis of the film going in. As an action movie, much of the film is meh for me, but the ending helps lift a lot of the load and I had wished that had been the story that worked out. Again, I'm an action junkie so that has everything with the high standard, but adding that flare at the end would have been a nice consistency to have throughout the movie.The VERDICT:
Bullet Train is a dark comedy with thrilling elements that work so well with the style of Leitch's madness that we fell in love with during the Deadpool phase. It's campy, it's fun, and it's sinister, all working together to be this off the wall and in your face comedy that many will enjoy. It is a bit in your face, a little dry, and cheesy to a major extent, but in the world of anime feeling fun and style, it works so well. However, the movie is a bit cheesy in many levels, character balance is not perfectly balanced, and the action could have used a little bit of touching up to be more combat and less laughs. And those who don't like blood, gore, cursing, and ridiculous antics, then this movie is not for you and you need to avoid this movie at all costs. Yet, if you are looking for a little spice in the Hollywood venue and you can enjoy a very chaotic comedy with lots of style, then this movie has plenty of things to view in the theater. My scores for all this are:Comedy/Action/Thriller: 7.5
Movie Overall: 7.

title: HS2 it isnt
text: Just arrived on Netflix so decided to dedicate just over 2 hours to watch this. The premises of the film is several assassins on a train and no one is sure of the reasons as to why they have been bought together.The assassins are varied in every sense of the word.. which does add to the entertainment value... pick your favorite and see if they survive.. mine being Lemon and Tangerine who are admirably played.The idea to have Thomas the Tank Engine stickers was just magical.The film has its fair share of comical side issues which are all delivered well.This film has some superb cameo roles in too.As I say if you have a couple of hours free time you could do far worse than watching this.Maybe HS2 management could get some ideas from this film...

title: Sorry. It just ain't that good.
text: The creative team got too caught up in their echo chamber of "I'm too cool for school" to realize that their project was off the rails. It makes an attempt to be a high budget Pulp Fiction, but the result is just over-priced pulp. More...how do you have a story in Japan and only have 20% of the main actors Japanese??? Also, how do you make all this noise and break all these things without anyone in the train questioning all the chaos? I started clock watching midway through the movie ready to get off the train myself. Perhaps the only saving grace is the neon backdrop of Japan styling that makes for cinematic interest.

title: Surprised how good it was!!
text: Cannot believe I didn't watch it sooner! How many times I saw the trailers for this film and thought it looked so dull! I really just thought it was just Brad Pitts people getting him into the Asian Market and this ticked boxes..... happy to say I was wrong! Just loved it from start to finish, great engaging plot line, great and hilarious actors, great fight scenes! Maybe I enjoyed it so much because I didn't expect much from it, maybe it's because I'm a huge Tarantino fan? (Yes it's very very Tarantino-esqe) or maybe it really was just that good! The characters were really varied and plentiful.... Pitt is always a pretty solid bet when casted, he thrives on these action comedy roles! The plot was just smart enough without trying to be too clever and difficult to follow and even the main protagonist wasn't silly overpowered and inhuman! A few little twists are thrown in for good measure and most importantly for myself there's no dull "filler" scenes where the movie try's to appeal to the Academy for 5mins with no real point! Highly recommend this film.....

title: Rich with details too fast to see in one viewing, worth seeing again
text: Code name "Ladybug" (we never find out his real name), he is really really trying to be a nice guy. His therapist (never seen) is giving him a positive worldview to counter his self admitted terrible run of bad luck. He is undoubtedly the NICEST criminal you are ever likely to meet. He is however a criminal albeit attempting to be a non-violent one... something that he fails at miserably entirely at no fault of his own. The inexplicable twins (you'll see why) are also strangely likeable since they seem to have a code of keeping civilians out of their very violent trade craft. Lemon uses Thomas the Tank Engine as his metaphor for life and people, which he takes utterly seriously and with surprising success in seeing through surface appearance. Add a Yakusa father and son to flesh out the "good"-ish criminals and four very bad people (plus assorted henchmen) and you have the players. Stick them all in a train going 200mph and stopping for EXACTLY one minute per station, and that is the setting. BT has some of the best most crisp editing I've ever seen. You are bombarded by apparently trivial details which later take on importance. The dialogue is witty and intelligent interspersed with flashbacks that take you off the train and fill in each character's back story in viginettes. You can actually feel some sympathy even for some of the assassins who aren't just completely one-dimensional villains (except possibly the Hornet who has pretty much no redeeming features). In any case, beginning to end you have intense visual images moving along the plot as each character's story is told then connected back to the present. So much detail, that after the adrenaline rush of the first viewing, wait a while then watch it again on Netflix for details you missed. This is the kind of movie you can watch multiple times and still enjoy because you can get into the richness of detail.

title: We're on the Train with Another Group of Sociopaths!
text: Despite a few funny moments, there is very little to redeem about this movie. The praise on IMDB is a reflection of a society that is further and further from being in touch with reality. We've seen this before - over and over again in Ritchie / Tarantino - endless action scenes where multiple people are beaten viciously and killed and yet everyone appears making jokes totally normally, and in a great mood, etc.The director wants us, the desensitized, to feel sorrow at the characters' loses... He wants to shock us with violence and then make us laugh at the absurdity of the whole thing - but does that deserve our attention for over 2 hours? I'd rather watch stand up for five minutes than endure another bloodbath.There is almost nothing human about this movie from start to finish. Nothing. You feel emptier and emptier as if goes on. Who do we relate to here? It's a waste of time and will be forgotten soon by the teenagers that currently adore it.

title: SO many things CONNECTED!
text: "Bullet Train" is an absolute thrill ride from start to finish! This action-packed blockbuster delivers non-stop excitement, combining heart-pounding suspense with adrenaline-fueled sequences that will leave you on the edge of your seat. From the moment the train departs, you're catapulted into a world of high-stakes espionage, intricate plot twists, and jaw-dropping stunts.The ensemble cast is nothing short of phenomenal, with each actor bringing their A-game to the table. Their dynamic performances add layers of depth to the characters, making you invest emotionally in their journey. You'll find yourself rooting for some, despising others, and constantly guessing who can be trusted in this web of deceit.Visually stunning cinematography captures the breathtaking scope of the train's journey, from the sleek interiors to the vast landscapes rushing by outside. The special effects are top-notch, enhancing the film's immersive experience and keeping you immersed in its world from start to finish.

title: Fun, fast paced
text: The main thing I really liked with bullet train was they way it handled its characters, each character is fleshed out with their own intentions and personality, and even with such a fast paced movie with many characters, you find yourself engaged in their story. It was also cool to watch each "subplot" going on, such as the snake or the water bottle. The only thing I could nitpick would be the special effects in the third act, some scenes just feel off visually, along with the overall feel of the third act itself. Overall I throughly enjoyed it, and it has landed itself firmly at #5 in my top ten.

title: The illegitimate lovechild of Ritchie and Tarantino
text: A charmless, subpar Guy Ritchie-style film that aspires to Tarantino. Cartoon violence, a total lack of originality, lack of humour and lack of interest.A film in Japan, full of Westerners on a bullet train, full of dull characters and hackneyed dialogue, a snake and James Bond level impossible stunts.There's an attempt to reel you in with flashbacks about hateful characters that you've seen before in plenty of gangster films based in London or LA, transferred to a train. If this hadn't been done with with much more style and humour multiple times in the last thirty years it might have been with a watch.Awful.

title: It's funny
text: Good camera work, beautifully cinematic scenes. The visuals alone are one reason to see this movie, and I typically prefer outdoor filmography but they managed to make these striking. The cast is great with the exception of the russian daughter. She did well, I just find that actor rather annoying in the face. Can't get past it for some reason. Lemon and Tangerine are absolutely hilarious and sweet. Their bickering and Ladybugs commentary is great. Overall this movie is perfect as a goofy action comedy, my only complaint was the very brief sex scene at the beginning. It wasn't funny or necessary in any way.

title: Super fun
text: Nonstop fun. Every minute there is a hilarious twist, awesome action, or a funny gag. Every single character is very unique and has many fun moments. Absolute must see movie for sure.

title: Simply the best
text: It really doesn't get any better than this. All-star cast, fantastic direction, incredible humor, non-stop action, and NO pointless woke propaganda that is so prevalent in Hollywood these days. A modern masterpiece!

title: A Fun Ride
text: Bullet Train is is such a fun & wild ride. I thoroughly enjoyed this movie. I honestly don't understand why the critics are hating on it on Rotten Tomatoes. It is exactly what the trailer had promised it to be, an over-the-top crazy fun ride, with tons of Kill Bill & Jon Wick level action, with Hobbs & Shaw level humor.The story is about 5 assassins aboard a fast moving bullet train in Japan, who find out that their missions have something in common. And then begins the comedy of errors.The movie is basically told through the POV of an unlucky assassin called Ladybug played by Brad Pitt. He is just having a blast in this movie. He has let himself loose and the result is this funny charming performance that just phenomenally clicks.But this is not just a Brad Pitt movie. It is a multi-starrer that also has him in it. Everyone in this movie is great and are just having a blast. And that comes across to us audience so we also end up having a good time.My absolute favorites were the pair of "twins" assassins played by Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry. Their back-and-forth banter cracked me throughout the movie. I need a prequel to this movie with just their previous assassin jobs. I think that would be a great movie to watch.The dialogues in this movie are witty and fast paced. If you pay attention then you will be rewarded with a whole bunch of laughs. But there is also an equal amount of bloody gore action fight scene in it. If you can't handle blood onscreen then this one might not be for you.Overall I had a blast watching this movie and was so glad that I got on board. With the runtime of two hours the movie never overstays its welcome. There are some convenient plot-lines in the movie, and the VFX are not always on point, but you can easily forgive these shortcomings, because the journey in itself is so much fun.P. S. - The movie has a mid-credit scene.

title: Trying to hard to be Guy Ritchie
text: This movie probably seems really slick and smart for someone who hasn't seen Lock, Stock and two smoking barbells and Snatch. I have, and therefore Bullet Train mostly reminded me of a decent, but neither original or very good copy. Extremely noisy, very brutal, the usual national stereotypes thrown in, and of course the mandatory cockney bandits. Soooooo old.And it lasted far too long. Coyld have knocked off half an hour, and the film would have been all the better. Then, once again, mandatory "surprising" ending and people returning from the dead. And so very, very loud. Most of all I'm annoyed they didn't try harder to conceal how unoriginal they were.

title: Loved it!
text: I loved this movie. Very Quentin Tarantino like but even though there is a lot of blood & violence, it didn't bother me. The movie has a fun tone to it, which is contradictory to say since it is so violent. But it's funny & I love the characters & I think it's a great story. Very fast paced. & Brad Pitt is at his most funny & most charming in this flick.

title: Brad Pitt at his best
text: I am not a fan of action films, but this was such a fun movie. Action packed from start to finish. You fall in love w the characters. Absolutely hilarious. Has Tarantino feel to it, but much better. Actually gonna take my family to see it. Highly recommend. Haven't seen a movie that I loved from beginning to end in a long time. Great job w the casting, directing and production. Story lines weren't cheesy, but endearing and unpredictable. Surprises at every turn. Didn't wanna go to the bathroom out of fear to miss a beat.

title: That was fun. One of the best of 2022
text: Not at all what I was expecting. I expected an action movie, that's it. This is one, but it goes above and beyond. Dialogue is superb, what a fun movie to watch. The film does an exceptional job at delivering a compelling and engaging story as well as finding a way to create a connection to almost all characters, to a point where I found myself rooting for almost all. There's depth to it. Also, the scenes where characters go into flashbacks, these gave me a Guy Ritchie vibe, and since I am a huge Guy Ritchie fan, that was a plus for me. Amazing performances (Brad Pitt's character promoting this "zen vibe" was a breath of fresh air!) and great cast overall. This is such an entertaining movie to watch, that I do consider it one of the best films of 2022.

title: best 2 hours spent in a while
text: An absolute banger of a movie. Suspenseful in every scene. Brad Pitt was an outstanding actor as always. The scenery were mesmerizing in every shot and angel. The story might seem to be somehow complicated but it all make sense in the end. Every character had an important role to play. It was a good mix of amature and proffesional actors who made it possible.There has been some obvious impossible moments but that what you one should expect from such an action movie.Not to mention the comic or funny dialogue every character had. It's quite rare to find a good action movie with functioning humor on top class.

title: A perfect vacuum in an imperfect mess
text: Either people conform with very little or I'm too hard to please, but the thing is that I'm shocked by the good reviews. This movie has got its share of forceful moments, lots of silly posing (Brad Pitt Sandra Bullock, Ryan Reynolds), minutes that take hours and hours that take seconds, people seem to teleport since they seem to be faster than the bullet train (e.g. The elder), it's awfully dubbed so it feels that all the surrounding noise has been sucked out and the movie takes place in a perfect vacuum, it's not even close to funny, just a boring cliche of sorts. If you have never watched a Guy Ritchy movie, this might come as a novelty to you, but I suggest you go to the sources (Lock, stock, and two smoking barrels & Snatch) which are ten times better written, acted and directed.

title: Fun boom boom

title: Fate and Karma rules the day in this film
text: I really enjoyed this film so much, So much irony and the ending was so on point. I am still laughing as I write this. title: Perfect Summer Blockbuster
text: I had the luck of watching it in a pr√©-release screening on the third. Brad Pitt really shines at the role within the movie of humor, conflict avoidance and fighting proficiency. The plot isn't airtight (but for sure proficient), but who cares, it's a fun(ny) action blockbuster that made me laugh out loud while also feeling the tenseness of scenes! title: No words
text: This movie is so thriller and badass movie I like it story . Action is so good no words. I love it this movie and VFX brilliant . You must watch this movie.

title: Nice
text: The battle scenes were absolutely excellent, especially those involving Brad Pitt. Bullet Train is without a doubt one of the most exhilarating films I've seen this year. The acting in this film is outstanding, especially from Brad Pitt, Joey King, Bad Bunny, and Aaron Taylor-Johnson. You will be on the edge of your seat from beginning to conclusion. It's also rather amusing. The links made bring the plot together quite well.

title: Just relax and enjoy the ride
text: Sometimes you want something simple, uncomplicated. Just to turn on a movie and turn off your brain. Unfortunately, most modern movie that are at least somehow related to such words, in fact, do not provide the necessary relaxation. They either try to overload the viewer with unnecessary elements, or are simply made very poorly. But it's extremely rare to see high-quality action movie which is actually fun. But this film is the rare case of success.This film has everything you need for an action comedy. You are simply immersed in the events. Yes, the film is essentially a collection of clich√©s. Yes, the authors took a lot of stuff from Tarantino, Ritchie, Vaughn, Carnahan. But is it really bad when it works perfectly? Cool action, good humor, a riot of colors, cool fights, great characters, awesome music (I was just blown away by the Japanese version of Bonnie Tyler's eternal hit). At the same time, the film does not slow down, but constantly invents new things that continue to keep the viewer watching.There is no complex plot here, there is a skeleton of a story on which characters are planted, which we can be easily explained in a couple of sentences. Is this bad? In this case, no. We're just interested in watching them. The actors are wonderful. Brad Pitt has been killing it in his films lately. And this can be seen on the screen. It is impossible to take your eyes off his character.Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry create a gorgeous duo that is as inherently stupid as it is beautiful. Small roles by other famous actors also bring a smile. There are some nice cameos.This movie does everything to please the viewer, and does it right. If you want to relax with cool action with incredibly bright visuals, good humor, cool characters and driving music, then I advise you not to miss this film. Have a lot of fun.

title: Click Bait Movie
text: I'm 99% sure this entire movie was written by an AI with the intelligence of a 3rd grader... (No offense to 3rd graders). My guess tho is Brad Pitt has been out of work for so long, he started to travel the globe searching for any producer he could find who would be willing to work with him, and luckily Asia doesn't suffer from the same fatigue of seeing this guy for the past 30+ years doing the same thing over and over again.. Give them a couple years, they'll get over it.

title: My new favorite movie
text: Seriously, it was so fun, I laughed out loud throughout the movie (rare) and I appreciated that the fight scenes didn't drag out. There's a darkness to many of these kinds of movies and a certain level of anxiousness you usually feel when you're watching. Not here. It was just a good time.It's like, literally the exact opposite of John Wick, if we're comparing vibes on "professional hitmen movies". Which isn't good or bad, just different.

title: Fantastic
text: It's a humorous action blockbuster that had me chuckle while yet making me feel the stress in the situations. Because of its excellent directorial theme, I can still recall how my film school introduced us to John Wick. I have little doubt that The Bullet Train will now receive similar attention. The story is poignant and has a wonderful plot at its centre, along with characters who have a compelling relationship and are funny and enjoyable. The scenes on the bullet trains are both fascinating and exciting. The movie's second half is the greatest since it amps up the excitement and passion.

title: Best movie ever
text: Ever since I watched the first trailer I was dying to watch it and yesterday I watched it. And it turned to awesome to a masterpiece. Everyone worked their butts off.

title: Best movie
text: This comedy-action film was excellent. Joey King, Brad Pitt, and the rest of the cast all did a fantastic job in this film. The movie's plot was exciting, funny, and engaging.
