title: PURE FUN
text: Loved this film. Over the top fun filled with characters that are just too unbelievable which make the film. From the first punch to the last explosion this is a film that grabs you by the throat, flings you across the room, smashes you into the ground and will probabily throw you out the window as well. It's not Marvel type crash bang, it's more Guy Richie character type based. I was rivited from start to finish......make this a must see.

title: A Blast From Start to Finish
text: It has been a while since I have had this much fun at the movies. Upon first hearing about this film I was intrigued. How can you go wrong with this much talent on and off the screen? I was very pleasantly surprised when sitting through this film. We don't usually get films like this anymore. Movies that are made for the action and characters, but done well. There is nothing special about the story being told here, but sometimes if the amount of fun you have can trump your negatives, that is all that matters.Bullet Train focuses mainly on Brad Pitt's Ladybug, an assassin for hire who's really just lucky with his job. They play the character out as if he has bad luck, but that's an ironic bit. Along with four others on this train, they all realize they are there for similar reasons. This in turn sets the action of the film in motion and it is a ride from beginning to end. Is it silly? Absolutely, but in the best ways. I laughed very hard on multiple occasions, at and with the film.As I said, the premise is very straightforward, so you really need to like the characters and be having fun with the action to really enjoy it. For that reason alone, I can say that I loved watching it. Brad Pitt has charisma for days and the duo of Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry was an absolute joy. Their chemistry is some of the best I have seen in a long time. On top of them, Bullet Train is filled with big-name stars that you weren't even expecting and they just added to the fun.There's not too much else to say about this film, other than the fact that David Leitch is a terrific action director and his films usually always pack some great jokes. I think you will be hard-pressed to find a film more enjoyable than Bullet Train this summer, especially when you are looking for nothing but fun. It is not a film that will win any awards, but it will definitely be one that I will purchase and revisit time and time again. It's heavy on the gore and violence though, so if that is a detraction for you, that would be my only concern. Other than that, I just had a great time with one all around.

title: WHAT A FUN RIDE!
text: This is among the best action comedies of late. Maybe the best movie of 2022! The speed at which the movie goes is amazing and its just thrilling from the start to the end. Goriness aside, I had so many laugh out loud moments watching this. It reminds me a bit of the movie Foul Play for its speed and craziness. What a blast this entertaining movie is! Kudos to the director David Leitch and the whole ensemble. Nice to see Brad Pitt not take himself too seriously and allow himself to look foolish at times.Love the backdrop of Japan and its culture, down to Hello Kitty soft toys and vending machines - and the music interludes, really matched the scenes! So cool!If i had a negative point to say, it would be White Death's explanation scene with Brad Pitt - i found those parts a bit slow and boring.For those seeing the low reviews, I'd say give the movie a watch without expectations and don't take the movie too seriously. Its just pure fun and entertainment .

title: Chaotic, Hilarious, Action-heavy, and Entertaining
text: Every now and then, there comes a movie where I can just sit down, turn my brain off, and enjoy some mindless action and comedy. Last year, it was Free Guy, this time it's Bullet Train.I had a blast with this movie. In fact, I might go to watch it again. This is an action-heavy movie with lots of comedy and witty banter. It uses the fact that chaos is an asset to entertainment. Because the plot is so chaotic, that it leads to some hilarious misunderstandings and many different types of action sequences. And the action is all well done. Of course it is, the movie comes from the director of John Wick and Deadpool 2. The stunts are violent and entertaining. And the Tokyo bullet train environment in the whole movie was really cool.The movie is very fast paced, and never slows down. The plot will be a bit hard to follow for the first 20 minutes because there are different perspectives to follow. But afterwards it's just non-stop entertainment. All these 4-5 different character perspectives made it really exciting and unpredictable. The plot itself is genius for an action-comedy. They did a good job making fun of the common action movie tropes.Brad Pitt, Aaron Taylor Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry, are brilliant in the film. Their chemistry is hilarious and characters are charismatic. The dialogue itself is bonkers. It was so hilarious. The finale of this movie was actually a bit satisfying, which I didn't expect from a movie meant for entertainment. The final action scene was exactly what I wanted from an action movie named bullet train. The song choices were great too. And surprisingly, the movie had a theme, like, can you control your fate or is there something like good luck or bad luck? I liked how they questioned that in such an entertaining manner.Overall I loved this movie. I would recommend you to watch this in theatres, it's worth it. Just expect a fun movie with lots of action and lots of comedy.

title: silver streak, japan style.
text: Fun but long. Lots of blood and guts. Violence. Seems to be pretty much "silver streak" from 1976, on steroids. Right at the beginning we are told that ladybug (pitt) was not the first choice for this mission... that must be important later. And film rule number one.... once the gun is shown, it must be fired in the film. Part of the excitement here is that i could never guess what was going to happen next. Several missions occurring at once on a bullet train in japan. Various teams colliding, as the train speeds along. Changing alliances. Discussions of karma, good luck, bad luck. Revenge. All with a sense of humor. Smallish roles for sandra bullock and channing tatum. Directed by david leitch, who has won several awards. Great writing, great performances by all. Bullock, tatum, and pitt also worked together on "lost city"!

title: I was so bored after 20 minutes I stopped watching.
text: First few minutes looked quite good, then the two cockney gangster characters came into it and it went downhill rapidly after that. It tried to be funny but was honestly just boring as hell. The over the top violence/gore while trying to be funny just did not work. This type of film has been done may times before but only way better than this. It might have got better if I continued to watch but, it was so boring I decided that I would not waste another minute of my life watching it. So my advice is to go watch Pulp fiction or many other similar types of movie, they aer way better than this one is.

title: Wow must watch
text: If you like anime, or John wick style movies give it a try. It's pretty different from most movies out nowadays. It's got the same energy as a guy Ritchie movie. The characters do have a story and the backstory is built on flash backs. The pace of the show isn't boring and the dialogue is pretty simple. If you like anime, or John wick style movies give it a try. It's pretty different from most movies out nowadays. It's got the same energy as a guy Ritchie movie. The characters do have a story and the backstory is built on flash backs. The pace of the show isn't boring and the dialogue is pretty simple.

title: If you're looking for Shakespeare this isn't for you
text: The movie is hilarious and the action is over the top. The folks who are complaining about it lacking substance should probably stick to watching documentaries and period pieces about the First World War. If you're looking to have some stupid fun for the sake of escapism then this may be your cup of tea. The laughs are constant and the action scenes make for a good time. Just come into it with the right mind set and you should enjoy it. There are no performances I would consider bad. There are a few that had their part cut pretty short but it kinda keeps you guessing about who will survive and who won't, so that's fine.

title: Great movie
text: I loved the blend of action and comedy in this movie. Maybe it wasn't quite serious enough at some points but that's the element I love about this movie. It doesn't take every scene to seriously but still includes sad and exciting moments.

title: Lots of fun and quirky action
text: It really was just a lot of fun to watch this movie. A lot of really cool action scenes and it didn't take itself serious at all. Everybody knew their part and worked it so well.

title: Incredibly stupid and overrated
text: This movie wants so desperately to be an early 90's Quentin Tarantino film. It's filled with flashbacks and cutaways that add absolutely zero value to the film. One has to look no further than the cutaway at 30:35. A callback cutaway to a Japanese anime with zero substance or relevance? Thanks for that, the 2 hour runtime couldn't have gone without those 15 combined seconds! The all-star cast of characters conned into this dumpster fire are to be pitied. Brad Pitt thankfully has an incredible repertoire to offset this misadventure; and Aaron Taylor-Judge, while young, luckily has outshone enough roles for his career to not be left on the platform. It would appear there's a reason David Leitch wasn't credited as a director on the original John Wick, and that his directorial filmography is so short and utterly without accolade. I can only hope that after seeing this, Hollywood comes to its senses. Maybe in the future, stunt doubles won't be tapped to direct major blockbusters and will be relegated to the end credits as they apparently deserve.

title: Lots of fun!
text: Thoroughly enjoyed this.The actors come across as having had a great time doing this.It's not a clever film, it's just entertaining. Great fight scenes are a given I guess.

title: Funny and all action!
text: I love this movie, the pace is great, and the visual effect is great as well. Reminds me of a kingsman movie too but this is more all about the character of the assassin. The outstanding cast in this movie will be Tangerine (Aaron Taylor Johnson). Charming! Must watch movie.

title: Great movie
text: It's a very entertaining movie, and I think it does what it promise, comedy and action. Okay first, the characters, is one of those movies that you end up loving the characters, not so much of a background except like for a couple of them but even with that you can relate and even love them. Second, the plot, is good enough to keep you interested for two hours and that's a big challenge now days honestly, specially with comedy, it's not enough putting a bunch of famous names in a train, you gotta keep it interesting and this is what this movie does with a sequence of surprises (at least for me) I mean it's not like "oh I knew this would happen" or "totally predictable" and a mystery to solve till half of the movie and the other half supported by the question what's next in all the mini plots happening at the same time. Third, Good ol' comedy, and since I'm giving my personal opinion, perfect comedy, not hypersexual comedy, all sex jokes and scary movie comedy, neither hyper dumb comedy like Hubie Halloween where all is silly people gettin hurt in silly ways and Patrick star comedy. Man, I mean, well done, they knew how to do this the right way. Oh, fourth and not least, the choreographies, in the action department, I mean, not the best scenes but good enough to call it an action movie, pretty interesting and entertaining.

title: Painfully Unfunny.
text: Not entirely sure if I missed the bullet train - since everyone else seem to have had "so much fun watching this movie" in the reviews here.This movie wants to be a Tarantino film - and it's not. It's not even close to being one. The dialogue is corny and very unfunny and none of the characters are interesting or well played. To top all that of, it's unbelievable unrealistic, which you can sometimes abstract from, if it suits the themes and story - but here it doesn't.Either there's something wrong with me, for being one of the few that things this was a bit of a missed opportunity, or maybe my taste is just different. But I didn't find any of the characters believable or funny - and enough with the endless kid's TV show references and the random one liners in between the fights. It really gets old very fast, especially when everything else is so trivial, one dimensional and boring.

title: Funny style of death
text:
To be honest. Never saw so many dead corpses. But most funny die style. What a soundtrack!Need more characters: so I like really the blocked gun u know üçí
Wooooooh! Thx for this great Lough.

title: A blast start to finish
text: Not sure why people are so hard on this movie. So many cookie-cutter movies out there, this was just a great time from beginning to end. Witty, super stylish and yeah, over the top, but such a fun watch.Brad Pitt at his charismatic best, a bunch of fun cameos and strong performances by the whole cast. Not every movie has to make sense or tell some deep-meaning story. Sometimes it's fun to just watch a movie that aims to entertain at every turn and for the most part, succeeds. Some stuff missed (overly long Wolf flashback, for example) but overall, it was well written and well directed.I'm a big fan of this director's work and this just adds to my favourites coming from him.

title: Unapologetically stylish Action
text: Bullet Train is an amazing Action comedy that never takes itself too seriously while still delivering emotional beats.It offers fights reminiscent of John Wick and Nobody with characters that all offer an at least semi-interesting backstory. The neon lights and enclosed spaces force the fights to be creative and unique. The pacing does feel lost at times due to the cutaways but that doesn't detract overall, as they serve either the plot or tone setting.Overall the film delivers on being a goofy action film that you don't need to turn your brain on for, its a solid 8/10.

title: Great for what it is supposed to be
text: Such an unexpectedly fun movie. Clever writing, beautiful visuals, quippy cast... it's an enjoyable film.Is it supposed to be a philosophical masterpiece of psychological illumination? Of course not. But any 3rd grader who watched the trailer could point that out. Let's be real.The only people I see offering low ratings (2/10 is a joke. There are loads of movies that deserve that score, this does not) are ones with their head up some bygone director's ass, trying to compare this to other films that it was "supposed to be." Can we please all acknowledge that nobody enjoys the puffery of film critics, let alone wannabe film critics, relax and enjoy things for what they are?Thank you üòá

title: Just another glib, juvenile, gore bore genre movie
text: Tarantino has a lot to answer for, but at least he can write dialogue, unlike most of the pointless prattle in this movie. Thomas the Tank philosophising might pitch to the mental age of the audience but is as trite as the the rest of the overlong banter between the cliched cockney Smoking Guns twins.Throw in samurai swords, lots of guns, gangsters and guys, of course, and a couple of token evil gals, on a train, and you have yet another formulaic action movie trying to fill in the ridiculous plots holes with jokes. Brad Pitt's in-therapy character hangs it all together with some anger-therapy messaging that soon wears thin, for this is all about violence and stunts, and the lame plot takes a back seat.

title: Just go see it!
text: My husband couldn't believe I wanted to see because action films like that are not something I really enjoy. But the water bottle scene on TV previews made me laugh out loud so I thought, "why not?" And I'm super glad we went! It was over the top, fast action, twisty, and just plain fun. I laughed all the way through and thoroughly enjoyed the story twists! I'd go see it again with friends, just to hear them laugh too!

title: Loved it!
text: I went into this film not knowing much about it and I am very pleased I did. All the actors were fabulous, especially Aron T Johnson ( his cockney accent was absolute class!!!) Brian T Henry (Tangerine and Lemon...ha!) and Brad Pitt.Entertaining, quirky and so much fun! I absolutely loved it, especially the fight sequences, and the visual effects were stunning. David Leitch is a talented man, I mean who doesn't love Deadpool and John Wick?!I just wish I could have seen it in a cinema on the big screen. They being said I will watch this film again and again. I highly recommend this film!!!!

title: A Deadly Ride üöù
text: Bullet Train is a good thriller-comedy movie having lots of twists, blood filled actions,comic timings all inside a running Bullet Train.There is an ensemble cast like Brad Pitt,Joey King,Aaron Taylor-Johnson,David Leitch,Michael Shannon,Hiroyuki Sanada,Brian Tyree Henry and last but not the least A Superhero in a cameo.Its nail biting funny and engaging climax will keep you in your seat till the end.I loved the character Lemon most,played by Brian Tyree Henry. His obsession with Thomas The Tank Engine and all of the show's character is truly funny and relatable at the same time.Overall its a good movie to watch.

title: Just fun
text: It's a great movie to have fun during summer. Action scenes look amazing and the choreography is simply outstanding. The twists are predictable, but it doesn't ruin the movie. I would definitely watch it again.

title: a moronic film for moronic viewers ?
text: There is obvious talent involved in this film, it has a big budget, good and great actors and a couple of excellently choreographed fight scenes.Sadly, the scrip is utterly stupid, impossible, convoluted and really quite trite. If you like getting so drunk that the story doesnt matter, then you could rate this indulgent vanity project above 6/10 - otherwise its almost painful watching Bradass Pitt smarm through this with an unbelievable character - who says 'are you serious as someone is seriously trying to kill him... the whole movie is like some chummy coke fest of sanctimonious and smug exchanges.While it has many good reviews, I would question the aesthetics of those who think this is worth more than 5/10 - it has nothing new to offer, and the characters are so cartoonish they become quickly rather pathetic.Maybe folk are just desperate for something to see, and relative to all the other junk Hollywood has produced the past couple of decades this is some respite for them ? For me it would be better to watch film made pre-millennium that I haven't been seen before - straight after this ~I watched Beau Geste (1966) and (excuse my candor ) it really pisses all of this modern crap.

title: Everything done right and more
text: I never really liked brad Pitt nor hated him or anything. He was just another famous Hollywood actor but after this movie id gladly give my life for this guy. I watched bullet train twice in cinema and bought it in 4k everyone I showed it was laughing and shouting as well, you can watch bullet train multiple times and only discover more stuff and like it more. Seriously the last time I had something like this was with avatar, you just can't get enough of it. It's funny, it's epic, it's dramatic and it's very high quality well done. The characters, the music, the actors the villains the plot the setting it's just a masterpiece. I played a lot of games, watched a lot of shows ans movies and this is clearly somewhere in my top tens. You just can't regret watching it. I rarely write reviews or even rate anything but bullet train is an exception. I might even give it a 10/10 but it's just too short. Should've done a 3 hour version smh. No but the length is juuuust right. Not too short and not too long. But obviously i'dve liked it longer. Other than the only criticism I have is probably the ugly cover/movie poster I keep seeing. Probably scared a few people off.

title: Not What You're Expecting!
text: Sandra Bullock is my favorite actress so wanted to see this. Wow! Brad Pitt as a bumbling goofball taking instructions from Bullock's character because some other agent called off. Talk about Murphy's Law! Whatever can go wrong, will! This movie appears to be a violent, bloody mess (it is that), but ends up laugh out loud hysterical! If you like Brad Pitt, you will love this film!

title: Chaotic & fun
text: This movie felt like an explosion. Professional assassins all on one bullet train, fighting each other. If it sounds ridiculous then you're right, it is. But this movie is ridiculous & that's what makes it entertaining to watch. This movie isn't quite like anything else I've watched recently. Brad Pitt, the main character doesn't even feel like the main character since there are so many other main characters like Lemon or Tangerine, Lemon being my favourite. This movie had many unrealistic scenes such as everybody surviving a train derailing or being shot. This movie was so fun & it makes me excited about other movie projects coming out.

title: A bunch of Americans in a adapted Japanese novel
text: A mix of eastern culture and western references, with knives, guns, family feuds, mafia conspiracy and badass mercenaries gathered on a bullet train. All hired by a mobster with a thirst for revenge.Phenomenal as David Leitch, since Fight Club, went on to become a great director. Once again surprising in his works of action with a beautiful touch of first-rate comedy and action. He knows how to direct a film that will please all audiences, especially with his good relations in Hollywood. Fantastic Celebrity Cameos in one movie.The film's art direction was masterful with anime arts and Tarantino inspirations. And according to the cast, Buster Keaton and Jackie Chan led the way in terms of action and comedy. Leitch is simply a genius.Zak Olkewicz, debuting the Californian screenplays with great competence. Excellent adaptation of the Japanese novel "Maria Beetle" by K√¥tar√¥ Isaka. Olkewicz made the story go global and international, taking a little bit out of Japan.Competent cast. With Brad Pitt doing 95% of his own stunts in this film. By the way, he made a great character. Bringing even some of his attributes to the scenes. Forgotten character and smart toilet was fantastic. Nice to have the freedom to add your ideas. That's the benefit of being a close friend of your director.Brian Tyree Henry and Aaron Taylor-Johnson burst in theses roles. Together they formed a super dynamic duo of sociopaths in the scenes, with lots of "back and forth" dialogue. This led Aaron to a very interesting position. Since comedy is not his comfort zone. Aaram says in an interview how Brian was largely responsible for carrying this humorous atmosphere between the duo.Joey King, as Prince in this film and as The Princess in another. The way the movies communicate with each other is hilarious. So... She was praised by the entire cast for how sharp and quick she is in scenes... and also playful behind the scenes. "She's a powerhouse," commented Brad Pitt. As opposed to playful and harmless, in her acting she came with multiple layers, from sweet to revenge-hungry killer.Despite his few appearances, Sandra Bullock did very well as a Ladybug boss. Replacing Lady Gaga was a good incident.After seeing the trailer, I knew it would be a fun movie, but I didn't think I would like it as much as I did. I had a lot of fun in the two very well-crafted hours of this film.

title: Had a BLAST throughout the film
text: Enjoyed every seconds of Bullet Train!! Wow what a movie. Character driven with stellar performances by everyone. Wouldn't even think twice to watch it again.

title: Awesome time waster!
text:
This movie, was like 'snatch' and 'kung fu hustle' had a baby. I loved it! This is the only movie on IMDb I've left a review so far, just a btw in case this isn't critical enough or explanatory enough.CGI wasn't great but the witty and fun action makes it worth it. Just like 'Kung Fu hustle'
Everyone is chasing one thing, if you pay attention to details you have more fun along this rollercoaster. Just like 'snatch'.The whole thing had me guessing and laughing. The violence with a playful script just made the movie for me . I'm totally into these underrated movies that keep you interested and have a lot of depth to them. Definitely can see this in my top rewatch movies.If you don't like this movie you have no humor.

title: I Dare You to Fall Asleep
text: A Thriller movie Mixed with stupidity and action very well. Unprecedented endings, Unlimited enthusiasm, If you are a fan of Guy Ritchie or Tarantino.. Then I Highly recommend this movie.

title: One of Brad Pitt's best movies
text: It was a really fun movie, and the role of Brad Pitt was very unique, and the role of Aaron Taylor was one of the most unique actors, this movie was one of the best movies of Brad Pitt and thank's brad pitt.I don't sound them out loud with these kinds of movies.And I congratulate the director David leitch his film is one of the best action films I hope he develops his work.And I congratulate all the actors in the film. It was a really unique act.But the budget is very low compared to the film really thank you for such a film Brad Pitt himself all the films are different and unique Thanks Brad pitt.

title: The Guy Ritchie store called...
text: ..and they want it all back. Even Brad Pitt. Seriously, not that bad a movie for directorial debut, could have been edited down to a great Am Ex commercial, but jeez it was just two hours of being bludgeoned by every Guy Ritchie trope, like being in a Blockbuster and having that section collapse on you, while you're pinned there with the VHS tapes still slowly teetering off the top shelf and pelting you in the face: Snatch "ow!'" Revolver "ow!" RocknRolla "ow!" , Lock Stock and Two Smoking "ows!".And boy, Sandra Bullock really phoned it in on this one. I have to admit I had a pretty good time though for the first 30 odd minutes while my popcorn lasted but I had to duck out early after they halfway mark.

title: Great time and one wild ride...
text: Bullet Train is a hilarious wild ride, lots of twist and turns. Great direction on the close quarters hand to hand combat, and the special effects. The cast all plays their parts very well, the cameos are also well done.

title: Remember when movies were fun?
text: This was super fun and pretty funny and the movie is cast well. Even the action is made a joke which is good. It has environmental humour as a plot device...It doesn't feel like I'm watching a slog of cgi like an mcu movie even though there is alot of it and the pacing is well done.I'm not sure why the story is getting called out either I watched movies like inception and were uninspired this is good pop corn fun and my girlfriend liked it she jayes action films.

title: I'm not sure, but it almost rates a single star
text: I tried to like it - really. But the sound track / dialogue almost always needed subtitles (not counting the foreign language segments). What ever happened to clearly recorded dialogue? Yeah, I'm getting old, but I double checked by watching an older movie from the 1970s and 1980s, and the dialogue recording was clear and intelligible.It was almost as bad as Jupiter Ascending. . . Another movie with mumbles, poor diction, and hard to hear - needing subtitles, fir shir.The action scenes were also horridly photographed, with plenty of shaky cam, jump cuts, jerky cam, and let's not forget lens flare. EEK. What more can they do to ruin it? Oh, right - toss in endless vulgarities.NOT ENTERTAINING.

title: Fun, fun, fun!
text: This is super fun, super weird, super funny and action packed. It also has emotional bits which I thought was a great break from the funny tone throughout. Great movie. A 9 because I don't really like the forced British accents and some of the script (or maybe delivery of it) was a little questionable sometimes. But overall great and entertaining movie!

title: Solid action and humor entertained the whole time
text: So I don't really get where the 5 out of 10 reviews are coming from one it's based on a book so no not a rip off of anything great original story. Loved all the characters the fight sequences were pretty great and enjoyable action packed movie for the summer.

title: So much better than I expected
text: I watched this.haphazardly one night because I didn't want to commit to a more must-see movie on my watch list ...and expected something that could be stopped halfway to finish the next day without much hesitation....The general consensus about this flick was of a brainless frenzy of shootings and action on a train with little or no rationale.Dead wrong. 'Bullet train' holds a finely tuned plot (if contrived a bit), but don't tell me that Pulp Fiction is realistic or probable.Weird characters with.engaging idiosyncracies, a constant forward moving plot, LOTS of twists - and a slew of action set pieces. Handled with finesse in editing and pacing.This train is a fun ride: put your smartphone aside = no time to check your social media during this, as you would miss important points or comedic moments!

title: You *shouldnt* be disappointed. It's a good movie.
text: If you are disappointed then I'm not sure why you chose to watch a movie like this in the first place.It's got great acting, great cast, and a interesting story. ACTION it's got action.**Chefs Kiss**

title: Unwatchable. Who are the people who enjoyed this movie?
text: If you want a litmus test to find out if someone has a poor sense of humor and no taste in movies, ask them if they like Bullet Train. If they say, yes, proceed with caution. If they say "loved it!!" with any enthusiasm....run.It's honestly unwatchable. I can't really say much else because I couldn't watch it. I kept fast forwarding through it hoping for a scene or dialogue that might grab my attention and pull me in but I had to give up.The most baffling part is that they made a Bullet Train 2....and sold tickets. I guess Brad Pitt's fans are willing to sit through anything if he's in it.Save your brain cells. Skip it.

title: Snake, on a train
text: If ever there was a film made where the cast are clearly having as much fun as the audience: this is it. Brad Pitt, Aaron Taylor Johnson, Joey King and the rest of the ensemble cast are having an absolute hoot in what appears to be Kill Bill re-imagined by Guy Richie. A disparate group of assassins board the titular train, speeding towards their intertwining destinies while a lethally poisonous snake is on the loose. This is bright, very violent and frequently very funny stuff that looks and feels exactly what you expect a film by John Wick's Director to be like. Spectacularly entertaining if you aren't fussed by the ridiculous violence, some so-so accents and the appropriatation of Japanese culture.

title: 2 hours flies by like you're on an actual Bullet Train
text: Very cool, clever and fun!Not exactly movie of the year-material but a must watch if you're into stylish, cool and fast paced action movies with some witty dialogues.Features some seriously great and creative action choreography and an even greater cast, even if some of the talent got minimal screen time.

title: non-stop action
text: I saw this movie with my family, with little to no expectations. I was so surprised how well the plot was interweaved with various characters and how well the continuity and details were used. The reoccurring theme of thomas and friends was so cool and i absolutely loved it.As for the cast, i think it was perfectly casted. The natural chemistry between lemon and tangerine, the cameo by channing tatum, bad bunny's appearance, all of it. Every character was so important to the plot and it really helped everything come together.The movie is rated R, which usually is a turn-off for me, but in this case i loved every single bit.

title: Cartoonish Chaos
text: Bullet Train is probably one of the more entertaining films to release in recent years. It brings an incredible cast of veterans who you've seen before but this doesn't detract from the film. A bunch of assassins' cooped up together on a bullet train while a mystery unfolds is something fresh and original. The fight scenes are epic and occur frequently which does make the film fly fast but also makes other, quieter scenes feel a bit like a drag.Though the film occasionally feels convoluted and even a little tiring it's certainly worth a watch.

title: Sad idiocracy
text: That is exactly what this boils down to - sad idiocracy. As if the state of affairs of the everyday world around us wasn't enough to convince anyone that we actually live in the movie "Idiocracy" - the fact that 110k people rated this empty shell of a movie, polished by the names of a number of famous actors - a whopping 7.4 stars - should remove any doubts. It's not just hollow, it is also profoundly shameless in an attempt to copy the styles of Tarantino and Rodriguez in certain parts. But where Tarantino excels in presenting a depth of a random conversation, whoever created this abomination stops their unique intellectual pursuit at having the character enunciate "etcetera".

title: You will be ENTERTAINED
text: This is not Citizen Kane. This is not Gone With the Wind. This is not The Godfather. What it is is 2 hours of being throughly entertained in an action comedy. Don't look for it to be more than that. Just. Enjoy. The. Ride. Kick back and for 2 hours you will be entertained folks. Kudos to all involved. I had a blast watching this movie. Thanks for making movies for those of us who love to go to movies to have a good time. This movie delivered that IN SPADES.

title: Good source material!
text: I am surprised at how often movies with unearned jokes just trundle along, with graphic violence that's upsetting (not the case here) nor gleeful graphic *enough* sometimes -- again, not the case here. It took a *lot* of post-'90s cinema for this to go down as palatable but it's adult entertainment, for adults, and you'll go to see something else next week -- you might not think of "Neuromancer" or "Blade Runner," but you might think of "Hello Kitty!" and it's not a piece of crap. The conceit that a bunch of hired killers conduct themselves like day traders or other corporate types in good-natured but serious competition with each other is gamely handled, and it's hard not to be charmed by (nearly) everyone in the whole thing, even if there's too many characters to keep them all in your hand at the same time and the choice to keep everything trundling along and light if graphic entertainment is some of them fall off your mental radar. "Murder on the Orient Express" and "Silver Streak" maybe are inevitably in the background as precursors, and Joey King as a trapped-on-the-train suspect type is charming as ever -- this could be her breakthrough role to super-stardom, watch it happen without your really *noticing*, next -- and Brad Pitt proves once again he's awfully hard not to like. The d√©nouement goes on for a while, but what doesn't these days with CGI to dispense? "I'm sorry, forgive me, I'm mansplaining!" comes up. "Are you going to get that?" comes up. What's not to like?

title: Boring, convoluted and just annoying
text: Wow I expected this movie to be funny and exciting but that is not what I got. It's got a couple of okay fights and one hell of an awful plot. It tries to be funny but it just keeps making the same terrible jokes over and over again to the point where if I hear about Thomas the tank engine again I might scream. It is just a nonsensical mess of a movie that just expects you to be on its stupid level, I honestly wanted to like this but I just can't also there is more then one random cameo that just comes out of nowhere that I'm assuming they put into the movie in order to get a chuckle but it just feels dumbs.

title: Pure chaotic perfection.
text: This movie was a blast from start to finish. It delivers the sort of random craziness that you expect from Guy Ritchie films (I think Ritchie would be envious of this movie). A varied cast of characters all with their own stories in one massively twisted and interconnected plot. With tons of action, laughs, and downright WTF moments.The cast is excellent. Top notch on every level. They deliver an outstanding performance. Everyone involved hits it out of the park. Each character gets their own intro, has their own backstory, and their own reasons for being where they are. And the way they all interact is beautiful.The action scenes are incredible. Choreography is out just amazing. Using a small location to deliver some intense action, fast movements, and comedy gold.The special effects are great. So many things done with CG that look flawless.The story is just beyond out there, and so wonderfully put together. You get to enjoy some truly outrageous moments, with a surprisingly good tie in for everything. Everything has it's purpose from start to finish.Definitely a must watch for those who enjoy heist movies, great action comedy, and the utter chaos and joy this movie delivers. One of my few 10/10 reviews, and definitely worthy of being on that list.

title: A Guy Richie Film Without Guy Richie! A Great Time!
text: Saw "Bullet Train" yesterday and was impressed. From the tightness of the script to the choreography of the fight scenes to the outstanding cinematography - it was a great film. The acting is well done, far beyond what you would expect from a genre piece. But it is the story that makes it successful. What could have been a convoluted mess as multiple storylines converge was impressively and tightly interwoven as it is tightly written and connects all of the dots. Brad Pitt was phenomenal as the down on his luck operative, Henry and Johnson (as "Lemon and Tangerine" respectfully) were hilarious and owned their scenes. Joey King as "Prince" was awesome. I had never seen her before in anything, nor even heard of her. I was highly impressed by her throughout the entire film. He has the role of sociopath down to a science. All in all, "Bullet Train" is a well made and highly entertaining film. It is an over the top thrill ride.....

title: Just an incredible movie not to be missed!!!!!
text: OK this is the best movie I have seen in quite a very long time. Brad Pitt is fantastic as is the rest of the cast, especially Brian Tyree Henry and Joey King!!There were so many surprises and plot twits but none of them contrived, with an obvious nod to Trenton Tarantino!!I was rewinding it all the time to watch scenes over again. I can't understate how great Pitt was in this original and creative movie. The script was so well written.I was happily surprised to see Brian Tyree Henry in the movie as I was familiar with his acting in the series Atlanta. Zazie Beetz also from Atlanta has a cameo in it.So just a fantastic movie, WATCH IT!!!!!!!!!

title: All aboard!
text: BULLET TRAIN (2022) ***1/2 Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry, Zazie Beetz, Michael Shannon, Sandra Bullock, Andrew Koji, Hiroyuki Sanada, Bad Bunny, Masi Oka (Channing Tatum - cameo) High octane action comedy with Pitt as a reforming professional killer (a real hoot) tasked to obtain a metal briefcase aboard the titular vehicle from Tokyo to Morioka while facing a cavalcade of assassins in the mix to keep things lethally lively. If Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie had a baby this would be it with this highly entertaining and eyebrow-raisingly violent with enough dazzling fight sequences and comedic set-ups to keep the pulse racing until its outrageous climax thanks to director David Leitch's kinetic energy racing like an adrenaline shot.

title: Wow. Don't waste two hours of your life like I did
text: Now I like dumb action movies. I'm not a stickler for good plot. But this film is tedious beyond belief, which you can tell after about 10 minutes. There are no "goodies" so you don't care who lives or dies. There are so many plot holes (like who doesn't keep a suitcase with $10m next to them but just puts in the holding area). Its clearly trying to be "funny" but it's all really obvious.This is one of the worst films I've seen in a really long time. I really should have switched off after 20 minutes.It's really irksome that other people seem to like this film - I cannot see any plus sides.

title: One of the Best Movies of 2022
text: Pros and Cons at the end if you want to skip the actual review!After seeing this 2 times, and I can confidently say this is one of the best movies of 2022. And to be honest, I did not think I was going to be this good, and I'm disappointed I didn't see this in theaters when I had the chance. From the looks of the trailer, Bullet Train just looks like a somewhat generic action movie that will suffice some entertainment, but the story is, shockingly, much more complex. So I guess let's talk about it (Youtube level transitions lmao)The story in Bullet Train is so much more than it seems, and you start to recognize that at the beginning of the movie. The setup provides enough information to get you interested but doesn't overwhelm you. And for only being two hours, Bullet Train takes its time when adding plot points to the story. While some character arrivals may seem out of place at first (The Wolf) it really comes together at the end and everything starts to make sense. I think the strongest part of the story is the twist at the end. I was not expecting this to have any kind of twists, but I was proven wrong as we got multiple smaller twists throughout the entire movie, but even with all of those, I did not expect such a big twist. And a movie having a twist does not automatically mean the twist is good, obviously, but I can safely say that the twist in Bullet Train is very well done, and makes so many things make more sense in a satisfying and creative way. Another thing that makes the story so good are the characters.Each character, even the ones with little screentime, all have something going for them. It helps that almost every single character gets their backstory when they are introduced and that quickly creates something that makes their character unique, right off the bat. But some characters are just so much better than the others, and I think anyone who has seen Bullet Train knows exactly who I'm talking about. Lemon and Tangerine are easily the best characters, and they add so much to the movie. They provide tons of comedic relief but also add emotional moments, and their characters aren't just meant to be funny. They actually have some nice depth to them that just makes them more likeable, and that is much appreciated. Brad Pitt's character, also known as "Ladybug" is quite good too. I feel like he didn't have as much depth as the other characters, but he was still likeable and was really funny. One thing I find interesting is that Brad Pitt was advertised as the main character, but honestly, everyone feels like the main character here, not just him. And Bullet Train has 2 great villains, The White Death (who I'll talk about soon) and The Prince. The Prince, at least for me, was very unique with how they were written. They were also really unlikable, but still very entertaining to watch, and an unlikable villain is not a bad thing. The White Death is also a badass character, and even though he doesn't have much screentime, I like how his presence is always there throughout the movie.Before talking about the acting, I want to talk about the action and directing. The action isn't anything superb. BUT they made great use out of the fact that the entire movie takes place on a train, and the hand to hand combat was well choreographed. Considering the director of Bullet Train directed Hobbs and Shaw, and Deadpool 2, it was interesting watching him take on something that was a bit smaller scale. And while I think his larger scale action is better, he still clearly has talent in this department. The Hornet fight, and The Wolf fight are standouts when it comes to the hand to hand fighting, but the climax is easily the best when it comes to the action. The directing is also great. The neon lights pop, the clean colors and design of the Bullet Train add to the atmosphere and make every scene pleasing to the eyes.I talked so much about the characters, but not the acting, which is weird considering acting is probably the most important part to a character. An amazing actor and help remove the viewer's attention away from the character's flaws, in terms of writing (Thanos), but a bad actor can make the audience ignore how well written a character is and instead talk about how bad the character was. But luckily the acting here is fantastic. I think the standouts here are Aaron Taylor-Johnson as Tangerine, and Joey King as the prince. Both of them add so much to their characters. I also really liked Hiroyuki Sanada's performance as the Elder, but I might be a bit biased because Ryuji is my favorite horror movie character. But there are no bad roles, and I would say every performance was above average.Now this is where more pros, and some cons come in. The climax. I loved the climax but didn't like the climax of the climax. I think the fight with the White Death is great, and something hits different about a katana fight on a bullet train while a Japanese cover of "I need a hero" is playing. The entire climax is very well shot and entertaining. The fighting is great, it has a lot of blood, and the twists, like I said earlier, are great. My problems with it are I think it goes on for too long at the end, and the jokes they put in there aren't that funny, and I think the slow-mo scene of *spoiler* looked a bit ugly and was unnecessary, but other than that, the climax is great. The last thing I'm going to talk about is the soundtrack. I LOVE the soundtrack. The Japanese covers of famous song was a nice detail, and also sounded great, and the theme that plays for the White Death is great too. I didn't expect this to have such a good soundtrack, but it having a goo soundtrack was a welcome surprise.I think the chance of anyone reading this whole review is close to zero, and I can't blame them, but as we reach the end of this review, there is a chance that someone skipped to my final paragraph, and for that, I will end a pros and cons here:Pros: Great action, amazing acting, very well written story, super well shot, well paced, and a shockingly good soundtrack.Cons: The climax fumbles a little bit.Overall, an amazing movie, and I'm happy that I'm reviewing this after such a long break from actual reviews.

title: Excellent fun
text: This movie has had some terrible reviews. They couldn't be more wrong. It is great fun from start to finish.Funny dialogue. Great character interplay. Lots of laugh out loud moments. Plot twists.Its silly. Its violent. Its loud.Brad Pitt is great, but hes not the best thing in it. That would go to Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry.Switch off and enjoy.

title: Really, really, really entertaining
text: WOW! I'm a 40 year old female, so I don't think this movie was gonna be for me, but I was wrong. What a movie. I was entertained throughout-I didn't look at my phone once! That's when you know it's a good one. I also haven't laughed that hard in a min. Really great! This character count is killing me RN b/c you don't need to read reviews like they're copied & pasted from movie critic websites, you just need to know that the movie was good right?! Well, I'm trying to tell you that it is, but IMDB insists on making sure I write 600 characters about it, so shout out to the dude from Atlanta & Brad MF'n Pit. I loved it.

title: Hilarious, so funny
text: I did not laugh from my heart like this for a long time.To be honest, I thought this film was made by Quentin Tarantino, it is different than his style but it's pretty similar.I did not want the film to end, I could not stop laughing from the start to the end of the movie.It is unpredictable, you can't tell the story, and you think that you would understand or predict but it is well written.All the cast was great, even the snake.If you are looking for lovely two hours of fun, something that can put you out of the mood, I would recommend this film.I would give it 10 because it's underrated.Thanks to all of the staff for making us laugh in such hard times, cheers :)

title: Bland Train
text: I was so excited for this but I'm very disappointed. This feels incredibly unoriginal, the humour falls flat, there's two of the most annoying characters and it just feels overly cringy with what it does. The only good things are the fight scenes the cinematography is great there and there's a good amount of gore.It just really didn't need to be 2 hours long because at times it drags. The writing seems to think that if you just write a few jokes and just keep repeating them that, that will be hilarious. It just gets very irritating. I honestly thought I was going to love this but just really didn't find myself finding anything that was truly enjoyable.

title: 1 star reviews are liars
text: I dunno how you can give this movie a 1. It's such a lie and you're just as bad of reviewers as ppl who give perfect 10's on crap movies. This movie was fast paced, action packed, driven plot, great actors, and keeps its viewers captivated. There's a cameo or two that might annoy some folks, but overall it was a good movie. I didn't see this in theaters, I saw it on Netflix and for a Netflix watch, I really have no complaints. Brad Pitt is great, Aaron Taylor-Johnson is greater, and "The Elder" is my personal favorite. Besides entertain, what more do you ppl want out of a movie? Do you want the actors/actresses to physically come outta your tv's screens and play patty cake with you? Like, I seriously don't get the complaints on movies that are obviously DECENT and that you can tell a lot of work went into just so our eyeballs can have a good time. The movie is good. And It's at least better than any of the super hero movies/shows that poop out of Disney every other month. So yeah it's good; go watch it.

title: A masterpiece in my opinion
text: I loved this film and didn't want it to stop. I thought every character was played brilliantly and it made me laugh constantly. I didn't want it to stop, it has been a while since a film of such entertainment that didn't take itself too seriously has been made. It was well shot and needed attention from the viewer, but given that attention it was a masterpiece. Full of big names and great performances, completely different and I can't imagine what anyone who didn't like it is looking for in the name of entertainment but this film is unsurpassable in my honest opinion. Very well done and very well thought out.

title: A Fun Watch!
text: I really did not know what to expect going into this movie I even put off watching Bullet Train for a interesting documentary. But for a lack of entertainment one night my wife and I decided to give it a peep and I have to say it was very interesting entertaining and fun ride. I really enjoyed this film as it kept me guessing and also laughing making it a fun watch. The acting was solid the story line was interesting. The twist and turns made the movie very watchable and well worth the hype. Lots of interesting characters bringing their own flavor to the film is what did it for me. I would recommend this film to anyone who wants to watch a film and walk away satisfied with a smile.

title: Stylish and fun
text: I have known for awhile that plot twists, subverting expectations, and gloomy endings are my favorite qualities in movies. Bullet Train was the final nail in the coffin that showed me how much I love quick and witty dialogue. It is impossible to not stay engaged when the script is this well written.The entire run-time occuring a on a single bullet train with a destination set in stone provides such a great sense of urgency and understanding of the set. This film has style, brilliant character development, and solid payoffs all around. Worth watching in theatres.This is my first review where I have been forced to write over 600 characters per new IMDB guidelines. At 450 characters my review was done and I had to add padding to submit it. Is this really how they think improving user reviews should be done?

title: It is a perfect 4 star movie
text:
Can you go wrong with Brad Pitt ?......... yes
I felt like I am watching a what could be a Quentin Trentino movie .... NOT EVEN CLOSE !It is a massive mush of a movie ... characters all over the place .. to the point that I didn't appreciate anyone of them ..
By the way ... I watched half the movie and I couldn't watch the rest !... I just couldn't !Some movies work for some good good reason ... this movie didn't work for me sadly ! .... I was very much awaiting to watch it ...My advise .... Put more depth in your action loaded movie ... and hire QT for this sort of movies ! I guarantee it will be a win.

title: A Reason I gave it 10
text: Bullet Train gets 10 stars from me for two main reasons. One, it beats everything on Hulu, the rest of Netflix, Showtime and Epix. Only HBO and Prime have reasonably equal films. And Two, since it is a dry season for great films, this one stands out. No Star Wars, No Marvel(well not on TV), etc. So for you stuck at home like me you will find this the best 2 hours of the past 2 months. And for those of us starved for good media, that means a lot. Call it great timing or whatever, it is the itch that nothing else scratches. Except for that show on Prime. But that is still pretty great. So savor it. Enjoy it. Get the popcorn ready. Make it a prime Friday night event. Don't waste this opportunity because I don't know when in the next 2 months or so we will get another Bullet Train fun time. Get the wine or beer ready. Even make it a first date event. She will love you for it. But remember, good popcorn, extra butter, good food, good wine or beer. Don't waste this opportunity. And enjoy.

title: Whole lot of fun
text: Why it got a 59% on Rotten tomatoes is weird because this movie is soooo funny and wild. The cast is perfect. Tangerine and Lemon (favorite duo) Brad Pitt is so quick with his humor. His facial expressions kill me. This movie is so wild and crazy. I was laughing my a** off. Great stunts and non stop action. Few cameos but not saying who it is. Don't look it up either. I was also impressed with Joey Kings accent. She's an upcoming star indeed. I just love this movie. I'm definitely gonna buy it. Gonna watch it again. I was waiting for this movie so I'm so glad I finally got to see it. I adore Brad Pitt!!

title: Surprisingly Good
text: To be honest, I did not have my hopes up for this film, but it is quite enjoyable. Its rare these days to not find a character thats clearly made to be funny, cringe and unfunny but Bradd Pitts character genuinely made me laugh. I just loved how he was portrayed as this wacky guy who feels out of place in all this madness but somehow still manages to pull things off on a professional level. And its not just his character, all the characters in this movie had their own little quirks which made them all likeable.What makes it better is how each character plays into each others path/storyline. The expose throughout the film was paced out perfectly so we get a better understanding of how each character got in their positions and how they will interact with one another. But after each sub story, adds to the whole madness of the main story which just racks up until the chaos just swallows everyone.

title: You ever watch Thomas the tank engine
text:
Choo choo üöÇBullet Train is a crazy mix of Snatch, Kill Bill, John Wick and Murder on the Orient Express...This is a highly entertaining action 'comedy' that oozes style!It's extremely fun and a bit on the outrageous side to be honest, so it's not meant to be taken too seriously...
It's filled with plenty of funny and memorable characters and moments!The visuals and cinematography are fantastically soaked in a beautiful neon glow. The action is awesome, well-shot and brutal, which is no surprise coming from the guy who helped create John Wick, directed Atomic Blonde, Deadpool 2 and Hobbs and Shaw!Directed by one of the guys who killed John Wick's dog...
Director and producer David Leitch is quickly becoming the King of Action Films!His name alone was enough to capture my interest in this film...
I'm honestly convinced that the man can do no wrong?!He is definitely becoming a director to watch...Bullet Train was honestly one of my most anticipated films of 2022.With a cast that includes Brad Pitt, Sandra Bullock, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry, Michael Shannon, Hiroyuki Sanada, Zazie Beetz, Joey King, Logan Lerman and even surprise appearances from Ryan Reynolds and Channing Tatum; I was sold right from the very start...
Brad Pitt proves once again why he is Hollywood's go to man for literally anything!Joey King is surprisingly really badass!But for me, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry steal the show!They are absolutely hilarious and have fantastic chemistry too!Bullet Train is a non-stop thrill ride!It's an entertaining whirlwind of goofy character after goofy character, and awesome fight after awesome fight...
Bullet Train feels like it has come straight from the crazy minds of Quentin Tarantino, Guy Ritchie and Matthew Vaughan!Overall, David Leitch's direction is simply terrific.The film just oozes style with gorgeous lighting, vibrant colours, inventive camera work and a fun soundtrack!Bullet Train provides you with enough adrenaline pumping, high octane action we have come to expect from Leitch, laced with colourful characters played by a star studded cast and enough witty humour to keep you engaged from beginning to end.

title: Tarantino wanna be
text:
Well,
It is a nice try. But I wish people would come up with something of their own,
This movie is sooo Tarantino wanna be :)
Blood, weird, funny, crazy, bazar.: you name it..

title: Cinematic Perfection
text: This was so enjoyable and entertaining! Bullet Train is exactly what an action comedy should. So much action and so much witty humor! I loved every minute of it!Brad Pitt, thank you for your honest and humble performance as Lady Bug. What a treat to see an action hero just being his humble self. Absolutely nailed it!Every character was spot on and so enjoyable to go on this adventure with. Rarely do I laugh out loud, but Bullet Train had me doing this more than once. So fun!I really can't come up with anything that I would change from this adventure. It's not often that I leave a review but this film was exactly what cinema should be; an outrageous escape from the ordinary.

title: Fun!
text: This is a fun comedy action movie based on a book of the same name. Ladybug (Brad Pitt) and several others are assassins on the Bullet Train. Ladybug is trying to recover a briefcase which belongs to a gang boss in Kyoto but Ladybug is trying not to kill anyone and wants to start a new more spiritual life. Some on the train are after the case. Some are trying to return a gangsters adult son. They are willing to kill each other. The comedy is in their interaction together. This is all happening on the Bullet Train to Kyoto, a great backdrop, with occasional stops where some try to get on and some to get off. This is all weaved together in an intricate web with their back stories. The result is a fun movie that moves along through various plot twists. I enjoyed it. I'll probably read the book now.

title: Unexpected Ride to Japan gory Fun !
text:
First of : Top actors ! And amazing performances... brad pitt dont disappoint to carry the show in a wild hilarious gory mess. Violently fun and thrilling. Enough mystery to look forward to what will happen next or who is who or responsible and such ... brilliant screen play with more details that it seems like the waterbottle sequence... nice choreography.I loved the japanese reference in the movie, oh yes some are clich√© but some are actually very true to this awesome country - in fact lot in the movie reminds me of a good anime called ¬´ baccano! ¬ª
watching it far exceeded my expectations with a lot of actors popping in the movie and making it even more fun or hilarious ! 200$ anyone ?Anyhow, it's approved here. Even my wife had a good time ! The last part is maybe a bit more ¬´ predictable ¬ª but it does have enough twists to be satisfying.. Really found this movie clever and entertaining !Felicitations, congratulations. Bravo.Made my week.

title: Very (100 times) bad
text: Worst movie ever. Full of illogical events. I wonder if director thinks audience are stupid. People will stop watching movies if they see more of these. I would recommend not to watch. Instead go for walk in a park nearby.

title: Bullet Train
text: Bullet Train is action soaked puzzle comedy, where bit by bit you get more of interwoven stories, and it all comes together exceptionally. I don't typically watch action movies as they tend to be a bit monotonous. But Bullet Train never felt at any point boring to me. It has flaws no doubt, but man it was a good time.Being directed by the guy from the John Wick (uncredited), Deadpool, Hobbs and Shaw, you know you're gonna get good action. And it delivered. Action was satisfying, punchy and bold. However the finale got noticeably sloppy, especially the sword fighting scenes felt unrefined. Besides that I loved the visuals, it's out there, it's fun, it's humor. Also It's very...very stylized. But the movie has already been framed as a movie that doesn't take itself seriously, so it kind of ends up working. It's weird, quirky and goofy. Special shoutout to the editing and creative visuals. But man, the movie is so snappy I though it was made by Baz Luhrmann. The creativity though, like the bottle scene, so many moments to enjoy.All whilst it's surrounded by a story that keeps it's mysteries until the end. The story is fun, not incredibly smart but it keeps you in the unknown enough to make the future unpredictable. To it's fault sometimes, some characters come outta nowhere and it can switch between some scenes a bit too fast. The dialog between action scenes is a key feature of this film, and it's a risk considering it could work out poorly, and feel clich√© or ruin the pace. But the pacing and the method they use to get the scenes going again are fantastic, it's always ends up working out. The sparkling water bottle scene was great and has a particular tiny detail that makes it even better, getting a glass bottle instead of plastic.Writing, good writing, witty and quirky. Not all the humor worked but a lot of it did, and it's rare for me to laugh out loud but this got me a couple times. Also pretty rare for a mainly action oriented movie to do that. Writing is smart though, there's a ton of references pointing towards future events and so much more. Some more obvious than others, obvious one being the body armor joke. That said you notice the writing felt finished and thoroughly connected.Acting and characters, everyone was good here, Pitt with his character was nice. But he wasn't the main part of the show. It really is split between the 3 main characters. Ladybug, Lemon and Tangerine. Lemon and Tangerine were fantastic, hard to get sick of the British banter. Regarding casting though, I felt that the White Death was miscast, though it might also just be that that whole character arc was kind of meh, and the whole movie was building up to that character, so it had big shoes to fill. I just expected a bit more of a visceral performance, like over the top visceral, fitting with the movie.Music is used plenty, every action scene the volume goes bananas. But the songs or score isn't very memorable. The music aspect is not what you'll remember, the action and dialog within those actions scenes you will.If you're in for a fun, goofy action movie, with still brutal kills then this is the one. It's a action movie worth seeing, and that's a lot these days. Instead of the monotonous sludge that are Statham and the Rock action movies.

title: So Good!
text: This is a movie you shouldn't take seriously. Any negative reviews are people who don't know how to take a joke or don't like funny movies. It's a feel good movie with lots of violence. Lol!! This movie kept me on my toes and I never knew what was going to happen next. The acting was top tier!! Brad Pitt was excellent and my favorite character was Lemon, played by Brian Tyree Henry. His witty and sarcastic comments kept me laughing!! The movie as a whole kept me laughing and the ending is superb!! Every story seemed to be connected and I loved how it all came together!! Do yourself a favor and watch this movie!!

title: A pearl of blood and comedy
text: I must say, this movie is just awesome. It is the type of movie that starts slow, with a huge range of pieces to be putted together, and you see, right in front of you, the puzzle being completed.I loved the small details, the jokes, even the acid ones, are excellent and made with care and precision. The visuals are stunning I must say, just a small CGI scene that is a bit ridiculous (but I was too distracted laughing while watching it).Oh, let's not forget the fights and the blood effects: awesome. I really loved to see the visuals in terms of fighting, the choreographies were really good, with the right amount of "overkill" and plasticity, nothing too much exaggerated.Brad Pitt delivers a great performance, that you really feel that he putted his core into it, the master itself with some small details of Inglorious Bastards, Fury and the charm of his character in Troy and also in Ocean's Twelve.One last detail: the heavy content of the movie (violent in general) are very well-balanced, indeed not a movie for kids, but a great movie to watch with the family if you have adults/teens at home.

title: It wants to be Tarantino cool... but it ain't
text: Wow, this film is too long and really a waste of time. About 45 minutes in, I didn't care what was going to happen. It wants to be like Kill Bill or Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels but it's mot even close. The ending was good but the rest was watered down trash. Wait until in on one of the 400 HBO channels.

title: That is just awesome movie
text: Just go and watch it... i dont get it why rating is 7.5 now but that is so wrong.The idea is amazing and when you have the dorector of John Wick.... its just fun movie to watch.

title: Thoroughly enjoyed Bullet Train
text: I was interested in this movie since I was the trailers, so finally I get to see the full movie. I very much enjoyed it. The movie was faced pace with a lot of subtle humor that really works. Its an action movie with a healthy dose of comedy which I think is the perfect mix. I went to the movies for a few hours to just relax and enjoy myself and not take things so serious and this movie was just right. The story slowly unfolds, and the cast is great, especially the "twins." Brad Pitt is really good in this one as well.

title: Don't Believe the Critics - Fun Movie!
text: Loved the trailer. Couldn't wait to see the movie. I was very disappointed when I started reading the reviews, though. Saw the movie anyway and I'm so glad I did. It was fun from beginning to end. Don't believe the critics and just go.

title: fun
text: It was a real fun until the last moments when I saw Sandra Bullock with her mask and artificial voice which was like a bucket of cold water.(I need to write more although I don't want to, which makes me think of all those reviews that do have only one line.)What is more, I liked Brad Pitt in this comediean role although I usually thought he is overestimated. I agree that there were several implausible scenes, but it is just a movie which should entertain us and this film really fulfilled its role.On the other hand, the film was really well done. We are staritng to be on another level and it is really very difficult to make a good comedy which will satisfy everybody.

title: Much better than the critics reviews say.
text: I have avoided watching Bullet Train because of terrible reviews. However, on the recommendation of a friend, I thought I'd give it a chance. My husband gave it a thumbs up as soon as we finished watching the trailer. So we proceeded to watch the film with me expecting heavy action and not much else but that wasn't the case at all. Those low expectations were completely smashed. It was thoroughly entertaining from start to end. The casting was top notch with brilliant performances all 'round. Brad Pitt was in top form with the supporting cast matching him every step of the way.There's not a dull moment in the film. It is very funny! So. Get your popcorn and favourite bevvy and settle in for some rollicking fun.

title: Every now and then a perfect movies comes around
text: This is one of them.Great humor that isn't cheesy. Awesome action scenes with some clever fighting. Everything ties together so nicely.The minimum required characters for reviews on here is Way too high. It's like when you have to write a paper for school and there's a minimum amount of pages required, so instead of making a clear and concise point, you have to surround it with fluff, filling the pages with useless words that are both not fun to write, and not fun to read. Basically it's a useless construct that is purely there just to waste everyone's time. By the end of the paper even the fluff gets so thin that there's no point at all in reading it.

title: Have I seen this before?
text: Why did I watch this movie? Brad Pitt. But he wasn't even that good! He's pretty cool but he rambles and jokes too much. It's a bit funny at times but the whole movie is too silly. Yes, it's a comedy, but they do have a pretty serious 9-5 job.But did I expect a film with substance? No, and that's not what the movie tries to be either. It's a silly movie that tries to entertain the audience. And yes, sometimes I breathed out through my nose because some scenes were kind of funny, but mostly the humor is bad. Way too many Thomas the Tank Engine jokes. That's not funny! That's enough!The film was nicely filmed, but it had bad special effects. It was below all criticism and ruined my (already pretty bad) experience. If Reynolds or The Rock had played the main role, the film would have had minus points, but Brad Pitt is cool and carries.I have already seen this movie several times before. It's just like any other mediocre action comedy that Hollywood has produced in recent years. Always the same humor, poor use of greenscreen, and one-dimensional characters. Couldn't care less about any character.In conclusion, I think the film is mediocre at best and there are so many better films to be made. This movie and Marvel need to learn that it's so easy to tell when it's CGI or not. It does not look good! More practical! Thank you.

title: Amazing
text: During the 2 hours the movie never ceased to amaze. You need to advance more and more because it is full of mysteries.The film has many incredible actors who play their role very well. Many of my favorite actors in one movie, it's incredible. That is one of the reasons why I would recommend this movie.If you like action and a good plot, you chose the perfect movie to watch.There is friendship, betrayal, jealousy, love and the white death.It's one of those movies where a simple action can change everythingEven at the end, the movie still surprises you. You have to see it, it's worth it.

title: Refreshing
text: It was an enjoyable ride, for sure. Loved Brad Ptt in his role! Although not a huge Brad Pitt fan, I found myself wondering if there was anybody else that could have pulled off this role as well as he did. Lemon and Tangerine were very entertaining as well. The duo was well cast and well played by both actors. If there was a Bullet Train 2, they would be tough to replace as a duo.Bullet Train made me think of when Pulp Fiction made its debut...also refreshing in its time.The brutality was plentiful and almost hard to take but done in an almost comedic way, kind of like in The Kingsman. This took the edge off it being distasteful and being taken too seriously, in my opinion.It was a pleasant surprise to see Sandra Bullock towards the end. There wasn't enough of her in this show. She's always a pleasure and easy to watch.Well done all.

title: Must be paid reviews
text:
I wanted to love this. Love the Pitt... Good cast... Good setting. Don't get me wrong there is some Guy Ritchie n Tarrantino eque dialogue.... There is also some good potential action sequences... But ultimately it feels like Ritchie n Tino were asleep on a diesel train ü§£ü§£ü§£
Look... It's not a dreadful film its just not good and I regret paying to see it. But what I'm most annoyed at is the clearly false reviews ... So I would have given this 6 stars but to redress the balance of clearly false reviews ....wait til it's free .... Go watch once upon a time in the west .......take care .......wbwg ..

title: Two Hours of Pure Entertainment
text: If you know the kind of movie you are walking into, I think you'll be satisfied. Bullet Train is all about taking a concept and having fun with it. The style is pretty Tarantino-esque, which could determine the reaction of certain movie goers. While I personally find the movie clever, I don't think you'll find anything mind blowing or substantial enough to make you think. This movie has one goal, to entertain, and according to my experience, it delivered. Brad Pitt is a joy to watch and I would look forward to more roles similar to this one. I would say that everyone plays their part well, although may come across as too over the top for some. Bullet Train I think is worth a watch if you are looking for something fun to spend two hours of your day. Final verdict: 8/10.

title: Unexpectedly one of the funniest movies of 2022!
text: Honestly wasn't expecting much when I went to see it but it immediately captured my attention! I loved how all the characters were completely different and still made it work to create this chaotic, gen-z humour infused movie. It was interesting to see the plot constantly changing in a train, which is such a limited space to work with and it didn't seem messy or improvised. I was constantly trying to figure out what these characters had in common and why they were on the train in the first place and in the end couldn't have been more wrong. The plot twists were surprising and unexpected, yet they still made sense. All in all, great movie which I recommend!

title: It's just FUN!!
text: If you want a good laugh, and a healthy dose of ridiculous gore, please go see this. It's so incredibly well written: the dialogue is brilliant. Touches on a lot of social issues in a really great way.

title: Another overdone, braindead bad action movie
text: These movies are made because of fast-paced, non-stop video content platforms. They imitate the feeling those provide to kids to try to appeal to larger crowds. That's why we're ending up with empty shells of movies like this one.The scenario is as simple as it gets. Every character's personality is a caricature in its own style, exaggerated in its traits, while lacking any sort of depth. They end up coming off uninteresting, shallow and idiotic. Everything here relies on quick paced snapshots of an action-oriented movie put together to overflow you with shiny images and noises, so you don't have time to think of how lamentable this trash really is until it's too late for a refund. A little "comedy" is used to try to justify the lack of depth, in a miserable attempt to avoid any responsibility in this disaster.I can guarantee you that nobody here will ever watch this garbage twice in his lifetime, even the ones leaving positive reviews. We stopped watching after 30 mins of agony. You'd think they'd learned their lesson with The Grey Man.... Avoid at all cost.

title: A Solid 7.5 Popcorn Action Comedy Filled With Hyper-violence And Humor
text: As long as you enjoy well choreographed hand to hand combat, comedic-type violence, you will get your money's worth with this movie.I enjoyed it. I LOL'd several times in the theater. I enjoyed the storylines the script provided and the timing of all the jokes. It's cgi'd and silly but that's why you're there in the theater.Bullet Train does what it does exceptionally well. It is rewatchable and will probably garner a sequel.If you're paying the price of admission to a movie called Bullet Train, you know exactly what you're getting and you will get it in rapid succession at breakneck speed.

title: A crazy adrenaline ride with a cast of interesting characters
text: I thought I was reviewing a Guy Ritchie film. Great ensemble cast, check. Witty dialogue and a interconnected web of characters, check. Excellent transition from one point of view to the next.Exposition isn't in your face (although it could feel extremely fast paced) and character motivations make sense. The action was fun af as you see Brad Pitt uses just about anything in the train to fight against a variety of opponents.What really makes the film work is the interactions between these archetypal characters. It definitely reminds me of the old heist movies Guy Ritchie is so fond of making. One can easily point out plot conveniences/holes but that's really the whole point of the movie. We want to see quirky interactions and crazy turn of events.And the action, damn the action was exhilarating! I love sword fight scenes and you're gonna get it here. No weird and confusing shaky cams and you get to see blood splashes in all its glory. Lots of Jackie Chan-esque fight scenes requiring random environmental items and the camera work is on point.This is one of the funnest movies I've seen this year. Easily recommended for all action fans and I'll definitely watch it again once it's out for streaming.

title: Best Film on Netflix Ever!!!
text: "Bullet Train" on Netflix. Could be the best 2 hours spent watching Netflix EVER! Not just because of Brad Pitt who, by the way, totally rocks this performance, but because of everything about this film. First let me just say that I believe Pitt is a better actor now than he's ever been, he's more relaxed in his older years. I've always thought he was a very good performer, I just feel he's grown. The film: The entire cast is perfectly matched, the action, the cinematography, the insane yet hilarious violence and the over-the-top craziness of the plot -- just all of it blends into a roller-coaster ride that we didn't want to end. I highly recommend turning off your phone, tucking the kids in bed, suspending your disbelief and watching this film ASAP. You're welcome!!!

title: wth
text: MInd numbing obnoxiousness. Borrowed themes from Pulp Fiction, Grosse Pointe Blank. The sound effects when people were killed...Tarantino. 15 seconds or less scenes for the generation who has the attention span of a gnat. All poor substitutes for storytelling. When I start watching a movie, even if I don't like it I will stick it out until the end. This made me say ciao 20 minutes in. 20 minutes I'll never get back. 20 minutes where I could have done something more entertaining like watching toxic Gordon Ramsay.
