When movies like this get made, it prevents 2, 3, 4 real movies from getting made.....

title: Great paced Train loses It's speed at the finish line.
text: It's going to get weird it's going to get wacky the dialogue is fast and the action even fasterIt's speed at the finish line. The whole thing was moving as quickly as the train . Quality dialogue within the interactions amazingly choreographed fight scenes with strong moments of humour thrown in to lighten the heavy load. The movie moves like a snatch or smoking aces with the style similar to the directors previous offering of the John Wick trilogy. Really enjoyable well-made stayed too long at the end dragging out of the finish, did not help the film strong pace It started at , should have stayed til the end, probably work better at 90 to 100 minutes. Overall easy enjoyable shoot em up with an excellent cast.

title: So much fun!
text: To be honest from now on I will not take some people's critics serious. Because of them I really believed that movie wasn't good. But BAM! It's super fun like a Tarantino movie! I loved it! Brad Pitt is such a genious! As he aged he became more and more beautiful and he is an excellent actor He proved that once more! Other actors were also really good. The twins were so cool! Reminded me of John Travolta and Samuel Jackson duo in Pulp fiction. Dialogues were so intelligent and fun. Such a beatiful story line. Also we get to see all the details of a famous Bullet Train of Japan. Man I really can watch it again soon!

title: What a stylish hell of a ride..
text: I haven't seen a more entertaining movie in a long while. Bullet train is a truly unique and stylish piece of art with lots of twist and turns, while keeping a great balance between action, thriller and comedy.Couldn't stop laughing about Brad Pitt's character and his comic comments. And boy, was I wrong when initially assuming that he'd do most of the heavy-lifting. All in all I found most actors did a really great job.However, the most interesting thing for me was seeing David Leitch climbing up the ranks and approaching the circle of world class directors around the Coen Brothers, Quentin Tarantino or Martin Scorsese. Having directed John Wick, Atomic Blonde and Deadpool 2, Bullet Train is a remarkable addition to his cinematic portfolio...

title: Loved it
text: Who gives this movie less than a 5 star rating? Honestly.This movie was excellent. Very funny, and entertaining. Don't believe the bad reviews and watch it. You won't be disappointed.The cast is fantastic, and the story is exciting as well as creative.Is it a little overboard? Absolutely. But that is what makes it so good.People calling it a "wannabe Tarantino movie"...just stop it. The movie was good and you're a hater.My suggestion is: sit down, be happy, watch the movie and enjoy. It is one of the more entertaining movies I have watched as of lately. I honestly don't understand why people would rate it low.

title: This is based in Japan with some Americans
text: This was very reminiscent of Kill Bill action extreme paced type action. It fooled me, Saw brad Pitt and thought Major American movie, I was sadly mistaken. There is heavy foreign dialouge which of course the movie cover had no Japanese clues to tell you of such. It was predictable. Save your money for a real american movie with drama. I always Like Brad Pitt, but this was a disappointing film. I was expecting a blockbuster, no messaging, just a good story like thelma & Louis which Brad starred in too, Wow he has sunk low. Maybe in the coming years American filmmaking becomes about the story in America.

title: An entertaining rollercoaster of a movie
text: I did not expect this movie to be as good as it was. The plot was intriguing all throughout, and the plot twists consistently kept you on your feet. The acting and the chemistry between actors was all stellar and elevated some scenes even further. The visuals were beautiful and the score was perfect for a movie like this.

title: One of the Most Fun Movies of the Year
text: Bullet Train was a fantastic experience, and by now I have to consider myself a devoted Leitch fan. I didn't particularly enjoy Hobbs & Shaw, but John Wick, Atomic Blonde, Deadpool 2, and now this have all been spectacular action movies full of both style and substance. He's also developing a deft hand at merging comedy with action to create movies that are just outright fun. Bullet Train is no exception. This a surprisingly clever movie full of foreshadowing, interconnected storylines, and the pervading theme of fate driving every character, while also giving us exquisite action sequences, meaningful character moments, and some truly laugh-out-loud comedy. If you're looking for a good time at the movies, it doesn't get much better than this. I give Bullet Train an unequivocal 8/10, but honestly I could easily push for a 9. Definitely one of the best movies of the year. Bring on The Fall Guy next, even though I know nothing about it.QyrosMovies.

title: A Top-Notch Cast
text: I loved Bullet Train just by the trailer. It was everything I was looking for after watching 365 Days: This Day. By everything, I mean not complete garbage. But I honestly was excited about watching this film. It has a cast of actors who I recognize by name. Brad Pitt, Joey King, and Bad Bunny are the big ones. It also just looked like lots of fun. And it was lots of fun; one of the most entertaining films of the year.Nearly every aspect of this film is done well. The set design is incredible. The cars of the train are simple yet complex. Each one has a different element of the story. The characters are also beyond entertaining. I knew Brad Pitt would be good; he is in all his roles. I never expected the rest of this cast to be this enjoyable. The chemistry and comedy from Lemon and Tangerine are perfect for this film. I wish a sequel starring the two of them on their adventures could be made. Joey King also deserves praise for her role as the Prince. She can turn from an innocent schoolgirl to an assassin so strangely well. It's hard to find something about this film that I disliked. Even though the film is levels of insanity, it all works so well that the film is perfect. It is one of my favorite action films released in the past couple of years. It's not going to win any awards, but It will also be remembered fondly by me.10/10 Action-Comedy at its peak. Absurd, beautiful, silly, perfect.

title: A Chaotic good time
text: After seeing this movie a second time I think it's finally time for me to write a review. This is one of my top three best movies I have seen this year, the fighting and comedic timing are so good, and this movie and somehow the fights never seem repetitive even though they all take place within a train. The cast, don't get me started on the cast. All of them are so good and play their roles to near perfection, Brad Pitt seems perfect in this role and never misses and beats. The surprise cameos in this movie are also a lot of fun and most of these charters I wish I could invite to the bar for a pint.Overall this movie is a lot of fun, and a great way to wrap up the relatively dry movie summer. This movie makes me appreciate fun, silly, action movies that I once thought were impossible to make. Get off your couch and go watch it now!

title: funny, well made, well acted, just fun
text: Saw this lastnight at the cinema, for a tuesday night it was actually pretty full and the weekend showings were sold out still!!! Anyway, its a very silly, fun, funny movie lots of jokes - will probably need a 2nd watch to get them all, along with a few cameo'snot a more to add really, we really enjoyed it, a couple of hours os escapism.The only criticism I would give is Karen Fukuhara appears quite it a bit in the publicity but has a very tiny role (blink and you miss her) would have been nice if she'd had a bigger rolenow repeat for the min lenghtSaw this lastnight at the cinema, for a tuesday night it was actually pretty full and the weekend showings were sold out still!!! Anyway, its a very silly, fun, funny movie lots of jokes - will probably need a 2nd watch to get them all, along with a few cameo'snot a more to add really, we really enjoyed it, a couple of hours os escapism.The only criticism I would give is Karen Fukuhara appears quite it a bit in the publicity but has a very tiny role (blink and you miss her) would have been nice if she'd had a bigger role.

title: A bloody light romp
text: I have watched this twice now, once in the theatre and once at home and it's just as good the second time. Take the movie for what it is and I can't see why you wouldn't enjoy it. But only if you want to have fun.From the cameos to the main actors, everyone on screen has a rule to play and plays it well, if not amazingly. One of my favorites, Sanada, adds gravitas, while the twins, who are new to me, add great humour. The parade of hitmen and hit women provide enjoyable filler that's not really filler in the end. And the reveal of White Death himself brings a smile to my face.Do yourself a favor, and watch Bullet Train.

title: Entertaining
text: If you like Deadpool type of action scenes, you will love this one! Doesn't matter if the action in the movie happened in a train, the movie delivers some cool action scenes, very decent special effects, humor is not overused it's just the exact amount of, some brutal scenes, blood and gore, high octane. It is entertaining and not one minute of boring! :)

title: CHAOTIC!!!
text: The essence of the film is very mainstream that doesn't make it cliche its an amazing movie with a fast paced chaotic story. The movie is very colourful which takes its dark theme of blood and violence gives it a unique funny and entertaining taste and the fast paced story filled with plot twists also makes it worthwhile.It may not be a arstisic film i got to say that for me this really is great and i don't understand why it has so bad crictic ratings i think that this is one of the best action movie that came out this year and even if you are little bit into action and gore you give this a try it will definetly be worthwhile.

title: Terrible , save your money
text: Starts out slow and then goes down hill. Boring! Writer .director and stars collect their money. Only saving feature was I had AMC A-lst .So I didn't pay.

title: Funny, Dramatic, and Bursting with Action
text: The critic in me would probably rate this a 9 or so but after reading other critic and fan reviews it made me love this ever more. I'm not sure what some people were expecting out of this movie as if it's supposed to be some serious pretentious Oscar award bait. It's an action movie with seriously good dialogue, acting, comedy, and maybe because of all that people forgot what this movie was trying to achieve when the action sequences took place.The acting was performances were stellar - Lemon (Brian Henry) and Tangerine (Taylor-Johnson) were the highlights of this but Ladybug (Pitt) had great moments as well. The story was actually fantastic for an action movie. Fantastic dialogue, comedy moments, and twists. I came into this with lukewarm expectations but I was blown away.

title: If Guy Ritchie and John Wick had a baby
text: This movie was such a blast! My wife and I went to see it with my dad and boy am we glad I did. Best time I have had at the movies outside of the new Top Gun (I see everything at my local theater). The two hour run time went by in a blink. We all found ourselves laughing and smiling through the whole thing. As stated in the title of the post, if you like the bone crushing action of John Wick and the wit and quick editing style of Guy Ritchie films this is definitely the movie for you. Luckily my wife, Dad and I love both of those things so we were more than satisfied. Grab the popcorn and enjoy the entertainment!

title: No Pitt Stops for this Train
text: Bullet Train starts off like a Guy Ritchie tirbute movie, with a bunch of characters of varying degrees of moral dubiness sharing screen time and firing out witty dialogue. Over the course of the next two hours dead bodies rack up whike things escalate to a massively OTT finale.Brad Pitt leads the ensemble cast as newly peace loving former assassin "Lady Bird", looking to ease his way back to work with a simple pick up job. Unfortunately for him the train he boards is full of other dangerous types whose motivations we learn about via flashbacks all of who are entertaining and played well. Amongst others there's a father looking for payback on the person who pushed his son off a roof, a violence loving cartel killer and a scheming young women with big plans. Special shout out to Brian Tyree Henry and Aaron Taylor-Johnson as likeable cockney hitmen Lemon and Tangerine. Pitt himself is effortlessly cool, managing to portrey his bad luck magnet (according to himself anyway) fixer for hire as simultaneously out of his depth and above it all.There really isn't much to dislike about Bullet Train, its slick, well paced and acted with an interesting bunch of characters and fun cameos. If you have even a passing interest in this type of movie you are in for a good time, with the caveat that you need to be ready for a transition from low key action mystery to a ridiculous "how did anyone survive that" finale.

title: Loved It!
text:
Fast paced movie that brings out the "hippie" type Pitt and Sandra as "the voice" I loved it 10/10 even googled bullet trains to see just how fast they really are going! Good casting for the characters also they all did a great job! The story was good and well written.Twists & turns it's a great watch!Even with CGI it was fairly believable, loved the gore, the story it was well worth the $6.99 rental fee on the streaming platform. It's a movie that is good to watch on a night in & wanting a laugh with a few "OMG" moments. Get the popcorn out
Great humour like lost city well done cast and crew.

title: Not very good at all
text: Brad Pitt usually delivers but this was a complete mess and poorly delivered and timed humor. Acting all around just wasn't that great and everything felt forced.

title: Most Mis-marketed Film of All Time
text: Quentin Tarantino meets Guy Ritchie! My daughter forced me to watch this, and this film delivered a pleasant surprise. I was hooked after 10 mins when Tangerine and Lemon appeared (wonderful actors with great chemistry and screen presence). Hilarious, action-packed thrill ride. I had given-up on modern cinema, as most films have to include a superhero. Fun popcorn movie. Great quirky characters, and this film never takes itself too seriously. Lots of fabulous cameos (a certain 21 Jump Street lead provides great laughs), and Brad Pitt is superb. I swear, if he wasn't such a "heart throb," people would appreciate Pitt is one of the most reliable and entertaining stars of our time. Invest the time to watch this hidden gem.

title: It's just pure FUN.
text: I love movies like this. Is this the best movie I have ever seen? No. Is it a terrific movie that I thoroughly enjoyed and would probably watch again just to catch everything I missed the first time? YES.I love the bold and in your face cinematography- it keeps it visually interesting the entire time. The storyline is also extremely intriguing. Though it keeps you guessing at the beginning, it reveals connections and pieces throughout that then make earlier scenes make more sense. Almost like a whodunnit mystery, except the "who" is whoever gathered them all in one place: the bullet train.Some of the characters were like caricatures, but this made the storyline more enjoyable. Highly recommend giving it a watch if you're in the mood for two hours of action, comedy, surprised at every turn, and just pure FUN.

title: Mindless Fun
text: If you took the scripts for Pulp Fiction, Kill Bill, Smoking Aces, and Red Rock West (a bit obscure, I know) and shredded them, then threw them in the air, caught what pieces you could and taped them together, you'd have the plot for Bullet Train. That is NOT a criticism. The movie works BECAUSE its so disconnected and chaotic and uses the best elements from those films in a slam bang action film with the right amount of humor, gore and violence. The only thing missing is gratuitous nudity.Five assassins are on board a speeding train in Japan. They have been brought aboard via different machinations. Brad Pitt is Ladybug, a contract agent who is hired to retrieve a briefcase full of ransom money on a speeding train in Japan. He gets the job because the original agent was sick (this becomes a fun cameo at the end of the film). There are two hit men "brothers" Lemon (Brian Tyree Henry) and Tangerine (Aaron Taylor-Johnson), hired to rescue the son (Logan Lerman) of a mafia chief as well as the briefcase of money. Then there is Prince (Joey King) a young woman who keeps getting mistaken for an innocent girl. A Mexican assassin named The Wolf (Bad Bunny). Another assassin named The Hornet (Zazie Beetz) who uses a very poisonous snake venom as her weapon of choice. The mafioso chief known as the White Death (Michael Shannon) is more concerned about the money than his son. Also on the train is a father, Kimura (Andrew Koji), whose son was pushed off a building by one of the characters and he is seeking revenge. HIS father, known simply as The Elder (Hiroyuki Sanada) also boards the train as he has a connection to the plot that gets revealed late in the movie. Even Saundra Bullock shows up as Ladybugs handler (while she doesn't actually appear on screen until the end, this is not a spoiler since she is in the trailers) There is even a M-F snake on this M-F train. I fully expected Samuel Jackson to show up...he doesn't.This movie works because it is well-written, superbly acted and each character is given a decent backstory to make them interesting. The movie flashes back to the reason each one is on the train the way Kill Bill did with its characters' backstories. Ladybug is a low level agent who just does "snatch and grab" jobs and despises guns. He is trying to recover from some trauma and spends a lot of the movie incorrectly espousing self-help missives. He keeps trying to get off the train at each stop, but something always prevents it (ala Red Rock West). Lemon and Tangerine bicker and banter about inane things like Vincent and Jules in Pulp Fiction, despite the dawning realization of the enormity of the situation they are in. Prince is a conniving lady who is manipulating the events in the plot for her own personal reasons. The Wolf's wife was murdered during their wedding and he thinks it was Ladybug. The father and grandfather are both seeking revenge, but for different reasons. The Hornet is probably the least developed assassin, but she is so well played by Ms. Beetz that you kind of forget that. Her and Ladybug have a fight that is both funny, touching and fiery. Even the small role of the conductor is well used and adds to the plot.All the characters interact with one another in some way or other. That's the best part of the movie. Each thinks, wrongly, the other characters are their enemy and they spend most of the movie beating each other up, not even really knowing why. The action is non-stop, the dialogue is very funny and the plot keeps moving along and isn't that complicated to follow. By no means is this as original as Pulp Fiction or Kill Bill, but you can see Tarantino's DNA all over this movie. It entertains and makes you laugh while all the blood is flying around on screen. The two hours went by fast and I was very disappointed when it was over.

title: Why under rate?
text: The movie is just state of the art. Action, events linking, humour and lots of humour. Acting was great too. I enjoyed every minute. Never felt bored for one second. The ending was amazing... Each time you feel that's it, another ending part shows up funnier than the previous. Best line in the movie was: Lady, eat a pack of d#$#$s ,üòÅ

title: Not Enough Style Can Save This Mediocre Film
text: BULLET TRAIN (C+) stars Brad Pitt as a laid-back bad guy for hire trying to do an easy job on a bullet train in Japan, but gets caught up in a grander crime story. The film lives and dies on its style and tone which is essentially a Guy Ritchie crime comedy combined with Tarantino's Kill Bill and mixed in a blender. Unfortunately, it's all hit and miss here. Sometimes the stylistic choices work (some of the fights are decent and there's some jokes that land), at other times it just feels like a desperate and shallow imitation. Pitt mostly works here with his laid back demeanor, but he's a bit too one note and the movie becomes far too a big an ensemble feature for it to coast on him alone. The ambitions to take this from an interesting crime story of intersecting lines and stylish fights to an all-out epic sage drenched in style opining on fate and ending with a cataclysmic train crash undercuts it all and turns it into a really dumb and trying movie at times. It's just not stylish, smart, or good enough to be anything more than a passing entertainment. Disappointing given the talent involved here.

title: Very Entertaining and ecstatically pleasing
text: I wouldn't go as far as to say Tarantino or Richie even though it definitely has their vibes and core building blocks. It feels like it wants to be compared with them which comes across a bit forced at the beginning. It doesn't come close to their level but it is a good movie non the less.Very particular criminal underground characters with interesting quirks. A couple of nice twists and a flashy presentation.Starts a bit cliche trying too hard but at the end you forgot all about that feeling and ends up being a blast.I wen in with low expectations but was pleasantly surprised.Would love to see the surviving cast come back on a sequel to this.

title: I ended up appreciating it by the end!
text: There were times during this movie when its style got kind of tiresome and when the plot got more complex than it needed to be with all of the different agents/assassins. It also didn't have to be over two hours long. Nevertheless, it's undoubtedly an entertaining movie and very well directed, especially with the action scenes. Brad Pitt shines as always with his performances, as well as Brian Tyree Henry and the hot and sexy Joey King who is new! It even felt very Tarantino-like and the humor worked for the most part too! I'm glad I kept watching it, since the cameos at the end were fun as well!

title: Stylish fun
text: Is it chaotic and all over they place? Yes. But is it stylish fast-paced action fun? Also yes. I came in with low expectations but was surprised by how much I actually enjoyed it. The flight scenes were entertaining and everything was set to a great soundtrack. If I had to give any critique the ending did come together a bit cliched and over the top. I am not going to hold it against them though. I loved all the characters, their unique stories but also with their banter. I especially enjoyed the twins. Honestly, if they ever got a prequel or something, I would totally watch that too.Also, as a big sister that had a brother OBSESSED with Thomas, all the show references and calling people a Diesel struck a cord way too hard. üòÇ

title: A phenomenal fun ride!
text: Now this is what a call a FUN ROMP! I always get so annoyed when that term gets used for boring, uninspired schlop like "Solo: A Star Wars Story".This is what I expect when a movie is called a fun romp. Creativity, zany characters and a great sense of humour and irony. Not to mention great fight choreography and cinematography. Fight scenes shot with longer takes and wider angle, so you can actually see what's happening.Brad Pitt is at his "Burn Without Reading" best, playing a man who's just trying to make it through a difficult day. Joey King is also great a Japanese schoolgirl uniform wearing femme fatale. After this and the princess, she's looking like a great movie action star.See this, without delay, it's a great time!

title: i switched off
text: Well that was yet another waste of two hours of my time . This movie was a cross between a poor Guy Ritchie movie ( take your pick) and a Tarantino rejected screenplay. The writers seem to think that their dialogue is so witty but actually none of their 'cleverness' really hits the target. Its all style but no substance.Theres plenty of 'violence-in-a-confined-space' as you would expect from fighting in a high speed train but as with John Wick movies it all ends like an x-rated cartoon and the action just blurs from one assault to another.But guess what ? The movie made loads of money ! People just love this stuff ....go figure.

title: It's a train ride, literally
text: Go in knowing what to expect and you get want you want. Pitt is funny as hell and it's a nonstop thrill ride. You've seen most of it before but then there's a lot extra. Strap in.

title: Pretty good movie, go and see it
text: The move falls into the over-the-top action comedy genre. And that's one of the best action comedies I've seen since years. I really urge you to go blind when watching the movie.I think all the actors did a great job in this movie. The sound and music were great too. The story was interesting and with a lot of twists, though not very deep. I think the best part of the narrative is how likeable most of the characters are.At the beginning, it's hard to figure out what's going on with the story, I guess that's the reason why some people gave it a low score. But if you stick till the end it all comes together nicely.

title: A Bullet Train You Definitely Want to Ride
text: What a blast! Great script with a captivating storyline. Not a weak link in the entire cast. Engaging from start to finish.My wife and I have extremely differing tastes in cinema, but we both considered this a strong and entertaining film.Having been to Tokyo several times, compliments of Uncle Sam and the U. S.-Japan Alliance for defense, I'm more motivated than ever to return to the amazing Land of the Rising Sun. I'll even jump on one of those spectacular trains, confident they can take an unimaginable beating while still keeping the lives of the passengers safe.Bullet Train did a great job of skillfully weaving together a myriad of plotlines. No small challenge with so many characters who the audience become invested in. Oh, and I rarely mention soundtracks, but this one is particularly good.

title: Zoran
text: Absolutely rubbish, stupid, worthless. I think that actors are so desperate to earn some money and taking any opportunity, even they know that movie is septic hole. Some people think that load of "blood", shooting and some kind of "fighting" plus stupid and nonsense dialogue make movie interesting. First, plot is so confusing, idiotic and absolutely necessary comparing dialogues, situations which are without reasons just there. Assassins knows each other from who knows where, passengers don't pay attention to actions around them, speed of bullet train is like walking in a park, unharmed people after horrifying crash, all in one totally mess and pile of rubbish. Better go and spend two hours with your mother-in-law, you can have more fun.

title: Guy Ritchie flavour ( Don't listen to negative reviews)
text: So I watched it today and enjoyed it a lot. Seen these reviews people hating the movie. People must understand what they are going in for. The trailer tells you very clearly its one of those no brainer stupid action movies with some laughs.I don't know what else people were expecting from this movie. Its not John Wick and its not imitating Tarantino as many say but its rather like a Guy Ritchie movie. I enjoyed it a lot because of its stylized action, bloody violence and comedy. All the characters are awesome. The ending have some cheesy CGI but still not that bad. A perfect fun evening movie.

title: This was a totally entertaining movie!
text: Fun, twists, multiple stories, Star power, funny, stylistic violence, action. This movie was so good! Loved it! It is well worth your time. You are trying to figure out how all the stories intersect, and then they do tie together. Brad Pitt was so good and so funny. I also laughed out loud multiple times - but it is more about the story and action with lots of jokes sprinkled in. So I want to submit this but it's making me write 600 characters in order to submit so I'm just trying to get there now to get my review published. I want to help boost the rating on this movie so I'm trying to get this on the record. Why do you have to write so much? What is wrong with two sentences anyway? Brief and to the point.

title: "Bullet Train" is an edge-of-your-seat thrill ride
text: "Bullet Train" is an edge-of-your-seat action thriller with a side of laugh-out-loud comedy. It's the perfect movie to watch when you want to be entertained from beginning to end.No, seriously, this is one of the best action, thriller, comedy movies I've seen in a while. It's got everything you could want in a movie like this: great action, great suspense, and plenty of laughs.The cast is fantastic, and they all bring their A-game to the table. The chemistry between the characters is electric, and you're never quite sure who's going to make it out alive.If you're looking for a pulse-pounding, heart-stopping, laugh-out-loud good time, then "Bullet Train" is the movie for you.I would definitely recommend this movie to anyone.

title: When fate must speak
text: Five assassins accidentally meet each other on a high-speed train in Japan. They have the same mission to get a reward from the same lord, the yakuza leader Death White.An excellent mix of action and comedy films. Bringing the concept of a story where in each conflict each of the characters is interrelated with each other and is on the train. Starting from Ladybug who gets a mission to steal a bag, the father who is looking for someone who has pushed his child from the height of the building, the assassin twins who look after the child of the leader of a criminal organization, the wolf from Mexico who avenges the death of his wife and the White Death who is constantly discussed throughout the film. Likewise, whatever is on the train also has something to do with such as water bottles, snakes and even cartoon characters as well. And it happened, I think it's like a plot twist that's quite surprising and makes you laugh in amazement at seeing who's behind Carver's character.Film is well packaged. The plot of the story and conflict is neatly constructed. Various easter eggs are the key to each character to be introduced in the film. Don't forget also with animpressive and awesome fight. Moreover, it is brought with the concept of character recognition made like a sub plot of the story.

title: Incoherent Mess - A Tarantino Wannabe
text: This is only the second movie I've walked out on in 30+ years of going to movies. It tries too hard to be clever and witty with over-the-top violence. Brad Pitt and Sandra Bullock are wasted in this film. This is the second Sandra Bullock flop this year...not sure what is going on with her? I left after 1 hour because the storyline wasn't going anywhere. This is definitely one of those instances where the trailer was much better than the actual movie. We went home to re-watch Better Call Saul.Not sure how Hollywood can keep churning out subpar material like this and keep profitable? Save your money and watch on streaming!

title: Lock Stock meets Murder on the Orient Express...
text: Meets Snakes on a Plane...In a bizarre, ultra violent, blackly comedic action movie that pays homage to its Japanese location whilst taking subtle digs at aspects of its culture.As previously mentioned it is VERY violent at times, with a creativity in kills beyond the repetitive 'shot to the chest, then double tap to the head' routine of the John Wick films. On occasion the violence adds to the dark comedy.It is the type of film you would have seen Guy Ritchie or Tarantino make back in his prime.Refreshingly different but here's hoping that Hollywood doesn't look at a sequel or a range of wannabe imitation flicks.

title: Fun!
text: Loved the whole movie, had an oldschool Guy Ritchie vibe! Great cast, super fun characters too. Loved Joey King, I'm not a Brit but I would've thought she was. Stylish action and camera work, funny moments (laughed too hard at Channing Tatum) and cool characters. No nonsense fun! 8,5/10.

title: Fun Quirky Thrill Ride with forgettable action
text: The Bullet Train is full of colorful and quirky assassins we haven't seen the likes of since greats like Smokin' Aces and Crank. The setting and tone are wholly original and complimented by a humorous and clever script that doesn't take itself too seriously. Pitt's charm as a lead shines through in every scene he's in amidst a script that is surprisingly well connected despite the appearance of being chaotic. The problem with the film however lies in the discrepancy between its potential and its execution. Based off the trailer and the concept, Bullet Train has all the marking to be in the high 90s but ultimately fails due to its lack of coordinated hand-to-hand action sequences the action sub genre has come to be known for. If you're on a train full of unique assassins, we should expect some unique fights. Unfortunately this is where the movie falls short, as the action is more reminiscent of older, more traditional action films like Die Hard, The Borne movies, transformers etc. Ultimately there is plenty of action, and it's exciting and explosive but it's not artful nor memorable. That for me is what had me leaving Bullet Train feeling it could've been better. 89%

title: This is movie gold!
text: Buy a ticket for this train and enjoy the ride.It's a violent, hilarious tour de force that apparently got up a bunch critic's noses for the reason that they couldn't deal with how much damn fun the caste in this film is having.And as a passenger, you get to enjoy the trip every bit as much as they do.Pitt is phenomenal. No other actor could carry of this role and be likeable and laugh out loud funny. Tom Holland would have been an excruciating bore. But Pitt nails it.

title: Fun to watch for its absurdities
text: As you watch, soon enough you will try to understand not only the story line but also the purpose of the film.It may come across as either funnier enough for you to stay and laugh for its absurdities or frustrated enough for trying to getting sense out of a movie that clearly has no intention to have a deep meaning.For me, it was clear the purpose. Most of criticism came generally from the public who tend not to accept is that such a good cast would be part of a movie that is unlike other productions they might have worked before.What started similar to a Tarantino's movie turned out to be as absurd as Anaconda and Sharknado.So see exactly as it was intended to, else you will be disappointed.

title: Brilliant Chaos
text: John Wick ü§ù DeadpoolWow. I think I speak for a lot of the people in the cinema, wow.I can sometimes find myself checking the time during films to see how long is left when I have lost interest in what I'm watching. This was not the case.David Leitch has done a wonderful job with this one. A really entertaining and often humorous film. The style it was shot in was fantastic - the colour palette was *chefs kiss*.Whilst all the characters were superb, it has to be mentioned how standout Brian Tyree Henry and Aaron Taylor-Johnson were as Lemon and Tangerine! I'd love to see a spin-off with these two involved.I highly recommend going to see this film as many times as possible.

title: Very enjoyable and fun
text: It's a good film without many quirks and bad parts. At times reminds me of guy ritchie + anime + complete chaos. It doesn't have much of banal hollywood tropes and "the message" which is always a good thing. Brad pitt plays a character that is lovably annoying and plays him well. The visual effects and soundtrack are also great and stylish, while the comedy is very funny, worth your time. Some of the reveals are also part of the comedy, and satirical sort of breaking the fourth wall a lot. But man o man the best part for me is the soundtrack, it's unique and hypes you up. Absolutely watchable film drunk or sober.

title: Talk about a surprise hit!
text: Liked: Brad Pitt shines in this but so does the cast around him.Loved: All the surprises, twists and turns.This movie wasn't on my radar, but positive word of mouth got to me, and I decided to check it out and man am I glad I did! I saw it in Dolby at AMC and the sounds and action sequences were fantastic! This movie works because you have a great cast. They all feed off, support and build off of each other. My crowd was great. Lots of gasps, laughter, and some cheering during this whole thing. It does feel a tad bit long, but I think that had the Director taken something away it would have messed with the flow of the story. There are a lot of surprises that I am not going to reveal because they were fun and carefully inserted into this movie. Great summer theater movie. Definitely should be seen on the big screen and there is kind of a mid-credit scene that wraps up the whole movie nicely. Truly a Great Flick!

title: Too long, way too long and
text: Average at best; also, tries to be funny, but fails. I did learn quite a bit about Thomas the Tank Engine, and Sandra Bullock looks great, but really overall it's a meh for this one. Rating it a 4 might be generous. Easily 30 minutes too long.I saw the trailer for Bullet Train before Top Gun Maverick, thought about seeing it in the theater, now very glad I didn't.....wow, 255 characters to go...what to say??? Don't bother, don't bother, don't bother, don't bother, waste 2 hours o your time some other way. Also, not sure how some folks are rating this a 9 or 10, seriously? Oh well, only 10 more ch.

title: Great remarkable movie
text: You know what. This is one of the best movie of 2022. The Elder katanas fight scene with Japanese remake soundtrack is the best scene with Jonh Wick and Japanese vibes, even better.

title: A FUN RIDING EXPERIENCE
text:
Watched Bullet Train on Netflix and it's an amazing, entertaining, full with all kinds of emotions, good storyline and typical David Leitch (also Directed Deadpool 2) movie....Brad Pitt as Ladybug was fabulous in this movie and adopted such an amazing carefree character which I loved the most... Also Aaron Taylor as Tangerine & Brian Tyree as Lemon nailed it.Other roles like Hornet and Wolf also fit well in story and both actors did well. Loved THE ELDER character too.Songs and BGM are of the soul of this movie. "Stayin Alive" and "500 Miles" song are just love...
Story, Cinematography and VFX are awesome.OVERALL AN AMAZING ENTERTAINING MOVIE WITH UNEXPECTED 2 BIG SPECIAL APPEARANCE IN THE ENDüòÇ(Watch full movie to know that)...

title: Perfect
text: Maybe I was just in the mood. Maybe this movie came at the exact right time for me. Maybe it was actually perfect. All i know is...can't remember the last time I enjoyed anything this much.Every detail meticulously thought out and executed to perfection. Not one wasted minute, or word, or scene.Ironically i waited until now to watch because my initial thought was...how good can yet another movie filmed on a train really be? Sure Brad Pitt and a brilliant cast, but i don't actually know the director and producers from other films...but I'll pay attention from now on.The writing, pacing, direction, effects, humor, action, irony, pathos, philosophy and again...attention to detail...are simply the best I've seen in a long time. And this is the best Brad Pitt has been in many movies.Perfetto.

title: MOVIES LIKE THIS EXIST??
text: I'm gonna be honest and go straight to the point..Bullet train is one of those movies where you call and ask to talk to the director/writer and congratulate them for the amazing work they did with this movie. IT IS PERFECT!

title: I watched this movie and was disappointed
text: There is something about this film that is vacuous. There is a complex plot in this film but it goes nowhere and the ending seems cheap. Kotaro Isaka, the author from whom this story has been adapted has made it big, since book to screen adaptations are where the real money lies.The movie was entertaining to me but only because of the cinematography, and some of the angles of the camera. Brad Pitt seemed finished by Burn After Reading, where I thought his looks would fade. That was in 2008. The fact that he is still being the main man is a surprise to me. I like him enough to go through this movie with a sort of tolerance.The edgy music accompanying action scenes has been done enough for it to lose its primary authenticity, but this way of building up the contents of a film is not so seamless that it becomes a trope of its own. Music and movies do not complement each other, else Indian romance films would be more popular.I did not get into this movie expecting Matrix like action, but it seems weird that the gun fights are so bland here. The highlight of the movie for me was the Reddish Wedding scene. That was cool. The actors give a performance that hints that they are having fun. It is only sad that the actors playing the White Death and his family are so miscast.Overall this movie grew on me, believe it or not. I intended to give it 2, then 3, finally settling on 4 stars. I am now only an honorary moviegoer, but want more good movies like this. Despite the blandness and my rating, this is a movie that is half boredom, half complacency. Its plot, and its concept, and really just the casting of Brad Pitt make it a piece of art that will leave a trace after fading away.

title: INTENSE ACTION
text: This was definitely my kind of movie if you're a fan of the action kind of movies like kill Bill pulp fiction you're really enjoy this one it was funny because of all the goofy assassin names and the fact that the whole movie other than a few small times took place completely on the train other than when they gave backstories on some of the characters Brad Pitt was excellent in this film it was surprising that he made it all the way through the end and at the end you're pretty sure you haven't figured out and then it gives you a nice twist and the ending isn't what you think it was I love too that it was all done in the Tokyo area and finish and Kyoto I hope they would make a part two or something similar.

title: üé´ üõ§üöÜ The bullet train
text: This film bullet train is a humorous action thriller you have hitman you have Tokyo you have a bullet train you have summarize you have ninjas you have 1000 breakfast to Thomas the train you have Brad Pitt humorous and Bring in the fight. Haven't really solid Sprite since the ocean franchises . This action pack movies not just premiere is Brad Pitt but a long side with the top American and Tokyo actor and actresses. Haven't really saw a good train fight scene like this since the Wolverine movie. Another top a.m. Of badging to put in rotation for the weekend holidays or a good game nite film salute.

title: Awesome Movie - Great Fun and Meaning
text: Wow - rarely does a movie hit the mark so well - this is the best action movie since Tarantino did Pulp Fiction - David Leitch should feel proud of this - his best work yet. The script was awesome and the direction tight and extremely well done. There are so many good things about this movie that it is hard to say one part was the best - but I would have to say that the Casting was even better than Pulp Fiction - at least its equal. From Brad Pitt as the 'leaf in the wind' trying to find meaning in life as chaos falls all around him, through to the brief cameo roles played by established stars - the casting was perfect and their timing outstanding. I was also very dubious that whoever was to going to be the main villain could possibly fill the role - it built up through the movie and was the axle around which the whole movie turned - but Michael Shannon was awesome - absolutely perfect. Just Wow.

title: Slapstick
text: Just a plain old slapstick movie, no more no less. Entertaining but merely fitting the genre and enjoyable if ur up for it. I think the plot twist and turns a fairly predictable and the premise that everything happens on a train during a train ride. The movie actually loses sight of the destination of this train which makes it all the more subject to the slapstick genre. English accents and mixing in Japanese mystique and martial arts is merely used as accessories to dress up the story and visuals. At the end of the day this is a slapstick movie with the main character squarely focused on Brad Pitt...

title: Loads of fun
text: If the purpose of a film is to entertain, then this film succeeds outstandingly. It just piles on the fun, with clever twists and turns, interesting characters, never taking itself too seriously but not descending into lampoonery.The cast looked like they had a blast making this film. Some of the cameos are great. And yes, the plot has some train sized holes (did you see what I did there?), but who cares when the audience is having this much fun?

title: Excuse me. - You're ******* excused.
text: It's an action picture from David Leitch, a director of Deadpool 2 and John Wick. "Bullet Train" has this macabre and sometimes on the edge humour and lots of action scenes but there is much more to it which sets it aside from a series of typical films in the genre.Setting. Action takes place in Japan, and it creates a special atmosphere and allows for particular peculiarities and twists.Plot. It is based on the 2010 novel Maria Beetle (titled Bullet Train in its UK and US edition) by Kotaro Isaka and it explains why the narrative is so good. Unfortunately, many action movies lack an original and captivating plot, and this picture is the case when it's not only pleasing to watch A-level actors fighting with each other, but you actually want to follow a story flavored with poignant jokes.Cutting. Kudos to cutting specialists who made the movie such a dynamic piece of art. It reminds me of works of Edgar Wright, and if you like them, I think you'd find this one quite amusing.Soundtrack. Main theme is Bee Gees - Stayin' Alive (should I say more?) sets the tone - it's energetic, a bit (okay, a LOT) chaotic and playful.Actors. Although it's not the most important part for many people I can't but admire Brad Pitt, Joey King, and Aaron Taylor-Johnson who became an icing of the cake.To me the movie has become a breath of fresh air and I haven't laughed so hard since the release of the Gentlemen.

title: Exceded my every expectation
text: I went into this, expecting another common action movie but in the end it was really not what I expected . It surprised me in an extremely good way and i was really into it from the first minute all the way to the last second. Non stop action, great humour, you really can't catch a breath!! There are quite a few characters and all of them have very interesting personalities and good well written arcs. A wonderful movie and really fun to watch. I want to delete it from my memory and watch it again for the first time!! I give it 10 stars because I cant really see a way how it could possibly be any better!

title: Tarantino wannabe...
text: So once again i come to the conclusion that every year that passes , cinema is getting less and less enjoyable. Good films are not common but nowadays are rare like dodos , the bird from animation movie up. Most of the new films are mediocre at best. Maybe there is no more true inspiration. Maybe there are difficult and tiring times for art. On the other hand i hope this will change at one poit. All the movie takes place in a train . The action is fast and some times pointless. Its a wannabe tarantino movie , without tarantinos surprises and artistic point of view. Film , actors , creew are trying but its still not enough.Bullet Train is a 2022 American action comedy film directed by David Leitch from a screenplay by Zak Olkewicz, and produced by Antoine Fuqua, who initially conceived the film. It is based on the 2010 novel Maria Beetle by Kotaro Isaka. The film stars Brad Pitt as a former assassin who must battle fellow killers while riding a fictionalized version of the Tokaido Shinkansen. In addition to Pitt, the film stars an ensamble cast which also includes Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry, Andrew Koji, Hiroyuki Sanada, Michael Shannon, Bad Bunny, and Sandra Bullock.

title: A refreshingly fresh action-comedy that soars due splendid performances & high-octane thrills
text: Stunt coordinator turned director David Leith has been one of the pioneers of new-age action in Hollywood, be it the dark, brooding variety like the "John Wick" franchise and "Atomic Blonde (2017)" or the more fun, action-comedies like "Deadpool 2 (2018)" and "Hobbs & Shaw (2019)". And the master does not disappoint in his latest outing, with "Bullet Train" providing the adrenaline-pumping, high-octane action we have come to expect, laced with colorful characters played by a star-studded cast and enough irreverent humor to keep you engaged from beginning to end.Brad Pitt was clearly in his element as "Ladybug", a down-on-his-luck assassin tasked with a seemingly straightforward "snatch and grab" assignment on a Japanese bullet train headed from Tokyo to Kyoto. Little does he know that the package he is assigned to steal contains deadly secrets that a mafia boss will literally kill everyone to get to. "Ladybug" with his trusty handler "Maria" must navigate deadly master assassins, yakuza gangsters and other co-passengers with dark secrets to get his cargo to its intended destination.Based on a novel of the same name, written by Kotaro Isaka, the writer as well as the screenwriter Zak Olkewicz deserve praise for their world-building, with each character adding mirth and quirkiness to the narrative. Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree-Henry shine as a pair of assassins known as the twins while the usually dependable Hiroyuki Sanada and the precociously talented Joey King shine in their supporting roles. The cameos and guest appearances flow thick and fast and turn up on the most unexpected of occasions, to keep the audiences glued to proceedings."Bullet Train" is the action-genre revival Hollywood desperately needed, proving once again that the gritty, R-rated best version of the genre is still best delivered on the big-screen, with OTT products like "Red Notice (2021)", "The Man From Toronto (2022" and "The Gray Man (2022)" ending up as damp squibs due to the shortcuts that undeniably get taken in scripting and staging when a movie is designed for at-home audiences. "Bullet Train" is a refreshingly fresh action-comedy produced after long by Hollywood and a recommended theatre watch!

title: A 10 from start to end
text: The movie is an amazing cold Monster energy drink of a movie. The time watching this on cinema passed in an instant, was captivating from start to end, no boring moments, very good acting from everyone, like shocking this days cause of the woke propaganda. No, this is a complete art of action and fun. This is how the movies should be made, talented actors, good writers, good story even tho is not a pureasterpiece but good enough to combine the rest of the parts and make something extremely enjoyable and entertaining. Even tho I didn't watched it on 3D, some scenes made me dodge some moves, no excuses on the bloody scenes, everything was spot on. Some characters had a short spawn of life but is ok, not too much were expected to Go watching it, you can't regret it.

title: Fun ride
text: Considering I recently saw Thor 4 and "Bodies, Bodies, Bodies", this movie is a masterpiece in comparison!The characters were enjoyable. I'm not a huge Brad Pitt fan, but I liked him in this role.The background stories were interesting. I liked how the story weaved everyone's past into the events that led them to be on the train.A few parts were a little over the top; otherwise I would have given this a 9/10.Good time. I'd see the movie again!

title: A movie the Lumi√®re brothers would be proud of
text: This is one of the best movies I've seen in a long time. The plot was enjoyable and funny. However, the part I enjoyed most was the directing. The match cuts were chefs kiss. They lined up the scenes both visually and audibly! I was very impressed with the experience that this movie gave me. I'm not usually the biggest fan of text on screen (when each character is introduced, their name pops up on the screen), but in this case I felt that it matched the style of the movie. I highly recommend watching this one in theaters to get the full effect of the directing. I felt a nod to the story of the Lumi√®re brothers "Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat". I almost jumped out of my seat, I thought the train would hit me!

title: Tired of foul language
text: Call me old fashioned. But how many more movies do we need where the dialogue features in every second sentence the f word or m.... f... er or s.... t. The screenwriters should think what image they like to present to the rest of the world and especially about how Americans talk. You in the US need an improvement of your image and not show that you manage anything more than foul gutter language. US movies become increasingly unwatchable and this is one of them. None of the characters would make it through Japanese border control and rightly so. The story is a fantasy and utterly unbelievable. The acting is generally mediocre.

title: A raw unrefined version of pulp fiction on a train
text: Was a fun movie. Quirky and funny. Best comparison I could find for this movie. So if you've enjoyed pulp fiction you could like this one, although it's not as good.

title: Fun And Fast And...
text: Just a good old romp of an action movie. It's just popcorn chomping fun. I thought it would of been a much bigger hit than it was. It's far, far, better than the majority of tripe pumped out from streaming services.The action and acting is fast and well done. The acting is perfect for the rolls. The accents are good, although Lemon"s does slip from time to time, but, for a yank, he has a good go at cockney.It's just well written, well cast and filmed. A rarity in today's film industry. There are no pseudo victim storylines or fake sentiment signalling here. It's just two barrel full on action with a good dose of humour.

title: Abysmal
text: The formula flavoured by Guy Ritchie relies heavily on dialogue that's well scripted. This dialogue is appalling, juvenile dialogue and there's way too much if it.Painfully stilted performces from a great cast (except Joey King, who was just dreadful). Why cast Brian Tyree Henry as a young Brit? Like there are no black, age appropriate, British actors.Watching this, I was waiting for that moment when you're transported into the story, you forget you're watching sitting in a chair a screen. Instead I found my mind wandering and started checking my phone.If you want a solid, easy action comedy, which I think this is supposed to be, choose anything starring Jason Statham. At least then you know your going to get.This film is complete waste of time. Thankfully, we waited free to stream.

title: Thomas the Train back again in a new shape
text: The film is cartoonish in the first place, and it announces that with the beginning of its introductory chapter, and it admits that it is based on a children's cartoon series, as I said in the introduction, based on several things. The events all take place on a train after the hero of that series (Thomas the Train). It deals with it as the characters were defined in the cartoon series, the way the characters and clothes are drawn, the formations and methods of filming the scenes of the groups, and the transitions between the chapter and the other, even the methods of narration and dialogue are cartoonish.Finally, we come to the best thing about the movie, which is the comedy that raises it to a high position and adds a lot to it.The movie bullet train is a comedy, violent and enjoyable action movie that contains a light and balanced artistic vision that is somewhat strange from those types of films currently, but that vision is what gives it its weight and special taste.

title: Fun
text: This is a extremely fun and highly entertaining movie with a ton of good jokes and great characters. THIS is definitely worth the time to see and I recommend this to others. It was 100% percent worth it. Definitely would see it.

title: Loved this
text: This was much better than I expected! There was soooo much action in this movie, it was literally non stop action, and I loved that aspect. I wasn't ever bored, and I didn't want to look at my phone and miss anything.It was quirky and funny, and the acting was really well done. Brad Pitt was great as always, and the actors playing Lemon and Tangerine were really good. I could tell who was doing a fake English accent and who wasn't, but the fake accents weren't too bad.The story was fun, there's lots of blood and gore so don't want if you're not into that.I like when movies have smart ways of bringing little hints back around, like Guy Ritchie movies, and this one has things like that too.Would definitely watch again! Also please don't take this movie seriously - it's not meant to be.

title: DA WATTA BOTTLE'
text: The water bottle made the entire god damn movie!Jokes aside, I expected the storyline to be really mediocre at best, but knowing the director's past movies i knew this was gonna be a fun action movie.I was wrong on the first part, it delivered much more than necessary, every inch of details was brought out to light and this is what I wanna see more from movies, not in this particular way, but the creativity to be used in certain ways.I had a blast watching this although there are some scenes where the CGI kinda goes off, but it doesn't really matter cause the movie covers all of that up.Definitely watch this!

title: Terrible waste of money
text: To me it seemed like a movie made for the intellectual/educational level of a teen (with the second digit in the lower range), and especially a Japanese teen, due to the Japanese cultural hints. If I gave it three stars it is for the CGI and the action scenes which involve some creative skills, otherwise the script is a catastrophe. There's nothing funny in the Tarantino-inspired dialogues (not that the much quoted Quarter Pounder with cheese of Kill Bill dialogue had any entertaining merit). Really not worth wasting one's time on.Several studies have determined that IQ scores have been falling for decades. Sorry to say but the cinema nowadays is in a difficult state, with all the Marvel and Transformer escapism coming out of Hollywood. At least the cowboys and Indians movies typical of the 50's had a coherent story ...

title: Bullet Train is Fast Paced FUN!
text: Snatch meets Snakes on a Plane... Snakes on a train! Refreshing to see Brad Pitt continuing to depart from his typical blockbuster roles and I think this was a good fit following "Once upon a time in Hollywood". Fun to watch him in this film as the self-aware, enlightened "man for hire" who still has a job to do. I have to say his comedic timing was perfect and its almost like where has funny Brad been all our lives?!? I loved the witty english banter amongst the other assassins and the dialogue between the main characters. The visuals of the bullet train speeding through Tokyo were artful and the fast-paced fight scenes held watchers interest without ever overdoing it. It was really funny throughout, even when you didn't expect it to be. Hiroyuki Sanada was amazing as always and I do wish we got to see more of his sons/grandsons backstory. You are somewhat thrust into the storyline in the beginning and figuring it out as it goes along. I give it a solid 8.5 and only detract some because I wish we had more plot pre-story.

title: Sooooo GOOD and FUNNY!
text: This movie is a must see, really out of the box and different, It was all over the place YET good, fun and entertaining. WATCH you will not be disappointed. The acting is superb, the cast is phenomenal. It is good seeing Brad Pitt in a movie, he cracked me up the most, him and his bad luck and unfortunate events. The action in it kept me watching, it was intense at times, however you end up laughing at the oddest moments. Great solid cast of actors who I have never seen in a film before. Watching it at first had me a little confused but it eventually comes together quite nicely for a wonderful film.

title: Absolutely a great bloody fun ride!
text: Enjoyable action comedy thru and thru.What if you made a movie along the lines of Tarantino or Guy Ritchie but amped up the action? You'd end up with something like Bullet Train.Fast, funny, very violent, and with lots of little touches. By touches, I'm basically referring to them taking Chekhov's gun off the mantle, revealing that it's a machine gun, and spraying it liberally about.Excellently paced, great characterizations considering how much was going on, action throughout but still allowing breathing room.I'm trying to think of recent action movies I've really enjoyed... I think this places at the top of the last few years.After watching this, i immediately started following the screenwriter and director. I am expecting much more excellent movies from them.

title: flashy but hollow
text: I was kind of blown away by how bad this movie was. I was expecting a reasonable amount of kitsch but it seemed as if this movie was both trying too hard and not trying hard enough. Whoever wrote the character backstories didn't try hard enough as the backstories were completely trite and unconvincing, and the plot itself as well as its developments were so cliched that it shouldn't keep the interest of anyone who's seen an action movie from the last 40 years. On the other hand, the antagonist pair tangerine and lemon were so hollow and built of nothing besides teenaged edginess and Deadpool-esque humor that it was clear that they were trying too hard to appeal to adolescent sensibilities. Not to mention that that thomas the tank engine theme was unbearably lame... a blatant rip off (or clumsy nod) to the odd quirks of a tarantino or besson character (even down to the names); another instance of not trying hard enough. Upon my first viewing, the introduction of those antagonists made me cringe so severely that i had to turn the film off. I later resumed it, hoping it would get better. It did not.The character played by brad pitt was completely mismatched to his acting prowess relative to the rest of the cast. His presence only made the lesser known actors and actresses appear like unprepared amateurs. I want to like brian tyree henry but his flat affectation and sarcasm is the same in every role he plays, and it falls flat every time.To its credit, the technical filmmaking aspects were executed with some degree of competence and panache, and the fight choreography was impressive at times. But that did not suffice to save this schlocky waste of time. And a looong time it was.

This movie was more than everything I was looking for. It had the action, the stories and the comedic moments that made me chuckle at times. Think of John Wick, but with comedic moments. There was never a dull moment where I was not engaged. It was one of those movies where there were multiple stories and you were curious how the main character fit into everything, but you didn't know how it would work out until the very end of the movie when everything was finally pieced together. Like I said earlier, the action scenes reminded me of John Wick and the comedic scenes were similar to what you would find in Marvel movies. There was not a scene in the movie that I found to be unnecessary. There were surprises in the movie that pieced everything together as well as make me laugh, which was more than what I was expecting from this movie.

title: Amazing ride.
text: The movie is exceptional in being loud, boisterous, explosive, witty, hilarious, action packed, unique, over the top and is just a glorious mix of exceptional editing and special effects that will leave you mesmerized, aghast, laughing - all at the same time !You cannot be disappointed watching this movie. If you are then you probably needed a different movie for your day. Give it a watch when you just want to watch something.The story builds itself in a train and everything happens with the train. The characters are introduced in the train and their back stories zoom out and bring them back to the train. It is a spaghetti that you need to roll up to enjoy.What a blast !

title: Delivers Laughs and Surprise
text: "Bullet Train" was an unexpected source of entertainment that managed to transcend my usual preferences. Although I typically don't gravitate towards comedy films, this particular movie proved to be a refreshing exception, delivering an enjoyable experience that kept me engaged from start to finish. Brad Pitt's comedic prowess was evident throughout, adding a layer of charm and wit that blended seamlessly with the film's overall tone. The real triumph of "Bullet Train" lies in its ability to combine humor with a compelling narrative, captivating both action enthusiasts and those seeking a lighthearted escape.

title: Not great not terrible
text: Aaron Taylor-Johnson is simply phenomenal here. Absolutey the most lovable character here.The movie is ok for low standard and bored audience looking for comedy. Dont look for any seriousness or at least little bit "realism" here. Its like Snatch or Lock Stock but only worse and only in train with over the top story with too much cinderella in it.Too many characters in it doesn mean bad but the story itself is too much, too over the top and you can see how plastic it is , how calculated it is that theres no reality, no consequences from any action . One of the most scripted movies ever. I look for at least little bit realism so im little bit disappointed.

title: What a fun movie
text: The setting was great, the camerawork and cinematography looked excellent, the casting was perfect - each actor did an incredible job playing their part.The plot and all of the intricacies provided tons of anticipation and payoffs. Even with the long run time, it really moves along and never feels like it drags on too long. Many times I do not care for flashbacks, but I really like how they played out in this film.I'm giving it a ten just because it was so fun, but if I were being critical it would still deserve a solid 8.5 or 9 imo. The CGI was a bit overboard in a few places, but sadly that's just how movies are made now, but dialing back the effects would not have diminished it in any way. Really enjoyable movie and I expect years down the road people will look back on this one fondly.

title: An absolute blast
text: I thought Bullet Train was going to be a straight forward action thriller until I found out that John Wick (2014) and Deadpool 2 (2018) director David Leitch was at the helm. Here he concocts another a highly entertaining, high octane, stylised actioner with plenty of irreverence, over the top violence and black comedy to throw you off track, so you never quite know what is going to happen next.Brad Pitt is having a bad day and just wants to quietly get the job done for his employer and leave the train, however he is one of five assassins who have boarded who become unwittingly interconnected with each other while doing different jobs that result in bloody shootouts, ultra violence and witty banter, especially between Lemon and Tangerine, where Leitch clearly takes his cues from Guy Ritchie, as they all speed across Japan to get their respective jobs done.While the story gets a little convoluted there's never a dull moment as Leitch expertly choreographs the action to perfection. It's a cracking thrill ride with a witty script full of twists and turns, colourful characters and Japanese flourishes, often reminiscent of Tarantino's Pulp Fiction (1994) but with more gloss. Bullet Train is an absolute blast that moves along at a breakneck speed, even if there's a little too much CGI for my liking, but the sheer bravura set pieces, wit and style ensures a high likeability factor and it's good to see Brad Pitt clearly enjoying himself here in amongst all the irreverence.

title: A rip roaring ride
text: This was just a tad too long, I think some stuff could have have been trimmed. But what a ride! I love it when it all comes together and the story pans out. I love deadpan humour and some of the scenes are laugh out loud funny. A lot of people die in very creative ways, and I'm deducting a star because they killed off my favourite character. Very upsetting. A spinoff featuring him and his partner is something I would definitely watch!There are lots of little twists and turns along the way and a few unexpected surprises.Brad does his usual cool as cucumber schlock that he can knock off with his eyes closed but the supporting cast is also outstanding.

title: Stupid, funny, awesome
text: The headline sums it up. I can't tell you how many times I reactively rolled my eyes at some stupidity. However, I can tell you it was about the same amount of times as I found myself laughing hysterically at some well placed humor. Couple that with some awesome action and a pretty well told story, I found this to be a very watchable film and look forward to seeing it again. Bullet Train is a good movie that I think does what it was meant to... entertain. It's a fun ride that doesn't promise a sophisticated plot, but does deliver an entertaining time with some interesting plot points and some solid performances.

title: Faster Halfwit! Kill! Kill!
text: Disclaimer: I got off in Kyoto and stopped watching about 20min before the end. I could have saved much more time, sure, because it was pretty clear after 10min. Where it was headed. Pretentious Tarantino visual and narrative style with rich frames and colorful expensive lamesplaining flashbacks, dumb Tarantino morbidiculous style with a ballet choreography for gratuitous violence.Exploitative cinema at its maximum performance, brainwashing youngsters and would-still-be youngsters into thinking they are "cool." And then when violence is that "cool" don't get surprised if there happens to be more and more mass shootings. Ebg2YnBj9III am still giving it two stars because obviously people have been working hard to give their best here, but hell, all involved should be deeply ashamed. Anyway I hope they don't need to cross paths with a stray bullet to start thinking about it.

title: Fantastic
text: Great action and comedy mix. This movie blends all the best parts of classic action film with the humor of Deadpool. Along with keeping you in suspense until the very end. Multiple mini stories adding up to a wild action ride, twist and turns around every corner of the movie. At first I thought it would just be another action film, yet with the cast of Brad Pit, Sandra Bullock, Micheal Shanon, and many others that brought together maybe the best action film in the last 20 years. Would love to see if they could pull off a second film but yet not sure if they would be able to and keep the same amount of comedy, action and suspense. Fantastic movie, great job to the cast and crew.

title: Who would have thought a movie about assassins could be this funny?
text: Brad Pitt is an assassin codenamed Ladybug who has been tasked to recover a briefcase containing cash from a bullet train. He gets entangled with other assassins on the train. Lemon (Brian Tyree Henry) and Tangerine (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) have just rescued the son (Logan Lerman) of Yakuza crime lord White Death (Michael Shannon) from kidnappers and are taking him and the cash-filled briefcase to the father. Yuichi Kimura (Andrew Koji), a Yakuza member and father of a boy, Wataru, who is in a hospital after being pushed from a building, as well as his father and Wataru's grandfather, the Elder (Hiroyuki Sanada), are looking for the culprit. The culprit is the Prince (Joey King), disguised as a schoolgirl, who pushed Wataru and has her henchman currently holding the boy hostage in the hospital, to force Yuichi to kill White Death. The Wolf (Benito A. Mart√≠nez Ocasio) thinks Ladybug killed his wife and wants to avenge her. Another assassin, the Hornet (Zazie Beetz) uses the poison of a boomslang snake, slithering loose on the train, to kill.If the synopsis above is confusing, you should watch how these entanglements play out on the screen. As wild and violent as can be. The comedy, mysteries and thrills of this action-packed adventure are so riveting, I overlooked the violence. Sandra Bullock as Maria, Ladybug's handler, mostly lets her presence known through phone conversations with Ladybug, but her lines are no less funny. This is surprisingly exceedingly entertaining.

title: Stylistic, fast paced fun!
text: Stylistic fun. I actually watched 10 moviegoers walk out of my theater, with 2 kids less than the age of 10. I'm not sure what they expected from a hyper violent rated R film. It was exciting as the plot unrolled, the writing was witty and the action was amazingly done. Some spotty CGI, and some occasional dumb lines of dialogue or predictable humor is what contributed to the 4 star. I had a great time. Brad Pitt did a great job. Reminded me of the happy and more fun version of his character from The Counselor 2013 (I don't recommend you watch that movie).A fair warning, it's gruesome! There's not just action and violence but it can be very gory. Think of Deadpool or Logan levels violence. 8/10.

title: Wild Ride On The Bullet Train
text: Fast paced, tons of unexpected twists & turns, and a very different revenge story. It has a great deal of violence, but without being unnecessarily gory. We just found it a ton of fun to watch for the visual effects & story as the director used so many interesting techniques & angles. It all felt so original & different from many recent movies we have seen. I think comic book fans will like this though it's not at all dark & dreary which is how I often find some of the comic films. One thing important to add is that this film is very funny. I mean laugh out loud funny. And it also has heart with relationships & people you really care about. I don't write a lot of reviews, but I wanted to stand up & clap at the end of this one as well as share how good it was with as many people as possible.

title: As slow as a snail
text: The first 5 minutes almost had me turn it off but I persisted till the 20 minute mark....don't know why I bothered. So boring slow and rubbish.I thought I was watching a Japanese TV show as it is full of Japanese writing.Don't bother unless you have had a few cans of energy drink and have nothing else to do for the year.The first 5 minutes almost had me turn it off but I persisted till the 20 minute mark....don't know why I bothered. So boring slow and rubbish.I thought I was watching a Japanese TV show as it is full of Japanese writing.Don't bother unless you have had a few cans of energy drink and have nothing else to do for the year.The first 5 minutes almost had me turn it off but I persisted till the 20 minute mark....don't know why I bothered. So boring slow and rubbish.I thought I was watching a Japanese TV show as it is full of Japanese writing.Don't bother unless you have had a few cans of energy drink and have nothing else to do for the year.

title: Fun with a capital F
text: With it's fast moving plot, quality banter and killer action, this is one to surely check out! There are also some great cameos so be sure not to miss them.

title: Fast, fun and ultimately forgettable
text: Everybody obviously had a lot of fun making this chaotic, sometimes confusing and comically violent affair. Brad Pitt shows again his deft comic touch and Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry's vaguely inept British hit men are interesting and quite amusing (especially Henry's British accent!) but it gets to the point where there are simply too many characters on screen. The wolf and The Hornet appear and then are gone too soon...is that a spoiler? I don't think so.As always, Hiroyuki Sanada is a joy as the aging Yakuza and the final twenty minutes are totally bonkers. As crime capers said on a high speed train go, this is probably the best...but that's probably not saying too much, is it? At the end of the day, It's all BDF.... Big Dumb Fun.

title: general review
text: I want to give my personal opinion about the movie. The movie had a good beginning, it was ordinary, but in terms of the beginning and continuation, it was very beautiful and attractive, and it was in a way that attracted the audience, and in addition to This movie was an action movie, but it was so beautifully scripted and made that laughter and the comedy genre were used in it in an excellent and logical way, but instead of a normal beginning, it had a beautiful ending and you convinced the audience. It means that the film is complete, the content and the expansion were excellent in terms of filming, the slow scenes were very, very well filmed, the direction was very professional and the editing was very beautiful. It was a beautiful combination of comedy and action, so that it made the audience laugh, but it didn't take away from the action content of the scene. For the selection of actors, make-up and special effects, it was clear that very professional groups were used. The final opinion is that the movie was perfect and had no obvious flaws. Written by Darapiri.

title: Disgusting movie
text:
Very crude and horrible scenes. I was expecting more from the sceneries on Japan not only killing people and fights all the time . üëé
I didn't enjoy it . I got stressed out , bloody movie 100%
I only enjoy 2 minutes of the entire movie .I think this is a very gross movie .If you are looking for blood all the time then go and spend your money buying the ticket to watch this garbage movie.I saw it just because a friend told me that it was funny . Seriously ?? Do you think is funny to watch this ?You must be nuts!! This movie should be listed in the Halloween os something similar . No for normal seasons .

title: Wild fast-paced action-packed movie
text: Loved it. A crazy well made movie about people wanting to kill each other for different reasons riding a japanese bullet train. Reminded me of a couple of other amazing movies such as Kill Bill (i'm pretty sure this one was a big influence for the director) and Kick-Ass, specially in the dark comedy aspect of the film. If you want a good thrilling and fun action movie to watch, this is the one. I'm definitely going to remember it. Give it a shot, you might get surprised.Bests scenes: El Lobo backstory, 'venomous' fight and water bottle. Special mention to that amazing slow-mo scene.Best cameos in a while by the way.

title: Solid fun
text: I haven't had so much fun watching a movie in quite a long time - I was joyfully grinning almost throughout the whole movie. It's a non-stop sequence of violent or unexpected stuff, it's great!All the actors are amazing, including several cameos - all but the main villain. It feels like we're back in 80's with what villains we get lately, including speaking foreign language with a horrible terrible accent. With how great the rest of the film is, it's a crying shame what they decided to do to a villain character. Ugh!It's still a great fun though, I was delighted to watch it even considering the bland finale - the journey itself was amazing!

title: Stylish and fun
