title: remarkable success
text: The film was integrated in all respects, directing, photography, comedy, action and the dramatic aspect as well, all of which were done with great care. The direction was legendary and flawless, the comedy was very funny, the drama was very convincing and impressive, and the transition between comedy and action or comedy and drama was excellent and great and the actors played their roles well. One of the best films shown this year so far. Have fun and see it.

title: Fantastic high paced movie
text: David Leitch did a great job on this one especially during the high point of COVID. This is by far the best cast movie of 2022 as every actor is perfect for their character. The movie is extremely fast paced, has great action sequences, funny dialog, and great flashbacks. Having over 7 storylines all intersecting was a great way to keep new information coming and keep the audience wondering, how the new character will fit into the story. The movie resembles Leitch's past work, Deadpool 2 with the bloody action sequences and the humor. Though it is a nice refresher to see an action movie that is not based on superheroes. I definitely would recommend as this movie had me laughing and intrigued when I saw it in imax and when I rewatched it.

title: WHY IS THIS SO LONG??? TWO HOURS???
text: Moderately entertaining, should have been 80 minutes not OVER TWO HOURS.It feels like they just saw a Guy Ritchie film for the first time and said "oooooh we need to do that, but with a much bigger budget, and instead of having CLEVER twists, just make dead characters keep somehow coming back to life".There have been a rash of these films coming out in the past few years, Gunpowder Milkshake style assassin movies, I mention that one because it was actually entertaining. This one just leans heavily on Brad Pitt's star power, and the rest is incredibly one dimensional characters who can't get off this literal train wreck.I hope someone does a recut around 80 - 90 mins long, and turns the tempo up. Would bump this film up to a 7 from a 5.

title: A Zen Wick meets Snatch in Japan.
text: Superb script, many plot twists, combined with wonderful dialogues and solid acting made this movie one of the best comic action flicks I saw in a long time. A sort of a pacifist John Wick meets Snatch in Japan.The movie won't work for everyone, at times a bit chaotic and some scenes are unnecessary, but I laughed a lot during this movie.It won't become a classic; it has just that tad bit too much Hollywood sauce over it, but boy oh boy I surely can recommend this movie.

title: No way you will not have fun
text: This is not a masterpiece in story telling. But the story is fun and filled with great action. The best way to explain this movie with no spoiler is this. Think of smoking ace's done better and funnier.The only bad thing I can say about this film, is one character did not really hit with me. Some of the CGI was over the top but it works with the movie.A must watch? If you like action, comedy or Brad Pitt I say yes. I can see a few people not liking it but for most people, it is a fun experience.

title: Good Action, but not good enough for this lenght.
text: Since when is action cinema primarily just shooting and blood. In earlier action films, action choreography in the form of martial arts or car chases was also important. In addition, the film lacks suspense, since all the actors in the film have different motives and the goal of the film is and remains unclear.Nonetheless, there are postives as well. I like the style of the film and the many references. For example, Sandra Bullock plays a small role known from "Speed" and there are clear references and similarities to Guy Ritchie's movies, Tarantino's movies, as well as Rodriguez movies. In addition, the Japanese manga is also reflected in the fluctuation between childlike naivety and brutal violence.

title: Mansplaining and Narcissistic B*****
text: I just love when Brad Pitt said those. The social commentary on point.Bullet Train is an absolute chaotic fun. The cast in this movie is beyond me. I mean it even has Hiroyuki Sanada! Stellar action, all characters are absolutely not the same, which is hard to pull off in a story about assassins. The direction isn't as linear, but the backstories, intermissions all come together absolutely well. Brad Pitt stands out yes, because he is one strange actor based on the roles he takes, and his role here is exactly that, but I have to give it to Aaron Taylor and Brian Tyree. Their banter and characters were amazing. Almost a convoluted plot due to different characters, somewhat like how Smokin Aces was, but it was fun, funny, over the top and stylistically good.

title: Fun convoluted plot that ultimately all(sorta) falls into place
text: There were 3 subplots and 3 subberplots, non of them felt unnecessary (except for one) and the music was pretty good, scenes don't drag on and there was a lot of plot twists 8/10.

title: Refreshingly good
text: To be honest this is not typically a style of movie I enjoy especially the comedic components usually end up annoying me but this movie felt like it juggled everything pretty well! I did laugh at some of the jokes and enjoyed the twists and character and plot development. There were stories within stories that overlapped and intertwined among the luck, chaos, and series of events. Acting was really good and was filled with lots of decent actors & actresses. You could buy into their characters and storylines. Among all of it there was asian influence & scenery which made it more unique in a way. It was like kill bill, some elements of deadpool, murder on the orient express, and some john wickish hear no see no evil or thor comedy inspiration all came together in a hodge podge of entertaining fun! The trailer does not do justice to the movie and I do recommend giving this one a chance even if your like ehhh I dont know. It was refreshingly good for those types of movies for me and personally I'd rewatch it. 8/10.

title: It's Like a Fun Drug Coming in the Purgatory Time of Cinema
text: He always surprises and makes people laugh with unexpected things. A movie like this needs calm-crazy acting and the movie has done it very well. It may not be a masterpiece, but it can be called a very good movie.

title: Mediocrity Riding on Star Studded Train
text: A lot of money went into this. Big celebrity actors. Beautifully designed. And that's where it ends.The annoying dialogue wanting to be Tarantino sassy fails miserably. The jimminy cricket in the ear character becomes annoying really quick. The story is wanting to weave a bunch of plots into one but doesn't establish as interesting from the get go so why bother following them...These film projects seem like money dumps - a reason to keep people employed and to blow those budgets for the next year... truly a waste of time for all involved beside the crews who are least getting paid.Don't worry if you missed the bullet train... it wasn't going anywhere.

title: Had so much fun watching this
text: It is a great thrill ride movie. Brad Pitt was amazing. I cannot say it is the greatest story but... Amazing just... It's just a realy good movie. I can see myself watching thiss over and over again.

title: Very Good action/comedy
text: It's just a rock solid movie. Moves quickly, has fun memorable characters, some good laughs, well done action. The ending sequence goes juust a little to big and CG heavy for me personally, which fumbles the ending a tad.Overal though, an excellent movie that everyone should go see.

title: Loved it, but violent,
text: I didn't look closely at the violence and blood so it didn't bother me too much. But, I try to avoid R movies and violence.Other than that, which everyone knows they are going to watch a violent movie anyway...I really liked the acting in this movie and the way you could relate to the characters. Brad Pitt was a great actor here.I loved all the character interactions, back stories, etc.I liked the way the movie had so many little details and plot points.It was a very interesting and cool movie to watch.

title: 9/10 Incredible action and good comedy
text: This movie has everything that an action film needs,Good actors,fantastic action scenes,and some comedy scenes that can make you laugh or smile,i would DEFENETLY watch this films at least 2 more times.

title: Fun, Guy Ritchie rip-off worth watching
text: Entertaining mix of characters, and much like a Guy Ritchie gangster movie there are very few well defined good or bad guys. Most are somewhere in the middle for varying reasons which plays out fairly well. Yes the banter and interplay is ripped off Snatch and similar movies, but it's fun and usually works.No Oscar nominations here, but if you want to kick back with some entertaining interactions and fairly decent fight scenes then give it a go. The title overlays to define when are where things are happening or happened in the past can get a bit much but all part of the fun.It does drag a little in the end and could have wrapped up a bit quicker, but overall you won't be disappointed.

title: Fine Movie Overall; Short Of A 10 Though
text: For the most part I really enjoyed the movie. Great characters with tons of surprises. However I felt at the very end there was too much buffoonery going on with some of the characters which took away some of the seriousness of the movie and made it way too comedic. Kind of like the transition from The Force Awakens to the Last Jedi with characters like Fin and Poe. For the most part though I loved everything about this movie. How there's so many mystery boxes but everything gets solved by the end of the movie. Fun fact, during Covid they were shooting this movie next to the movie Lost City and used actors from each movie to cover roles they couldn't fill during pandemic.

title: Loved It !!
text: Bullet Train was such a pleasant surprise, I saw the trailer and it looked fun so I figured I'd watch it. It was so fun to watch from start to finish and it reminded me of Pulp Fiction.There's a lot of familiar faces in Bullet Train and each and every one of them does an amazing job. Brad Pitt always delivers and I have to say I don't normally like Aaron Taylor Johnson but he was so good in this. The real surprise was Joey King as the Prince, she did a great British accent and she's become a force to be reckoned with. Everyone else was great also including Michael Shannon who's only in the last fifteen or so minutes. I would definitely recommend this if you're an action movie fan.

title: Stylized violence over substance
text: Bullet Train a highly stylized, playful flick with slick cinematography. In the same vein as movies like Kill Bill, it follows absurdist characters over an absurdist plot, and is predominated by gratuitous violence. There's nothing deep, dramatic, or thought provoking about this movie, nor is it intended to be any of those things.There is a plot lurking in the background but it's mainly a vehicle for delivering stylized violence and laughs. The humor lands at times but other times veers into being goofy and cheesy. Similarly, the characters lack depth and are mainly comedic figures who are there to deliver violence and fight scenes. Some scenes dragged on a bit and there were a few clumsy flashbacks that were there to show some backstory but were mainly confusing and poorly executed.If you liked Kill Bill and films of its genre, this one might be for you. If you like character-driven movies, engaging dialogue, or captivating storytelling, then you might want to give Bullet Train a miss.

title: A fun and action packed film!
text: First of all, This film has a great cast. Brad Pitt and Aaron Taylor Johnson shine, however Joey King and Brian Tyree Henry's English accents do not. Sandra Bullock is wasted in her role and I hope she got paid well for something she could have done on her lunch break whilst filming 'The Lost City'. Speaking of, some surprising cameos evident that multiple films were being shot at the same time/location.I do enjoy Brad Pitt in more comedic roles, and he was a fun character in this. He had good chemistry with his costars and it looked like they had a good time.The film itself is also a good time, with the action coming thick and fast and constant. I'm glad the plot wasn't as expected.There were a couple of silly goofs and some plot lines that here very obvious, other than that it was a very entertaining film.

title: Great action film
text: Bullet train sure was something different. Interesting written characters with a compelling plot. Good coordinated action sequences and a good mix of humor thrown in with some of the slower scenes. Brad Pitt plays Ladybug. A man taking over for someone called carver and is tasked with boarding a train by sandra bullock. He needs a brifcase. As well as him there are two twins called lemon and tangerine. Great characters and both great actors that add the comic relife. They need the briefcase for a ransom, and joey king the prince needs it to kill her father. But theres another reason why these people are on this train and something I had fun figuring out. There are more great characters including the hornet and the wolf and the elder that are equally as interesting. Overall a very well made action film with great acting and action.

title: Good good movieüëçüèΩ
text: Lovely feel good Tarantino / Jackie Chan / samurai fusion film with timely interventions of fate or coincidences. Some cringe humour at times but overall the best of 2022 for me.Lovely feel good Tarantino / Jackie Chan / samurai fusion film with timely interventions of fate or coincidences. Some cringe humour at times but overall the best of 2022 for me.Lovely feel good Tarantino / Jackie Chan / samurai fusion film with timely interventions of fate or coincidences. Some cringe humour at times but overall the best of 2022 for me.Lovely feel good Tarantino / Jackie Chan / samurai fusion film with timely interventions of fate or coincidences. Some cringe humour at times but overall the best of 2022 for me.Sorry have to do it 4 times over to make it 600.

title: Derails soon enough to make you want for a proper Lemon & Tangerine movie instead.
text: Brad Pitt plays Ladybug who is assigned a "snatch & grab" task which he is supposed to be an expert of, as last minute fill in. He is supposed to grab a briefcase full of cash on the bullet train & make it out on the next stop. Unknown to him, the bullet train has other interested passengers who is after that briefcase & more. How he fights his way out of this forms rest of the story.Let me be blunt, this very film with Japanese stars & as a proper Japanese film would've felt a lot different & even better. I am not saying this as if they made a cultural blunder. I just mean that with Brad Pitt in the lead, changes the equation & expectations of the movie altogether. It tries to have a racy narrative but it's just a threadbare plot that get stretched over the action scenes. Infact more than Brad's Ladybug, I found the other two characters, Lemon & Tangerine more interesting. You simply cannot throw in a superstar & expect fate to get the justification right.With two hours long, it felt long because the film just wasn't crazy enough which the trailer suggested it would be. All the madness is reserved for the climax only & till then, it's only short action bits pulling the story forward one station to the next. Ofcourse Brad Pitt charms his way out, no two questions there. Just that it wasn't enough with the writing on the otherhand not supporting him enough.

title: It's supremely entertaining and very amusing!
text: Such a blast!Personally, I wasn't expecting much from 'Bullet Train' at all. The (most overplayed) trailer didn't fill with me with much interest and I thought the bullet train aspect would be gimmicky and perhaps even too limiting. However, to my surprise it's the exact opposite to all that. It's supremely entertaining and very amusing!I love the whole style of the film, the editing is top notch. The bloody visuals are class and the music is superbly chosen - every track hits. Then you also have an excellent cast. I thought, again based on the trailer(s) that I saw, it would be a run-of-the-mill Brad Pitt feature, but his performance is terrific throughout.Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry are a quality double act, I thought their accents and dynamic would get tiresome but if anything I enjoyed them the more I saw them - funny guys! Joey King was the only character I wasn't sold on during the film, though by the end I dug her performance too.Andrew Koji and Hiroyuki Sanada are also very good, while Michael Shannon, Benito A. Mart√≠nez Ocasio (aka Bad Bunny) and Zazie Beetz are welcomed cast members as well. There are also a few other noteworthy people involved, including two that Pitt knows well from a different 2022 flick. Seriously, what a cast!If I had to mention one gripe, it would be the run time/pacing - this is me nit-picking, though at like one or two (no more than that) moments I did feel like it wasn't paced incredibly. Again, no biggie though. All in all, I most definitely had a great time with this and would certainly recommend it.**still, if you want an even greater film set entirely on a train then you gotta check out the outstanding 'Source Code' - one of my favourites!

title: 2h of pure fun
text:
Considering the movies Hollywood has been making in the recent years, this one is a masterpiece.I'll keep it short:
They've taken a thing or two from Guy Ritchie's movies and yet it absolutely well done.Actors threw a great performance, the situations, the action, to dialogues - all well done and made me laugh a lot.This movie is a must see for a Saturday afternoon in the mall :).Enjoy.

title: Prove me wrong
text: Sequel to The Mexican. Can't think of a reason why Ladybug isn't Jerry, just 20 years later. They have thesame job, same type of luck, and same you know, face. This is not saying Bullet Train is as bad as The Mexican nor that The Mexican is as good as Bullet Train. Just an observation.

title: Not a bad over the top action movie.
text: Ladybug is an unlucky assassin who's determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs has gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans as his latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe -- all with connected yet conflicting objectives -- on the world's fastest train.I new going into this movie that it was going to be a funny, action packed movie. And that is what the movie ends up being. The movie has an incredible cast with likes of Brad Pitt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Sandra Bullock, Brian Tyree Henry, Michael Shannon and Hiroyuki Sanada and even a cameo appearance from Ryan Reynolds! The movie is really engaging and it keeps you on edge the hole time. Each character gets enough screen time to tell their story and get come character development and we even get some emotional scenes and a plot twist near the end of the movie. We also get one of the most annoying characters in the movie you will want this character to die trust me. The movie is really colourful and has some good shots. And if your a fan of action movies you will love this movie as the action scenes are choreographed well!Brad Pitt is one of the funniest characters in the movie, with Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry being the other 2 funniest character. Michael Shannon playing a menacing villain who gave me goosebumps. Sandra Bullock is only a voice over the phone for the full movie until she actually appears at the end of the movie but she plays well with Brad Pitt. And Hiroyuki Sanada plays the wise old man who just wants to protect his family and get revenge against the man who killed his wife.Overall it's a enjoyable movie for all to see!

title: What the heck did I just watch?
text: Seriously. I want to know. This was a horrible disjointed ride that made no sense. I don't mind a shut my brain off action film and I don't mind a complex story. I don't know what I just watched.This movie was so busy trying to be a dozen other movies that I don't know what I was watching at any given time. Half.ofnthr dialoge being in other languages and the subtitles blending into the background made it even harder to understand.I'd say I want that hour and a half back but I got caught up on my email and other such while it was on. So unless you have some paperwork to catch up on don't bother watching it.

title: The comedy and action stay on the tracks for the whole ride!
text: Fun. The sets and action are top notch. The acting is over the top on purpose; and is spot on and hilarious. I really enjoy a movie I cannot predict. Bullet Train was original even while keeping stereotypes and cliche' alive and well.

title: Absolutely Brilliant!
text: It's all about the trains in the train yard. Thomas is a legend and you have to watch out for the Diesels.Great action, great story and superb to watch. Brad Pitt is amazing but so are the rest of the cast. It's funny, brutal and clever.The music is ace, i love how the actors have all bought into the film. The trains are amazing, fast and perfect for comedy moments.I didn't know what to expect with this film and the trailer doesn't do the film justice. Remember, live is all about Lemons, Tangerines and fate.Perfect to watch after a hard week at work or if you just need to switch off from the world. One of my favourite films, absolutely brilliant!!

title: When everything just fits right
text:
Wonderfly done.I came into this thinking it was just gonna be horrible. Another movie where the budget was so bad they had to film it on one set, a train. Brad Pitt def made me give it a go.Its incredibly hard to make a film where you kind of go outside the traditional ways of filmmaking and everything seems to just click. It had a kill bill/dead pool feel but in its own unique way.Hats off to the screenwriter as the comedy was well thought, story was on point and everything fell perfectly for this type of film.Casting Director/Director did a great job choosing/working with these actors. On screen chemistry was just fire. Every single cast member did phenomenal.Wonderfly shot, good production sets, acting was great.A rewatch film? YES
A buy on digital? YES.

title: Total disappointment
text: Such bad movie I didn't saw for long... Was approx. Watching untill a half before I left the cinema. To enjoy this movie you must really switch off your mind (any logical thoghts) or to be really stupid. This is more a fantasy movie than a regular action.Conclusion: Good effects, great acting, very bad scenario.

title: High octane action/comedy, finally a decent movie for 2022, well, besides TG:Mav
text: "Bullet Train" (2022, $235M w/w, 2-hrs, Dir/David Leitch) is fun little romp featuring Brad Pitt as a bumbling assassin with a supporting cast and cameos by many familiar faces. All the action happens aboard a bullet train out of Tokyo whose tiny few passengers are placed there by crime lord, White Death. Director David Leitch is known for hits like Deadpool 2 and Hobbs & Shaw, so he brings the same type of high octane action mixed with humor. Heck, there's even some "Pulp Fiction" DNA in there with the characters known as "The Twins". However, much of the bonkers action happens in the final 15-mins and it's pretty crazy, raising my six or seven rating to an eight. It's so much better than most of the Covid trash that's out there.

title: Great action and laughs
text: Fast paced, great action, good story and plenty of laughs. This summer trio of Brad Pitt, Sandra Bullock and Channing Tatum hit it right again. Definitely one to go see.

title: Funny action movie with lots of twist and turns
text: I know , different strokes for different folks but hard to believe so many rated this so low. Personally, I found this movie to be a fun watch that kept me wondering who the different characters were and where the story was headed. For me hard to beat a movie that's funny, has lots of action and filled with surprises.I also tend to like movies that somewhat slowly reveal what's happened to different characters in flashbacks to better understand how their role fits into the story. This movie has more than enough characters that keep you wondering what their motivation is that has them doing what they're doing.Never a dull moment in my humble opinion. Only reason for not giving it a 10 ... didn't come with a downloadable coupon for a free steak dinner.

title: Enjoyable movie
text: I personally had a very good time watching this movie. The acting is good and the story is more than decent.I read the negative comments and they all looks the same : it's the poor man Tarantino/Guy Ritchie movie blah blah blah. What is wrong in being inspired by awesome directors like them ? I'd rather watch a movie like this that is trying to show something in a different manner than usual movies rather than yet another generic Marvel movie that looks like all the other movies or a generic Dwayne Johnson one...Here, we have a funny movie, with great actors, with a story slowly unfolding until a pretty good climax.

title: A mess, sometimes real, sometimes comic book fantasy, and it never works.
text: Bullet Train is perfect for fans of Everything Everywhere All at Once who can handle stylized violence. Either you'll love it, or hate it, and I hated EEAAO. It's a complete mess, at times rooted in the real world, with actions and consequences, cause and effect, and at other times purely fantastic. The bridge between the two worlds fails. What happened to the passengers, the conductors, the engineers, and the bloodied bodies? They're there when convenient, and not when they get in the way, a lazy tactic in an otherwise heavily stylized but vacuous film.

title: A Genuinely Fun Movie
text: I was pleasantly surprised with how fun this movie really is. The sets are simple (it is a train...) Yet dynamic. The style is fantastic for everything. The dialogue is snappy and fun. The action is excellent and doesn't make you sea sick.Overall, movies like this are great. The story is easy to follow and is paced so well that the 2 hour (I think?) run time just disappeared and I was hooked from the beginning. The violence is just right too... Not too gruesome, but enough to not make it lame. I want more movies like this! Stylish, smart, good stories and great action. I highly recommend it, especially if you like a strong action movie.

title: Endearingly bizarre.
text: "A modern retelling of Agatha Christie's 'And Then There Were None' (starring an ensemble cast of charismatic A-lister celebrities, playing assassins) set upon a 21st century train in Japan, told in the energetic signature style of Guy Ritchie" certainly must've sounded like an absurdly original pitch for an idea to studio executives (I'm genuinely surprised they took such a creative gamble, investing in a project so ridiculous) & on paper, this mishmash of random ingredients used as inspiration for a major budget Hollywood blockbuster theoretically should not have gone together in order to create a satisfying end product, yet to director David Leitch's credit, in reality, he succeeds in finding a quirky, individualistic way of making things work (brilliantly, might I add) in the execution & despite my hesitancy in watching the film (due to these doubts I'd previously harboured), therefore creates one of the most enjoyably wacky action flicks of the past year, revelling in the fact that it doesn't take itself too seriously for the entire duration of the run-time.Of course, the movie's no comedic masterpiece (hampered by occasional messiness & jokes that don't always land) but anyone who found themselves incapable of at least cracking a smile (& laughing out loud from time to time) whilst watching must surely have issues appreciating light-hearted fun - since there's a list of additional attributes to admire as a welcome accompaniment to the humour; the sharp wit embedded throughout, meticulously crafted twist & turns, genuinely convincing emotional dynamics that believably shift with each passing moment & amusing development, not to mention satisfying pay-offs that were set up effectively & actually felt rewarding & earned by the end etc. As far as popcorn features go, "Bullet Train" ain't the greatest but it definitely isn't bad at all either. Hence, well worth your viewing - despite the one or two forgivable imperfections.

title: A beautiful ballet of chaos and death
text: Went to see this film back in August, had no idea what it was about and I'm glad to say it was the best experience I've had in a cinema since spiderman no way home. Twists, turns and a whole lot of violence just what I love in a film, I wasn't surprised to find out the same director made deadpool 2 which is another great film. Highly recommend seeing this.The soundtrack is great it has become my daily workout mix with great songs like I'm forever blowing bubbles sung by Engelbert, (same guy who sang a man without love which is in the Disney+ show moon knight) and stayin' alive which is a rendition sung in Japanese Spanish and English (Japanese because of the book the film was based on, Spanish because of bad bunny and English due to the original song being in english).

title: This movie was really good
text: This movie was so much fun. All the guest appearances were great. I will not spoil them because I don't want to ruin the surprise. One appears kind of early in the movie and it's hilarious. The other one happens later in the movie. It's really brief but it's really funny as well. I fully recommend you watch this movie. I honestly wish I went and saw this movie in theaters because I would love a sequel to it. Brad Pitt is hilarious in this movie and Joey King was amazing. She was so good in this movie. The White Death was a little disappointing to me. I was honestly hoping for a bigger name actor to play the role. Other than that I really enjoyed this movie.

title: Choo Choo
text: Bullet Train is an over complicated story that was definitely overhyped and over advertised. I will say it was well done in terms of production and quality. But aside from that, it was a mess. The story had so many sub stories that it was complicated to keep track of who was who and why or how each were involved. During this, things were just hectic and randomly happening with loud sounds and effects. It was just an extremely chaotic movie in which they tried way too hard to be better than it turned out to be. It's fun at time and enough to put on in the background but dont expect what the reviews promise.

title: Entertaining! Loved it!!
text: Hi. 49. Female. Watched this movie with cery low expectations, also because I was bored. I loved every minute of this movie! Not one boring moment. Loved the surpise appearances. I mean it's not life changing, but also no self-serving sanctimonious crap that will be celebrated at the Oscars. But FINALLY, a movie that entertains! Thank you Mr. Pitt for coming back to us after the Skankelina debacle. I loved Tangerine, Lemon, the Elder, and Kimura. I can't say enough good about it!!! Lehrman, always. Michael Shannon, that look is good for you. :) The Hornet was bada$$, Bad Bunny, Ms. Bullock, Mr. Fuqua, thank you for the entertainment. Thank you, thank you <3. I may start watching movies again....

title: This fun movie moves along like a bullet train,
text: The most enjoyable 2 hours at the movies I've had in a long time. The movie grabbed you from the beginning and doesn't let up until the end. Don't leave too early or else you'll miss one of the best parts of the film. Highly enjoyable fun for everybody.. I can't understand why anybody wouldn't enjoy themselves watching this film.

title: Not so Safe Train
text:
The Title suggests it's a bullet train but it is a rollercoaster ride.With continuous ups and down. David Leitch has achieved what he was looking for.Perfect Cast and There is ofcourse Brad Pitt going like an old wine.Film will take you on the edge throughout.Direction - Top Notch
Cinematography - Wonderful
Screenplay - Precise
Acting - SuperbMy Rating is 8/10Strong Chance of Part 2.Everything is top notch on this train Journey.Special Cameos just makes them more amazing.Ryan Reynolds and Sandra Bullock is just so pleasing for the eyes.Short cameos are key factor here.Go for it.

title: A Great Ride full of great sequences and editing!
text:
Bullet Train
ReviewComing from the amazing direction of David Leitch, Bullet Train blows you away with its crazy action sequences filled with a lot of well-edited shots. The story has multiple points of view of people (and a water bottle!) & just gives a very fresh preview of what entertainment is all about. A fresh script and an A-list cast with their amazing portrayal of all characters. The movie keeps you guessing on what will happen next with its somewhat whacky style of incidents and twists. Brad Pitt is seen as a completely different character which is refreshing to see. All in all, if this is what the future of Cinema holds, we are in for a treat with Fall Guy and Deadpool & Wolverine giving us similar experiences..
Pros:
Cons:

title: Great performance from Brad Pitt in generic actioner
text: The film is one of those action films that uses all the stylings Tarantino did ten years ago and throws in some silly costumes and characters form the worst ADHD aspects of Guy Richie's film making. There were dozens of films made in this style to cash in on Tarantino years ago and this is the same only with a big budget.It feels like the director either rushed into this or didn't have the confidence to make his own film.The graphics appearing on screen with character names is something you see on cheap knock off movies and doesn't add a thing to the film. Lots of visual shots you've seen in other films and a tedious number of throwaway flash backs and character origin stories.Perhaps surprisingly its the scenes with dialogue and character interaction which work best in the film, a lot of the action sequences and big fight set pieces, particularly the flash back ones were just plain dull and uninteresting.It really is Brad Pitts film though and he makes it watchable. It's a great reminder that he can carry a film and be a great, charming lead. Hiroyuki Sanada was also good while the rest of the cast were written, dressed and played at caricature level. I thought mostly the film felt miscast.The visuals have a slightly fake, cartoonish look to them, particularly the shots of the train itself. Its a style I guess but I can't say it brought anything to the film, if anything the cartoon stylings and costuming took away from any peril you might feel for the characters.It was watchable for the Brad Pitt Performance but the rest of it was just bit of a mess of things you've seen done better in other films.

title: Don't have one.....n ill give Brad, the man, 10 stars.
text: I can't put a star on this because I only watched maybe 3 minutes of it. I have probably been his biggest supporter ever since he was very young. And I knew then he'd make it big. It was just my gut instinct. I met him in l.a. And have followed his career AND his personal life from when he played in Dallas n 21 jumpstreet. Read everything reputable I could get my hands on about him . Silly things like his date n time of birth his schools ,what he majored in hisfavfoods, I could go on forever .I'm a great listener and I heard every word when he'd speak on interviews etc. I supported him, boasted about him, would get angry lolol at people if they said something unkind about him. Not because I'm an idiot. But because the guy is a great guy. To the bone. People that don't know, just don't know. I feel like I've been with him mentally most of his life and have had him up on the highest pedestal . Plus he's absolutely beautiful. However with all of this, it kills me to ,saddens me,to say ,I can't get into most of his movies. And he's the best!! I feel guilty about it,lolol really. There were only a couple movies I watched more than once . Joe black... And he really didn't do much but look pretty. And legends of the fall. Oh the zombie movie I liked. That's about it .this bullet train I really looked forward to. I don't know if its the movie he chooses? Or his acting? Oh god brad I'm sorry! Everyone else raves about them. Must be me. Well they all see the wonder of his work n talent, where I see the wonder of that amazing person inside.

title: Fun and hilarious!!!
text: This is another movie that has come out to be more entertaining than expected this year. Just like we've seen Deadpool or something like that, David Leitch is still himself in this movie. Funny jokes put on like a bob. Sit and laugh the whole thing The visual work of this movie is very good. Including the atmosphere in the Shinkansen as well. And at the end of the movie the movie puts chaos. Lots of destruction came, but he settled on CG visuals and effects, and the soundtrack was well-chosen. And another thing that must be seen is the editing, very cool. Everyone did a very good job. Some minors came to steal the scene. Especially the two fruit brothers , part of the story Overall, it's pretty good, but maybe a little stuck is that the movie is a bit too long. With each character being intertwined with each other The first part of the story line was somewhat boring. And the movie was a bit stretchy at some points, but overall, the movie was very enjoyable. Both fun and hilarious.

title: Non stop action and comedy
text: Goofy comedy and action scenes. So entertaining. The characters were all perfectly cast. Love the cameos that pop up throughout the movie too. Would see again.

title: So Fun and Entertaining
text:
When you want to have fun and be entertained by a movie, you got all from this movie.Forget about what are make sense and what are not, just enjoy how the storyline nicely delivered, good action and fun to watch, thrill that's enough to make you hold your breath for some seconds and then also some fun comedy that nicely presented, especially if you've been to Japan and have some ride with their bullet train.Dialogues also enjoyable and fun to follow
Nevertheless, you will be smiling to watch some of Hollywood stars appearances here and there.Brad Pitt definitely plays the role perfectly.

title: Talk about boring!
text: I gave it a decent try, but found myself struggling to stay awake for the entire movie. I didn't even make it through the whole movie before I turned it off.I'm not entirely sure what the point of the movie was but it sure took forever to make it and at a snails pace at that.The movie comes off as a wannabe Quenton Tarantino movie and it fails entirely. I kept hoping for something to happen and it never did. The least they could have done was thrown in some comedy to the mix.Thank god I didn't waste money on this by watching it in theaters like I originally intended. The better choice was to wait for it to show up on tv for free.

title: Fun and exciting
text: This movie was everything I love and everything I like to see. Funny with action and action with suspense. Must watch and must rewatch. I sat watching with a friend and we both love the entire thing and supprised going in blind from the begining. The actors were all doing an amazing job showing their emotions and delivering their lines even if there not in the entire movie. Props to the directors and writing team on this one. Please if your ever feeling like you need something fun and a little bit new with the actor from kickass looking so damn cool in every scene he's in. I will be watching it again and again.

title: Quintin Tarantino meets Wes Anderson
text: Stunning masterpiece of a film. Simply the best film i have seen in recent years. Many people will not like the film as it is bloody, and gory, comedic, yet visually spectacular with a complicated but ultimatly simple story line.The musical score is straight out of Quinton Tarantinos playbook, as is the script and story line. The visuals and jokes are Wes Andersons but also with a real commedic twist that could be stolen direct from Guy Ritchie.The story lines spread through the film in many multple lines, but all ultimatly connected and linked with each other. Unfortunately the multiple layers can and will make this a hard film for many to watch.Amazing film, but it will not please everyone.

title: Amazingly entertaining movie
text: I was amazed by this movie! The amount of good action, nice physical and verbal comedy, and great acting did the job. Probably the first time in several years that I got pleasant feeling after a movie.I watched it with my wife and usually after a movie we discuss the topics raised in the movie we've just seen. In the case of Bullet Train, we discussed only how much we absolutely loved it! Entertainment at its best, I hope Hollywood would get to it's senses and starts making more movies that just bring joy.In this day and age of preachy movies & shows written & directed by recently graduated blue-haired activists Bullet Train looks as a masterpiece.

title: Major Disappointment
text: Boring story and dialogue. Confusing story that isn't interesting and very hard to follow. Jokes that aren't funny at all. Movie that goes on way to long. Brad Pit needs a haircut along with some of the other male actors. Way too much violence and gore along with gun culture, isn't entertaining. Unnecessary flash backs that don't make sense and you dread it every time another one starts. Special effects does not make a good movie. Whole movie is shot on a train car. Low budget? Not worth the time to watch it. Should have donated the money to make this movie to charity and spared everyone. Glad I didn't pay to see it.

title: Everything you could want in a movie
text: This is probably the best action film I've seen this year besides maybe everything everywhere all at once, but bullet train has just a little more fun and excitement for me. First off, brad Pitts zen assassin turning hippy character is hilarious, lemon and tangerines relationship is fantastic, loving and funny to watch. The action in this film is by far the best obviously coming from david leitch, unfortunately I didnt see it in theaters but after watching the blu ray i should've gone to see it, the cast is fantastic, its entertaining as hell, there are constant twists and turns and let's not forget about Thomas the tank engine and all tangerines metaphors and phrases had me laughing and remembering watching that as a child. Over all it was an amazing action film with heart and passion put into it, some of the cgi took me out of the experience but overall I would recommend this to anybody who says they dont like movies and see them say that about this.

title: Fun Chaos
text: I had a blast watching this one. It gives that Guy Ritchie feel of a movie where there are tons of moving parts working in the background but you don't know about it until each reveal. They packed this movie with stars and I thought the ensemble cast was very fun and kept the movie interesting. It also included small blips of roles for other big stars which was a nice surprise. The story itself was a lot of fun and very chaotic. The style the movie was shot in was also a lot of fun (character captions, flashbacks, etc.). Probably one of the biggest knocks on the movie is some parts were very predictable but maybe that was intended the whole time. It had enough twists to override the ones that were easy to spot. 4/5 stars.

title: Let The Chips Fall Where They May
text: This action movie might seem random and a little absurd at first. Everything was kinda chaotic and doing their own thing. But don't let it fool you. There's a method in this chaos. The writer is a genius. I've never been this invested in such random chaos. Every little thing in this movie served a purpose. Even when it didn't seem so at first. The weapon, the snake, the water bottle, the kitty costume, etc. The story is very interesting that it didn't feel like 2 hours long. Once you start watching it, you wouldn't wanna stop seeing it. You wanna know what's going to happen next. Don't worry, curiosity didn't kill the cat. Satisfy yours.

title: Kingsman x Knives out
text: This movie was a lot better than I expected. The trailer looks average to me, the only thing that made me consider it from the trailer were the color grading/cinematography, but i thought the trailer overall looked like your typical comedy.Man- this movie was a LOT of fun. It lasts about 20 mins longer than it should've, but the last 20 mins are still full of fun content, it's just that it's dragged in a little, but it's not annoying by any means.. There was never a dull moment, and the characters were each interesting. If you liked the kings man series, you will LOVE this.I personally and what you call a "cinephile" which means someone who adores film and studies all aspects and concepts of the art, and this movie holds up. There were SEVERAL moments where my friends and I had those "ah-HA" momentszNOTICE- This movie was pretty gory, but all of the violent scenes are never dark-toned. The scenes are very light hearted (similar to how the dead pool movies displays their violence)Also, nearly every scene is important so try not to go to the restroom.

title: Not Funny
text: The trailer made this movie look funny. It wasn't. Ever. The banter between the action was intended to be humorous. It failed.The first half of the movie was confusing with several back stories. The only redeemable part of the film was the action in the second half.With better writing, this might have been a decent movie. Brad Pitt was good but he really isn't funny either. Again, Maybe it was the writing.If you're considering seeing this. Save your money and try it as a rental/

title: Great
text: One thing is certain and guaranteed if you're gonna watch this movie, you're gonna laugh a lot.Bullet train is a chamber film, and you guessed it, the chamber is the bullet train. With amazing cast and more amazing guests in the movie, it delivers us one of the best comedy films this year.The cinematography, the cgi and most importantly the soundtracks are amazing, Dominic Lewis did an amazing job here.The double edged sword in this movie is the plot twists in it. Some may believe its a good way to deliver things, but I didn't enjoy it as much. You see, the movie contains a lot of plot twists in a way it's kinda funny but in the same time it doesn't leave the time to breathe and to process what's happening. Beside that, everything was great!

title: Seriously entertaining dude
text: If you are the type to watch this sort of movie you'll love Bullet Train. It's full of action with a twisted sense of humour and the acting is top notch. A lot of action movies suffer in the storyline department, but not this one. They took the time for some real character development, which is especially impressive considering the fact that it's an ensemble cast. I'm honestly not sure how they managed it while still keeping up this level of action and without making the movie feel too long. The only the thing that could have improved it in my opinion is more screen time for Logan Lerman. Such a talented man. (And I loved his Russian accent.)

title: This was my Thomas of the year.
text: Came out on Netflix just recently & I never heard about it nor has I seen the trailer for it. So, I thought lemme check it out. And...It was great! I had a great time, I enjoyed the movie. And, most importantly, I just watched it without overthinking it. For some, going into movies meant analyzing every bit and I can respect that. That is fine.For most of us who had a great time with it, we just wanna enjoy a movie where we'd sit back with a drink & popcorn in hand. This movie is one you just wanna put the thinking cap away.Personally, I loved it & is one of my top 10 movie of the year. (P. S. I dunno what else to write coz I am on my third watch of Bullet Train since its release on Netflix & my day just keep getting worse.)

title: Fantastic action flick (but stop portraying Japan through your hyper-anime western lens!)
text: I was a little bit hesitant to watch this because it looked like yet another Japan-set movie without any Japanese characters of substance... which, it kind of is (countless Japanese randos get slaughtered) but kind of isn't (Hiroyuki Sanada's and Andrew Koji's somewhat prominent roles).The action is unsurprisingly CRAZY and incredibly choreographed (as expected from John Wick/Deadpool 2's David Leitch). I really enjoyed the eccentric main characters and their backstories were fun to watch. I'm just sick of Japan CONSTANTLY being portrayed through this hyper-anime western lens with futuristic neon cities and masked yakuza gangsters wielding samurai swords.

title: Why everything has to be so over the top and silly?
text: Characters in this movie survive multiple stab wounds, gun shots, explosions, crashes, poisons, and bone-breaking injuries, so much that it would make a superman blush. The ending is especially so over the top ridiculous that it makes you wonder if filmmakers were even trying to be coherent, or if this somehow turned into a superhero movie midway through. Gravity and physics don't exist in this universe either, apparently you can comfortably rest on top of a bullet train moving at a crazy fast speed and shatter its reinforced window with your bare fist. The storyline is also very thin and relies on sheer luck and plot holes to keep things going the way they intended.If you enjoy mindless popcorn movies and like to constantly suspend your disbelief then this movie is not so bad, some humor was funny and it will keep you entertained if that's all you care about.

title: Tarantino-esque
text: I say it's similar to a Tarantino film in that it is difficult to figure out what May happen next, and story lines are revealed as you go along, clarifying events, making them make more sense than they did originally. This film is funny, but more so, FUN. Fun to watch, and the filmmaking is interesting, with touches of brilliance in the way it is filmed. Some great actors make cameos, and the main actors in this ensemble shine quite brightly. It is death on the Nile for the modern audience, a shallow dime store story told in modern day fashionable filmmaking. I think you'll like it if you give it a chance!

title: Second half was a blast!
text: The first half of the movie was a bit boring but the second half made it up thanks to the excellent action scenes and satisiying climax! Brad Pitt was good as always and the supporting cast was equally outstanding! Good action flick with some comedy scenes! Reminded me a little bit of Tarantino's work sometimes. Go watch it and have some fun!

title: The real best movie of 2022
text: I make no secret that I'm a bit of a curmudgeon when it comes to modern Hollywood films (I'm still under 30, so that's not so encouraging-- hoping to get better and not worse about it!). I tend to find most overly safe, overly lit, and boring. However, BULLET TRAIN is a sheer delight from start to finish. Stylish and irreverent, it feels like a live-action anime directed by Tarantino in his prime. It's funny and exciting, but also packed with memorable characters (Lemon and Tangerine were the absolute best-- I would not call this an emotionally rich film but the bond between them was actually touching in its weird way). The bantering between the assassins trapped on that train was just as awesome as any of the well-executed action sequences.Not a sublime work of "The Cinema" or whatever, but damn, what a fun two hours! Will definitely watch again-- I have to spread the gospel to all my friends!

title: Can't get enough of this.
text: This one was something I longed for a really long time. I wanted to watch a movie with fast pacing and giving only right amount of everything to keep me on edge of the seat. The way that every character has their own show in everything makes this movie so fun to watch through all the perspectives that there are in it.Every character held an important place and when movie sums it up it just seems perfect it doesn't seem rushed, it doesn't feel slowed, it feels just perfect. Also I must say the style of backstory for each character including the background music was just perfect, the selection of music works amazingly good with every scene.

title: Waste of time
text: Total waste of time. This was miss match of poor scripting and poor content. The humour was dry and made me wish I did not come and see this movie. The actions seems where not amazing. This is disappointing for a Brad P movie. The only thing I liked where the cameos.

title: Great Fun
text: I had a blast seeing this movie last night in IMAX. A lot of very funny moments. The screenplay and the writing are excellent, there were characters that we rooted for, got angry over, and hated. Comedically violent too, lots of hilarious moments involving breakout fights. There's a lot of entertaining cutaways too, it reminded me a lot of watching a Tarantino movie, there's definitely shades of his influence in here.Brad Pitt, as always, is pretty funny in a deadpan sort of way. I liked all of the characters here. This is another very entertaining action movie that is great to watch and rinse your pallet after all of the superhero stuff that's been pretty dry recently. One of the best of 2022 so far, go check it out.

title: Wow!
text: This was a brilliant, exciting, action packed thrill ride of a movie. It reminded me a lot of Kill Bill. Quentin Tarantino could easily have been the director. It's packed with energy and vibrancy. Also, the writing is surprisingly intricate as multiple plot lines are delicately and complexly interwoven. It's got plenty of language and gore to keep the adrenaline going, but the screenplay is excellent. Seemingly trivial facts turn out to be huge plot twists. I was very pleasantly surprised. The movie won't win any Academy Awards for Best Picture, but in terms of entertainment value and depth of writing, this was the one that I will remember for a while.

title: Another best movies of 2022 and another excellent example of how to make anime in live action
text: Bullet Train is by far a rather original black comedy action movie, with very promising action scenes and a good script that presents a whole dilemma of finding the connections between the characters and does it in an intelligent way. It's funny that this movie was based on a novel, since it looks like an anime and that makes it another excellent example of how to do a live action based on anime. Although in the original novel the characters are Japanese, the cast actors still do their job well and the versions of the characters shown in the film give the film a lot of substance. The script can be a bit confusing as it requires a lot of attention and those with little understanding may find this movie boring, confusing or meaningless in its action scenes. I say that those who rejected the movie and gave it a negative review either didn't understand it or have a very low IQ that doesn't allow them to better understand this movie. Bullet Train is another of the best movies of 2022 with its originality and good doses of action and humor and I rate it 9/10.

title: Fun Ride
text: Brad Pitt gives a great performance as a criminal who is supposed to pick up a case from the Bullet Train. What should be a simple job turns into nonstop complications and action for Pitt. This movie takes off running with the introduction of the characters who are each on their own mission but all become intertwined as the movie progresses. I loved the way the director used flash backs to show how the characters ended up on the train. Also I enjoyed the surprise cameos in a couple of scenes. If you are looking for a fun fast paced movie you need to see Bullet Train.

title: Not As Fun As It Wants To Be
text: Despite its best efforts, Bullet Train is not as fun(ny) as it wants to be. There's a lack of character development & Brad Pitt's character feels too one-noted. While the plot has a couple (almost) great twists toward the end, it feels stuck on autopilot throughout the film, mirroring the train's relatively straight line trajectory without a lot of deviation.We've all seen a movie where "all the funny parts were in the trailer" and sadly Bullet Train falls into that category.There's some impressive camerawork, cinematography, and editing that make the visuals its best feature, but in the end, Bullet Train feels just meh.Verdict: Take it or leave it.

title: Thrilling film to watch in your freetime!
text: David Leitch is the filmmaker of the action and comedy movie "Bullet Train." Leitch created the film to construct a story so the viewer would understand everything happening. They disclosed details about the assassins' prior lives and motivations. Zak Olkewicz wrote the script with a nonlinear narrative structure with numerous ups and downs. The movie's protagonist, "The Ladybug," played by Brad Pitt, is intended to be unfortunate no matter where he is. As Johathan Sela filmed the entire action on the bullet train, it captured the mood to establish the scenario. It gives the audience a way to picture a dystopian framework. Every significant character in the film was an assassin attempting to assassinate a different member of the assassin organization. For every one of them, it was passionately played and excellently acted. Brad Pitt performs a fantastic job playing the movie's massive problem. The fighting throughout the narrative made it exciting and funny to watch. Jonathan Sela filmed the camera work from high and low angles to convey the movie's significance. The film's editing was flawless and used cutting-edge technology to integrate all visual graphics. The mystery surrounding this movie adds to the drama in the film, making it noteworthy and well-viewed.

title: Now THIS is fast & furious!
text: From the opening shots to the closing credits, this film is a joy & a wild ride. The action doesn't let up for a moment & a lot of fun can be had in trying to guess how the next person dies!In these days of unrelenting problems, cost of living crisis, wars, environmental disaster, the rise of the alt right &, if you're British like me, a cruel joke of a government that seems to be operating a revolving door policy whereby each day brings an evermore useless moron intent on dragging the country into a new circle of hell. Apart from that, everything is wonderful! So with that as a backdrop it would take an exceptional film to make the world seem less grim. Luckily this is just the film to do it.How the director brought together such a glorious ensemble cast was a masterclass in casting. Not one misstep from any of the actors, faultless direction & extraordinary cinematography. How they managed to create that atmosphere on two soundstages is almost beyond belief!Brad Pitt should do more comedy, he's perfectly suited to it. It was great to see Andrew Koji again, too. In fact I commend all the actors, there was something to love about every performance & it's rare to be able to say that.In short, do yourself a favour & gather your nearest & dearest, sit yourselves down, turn off your phones (no access to the misery of the outside world), grab a few beers & prepare to be happy.

title: Hilarious high-speed action
text: What can I say? That's the last I judge a film by its trailer! I thought the trailer was a little bland. However the movie itself is on the complete opposite end of the spectrum. I can honestly say like the high-speed train I didn't see that coming.This film has brilliant character development throughout, which is quite rare these days. I completely fell in love with all of the characters and was pretty sad to see some of them go. There wasn't a single moment I felt bored or lost. It's is an extremely fun film With brilliant choreography, music choice, witty humour, and CGI. The script is bang on the money too!What an absolutely great film. I cannot believe the poor critic reviews! It seems to be if critics rate it highly it's going to be terrible, but if it's a mediocre review, then make sure you watch it.Do not miss this one! Go to the cinema to see it. It's my second favourite action film of the year, if not on par with Top Gun.

title: Fast, funny, furious - loved it
text: What I liked most about Bullet Train is it's a complex, smart plot that is cleverly fed to the audience a bit at a time so as not to make their heads explode.The script itself is very funny, like early Ritchie or Tarantino, with the comedy working very well with the violence. The casting, too, is excellent.It's a real blast from start to finish, and everything happens for a reason, becoming clear as the film progresses.Brilliant, energetic and smart.

title: No brainer
text: I love these kind of movies and Brad Pitt did an amazing job! I laughed out loud serval times. The action was cool. I loved the plot twists. Sometimes it was a bit simple though, but that''s fine with these kind of movies.

title: Hilarios fun!
text: Combining fun, violence and a plot that takes always leaves you wondering about whats going on makes for very good entertainment. Its not deep, just fun and not at all straight forward. The writes and director must have a vivid imagination and some weird dreams to come up with this, but in a world of too many plain films, I really enjoyed this.A bit of manga imagery and a dose of pulp fiction tarantino twists, plus many other influences puts it into a world where it could have been taking it self too seriously, but it really does not do that.I recommend this for those that has seen too many movies lately, but want something light without it beeing too predictable.

title: A FORGETTABLE ACTION POPCORN FLICK
text: This film caught my attention as soon as I watched the trailer. A strong cast consists of Brad Pitt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Hiroyuki Sanada, Michael Shannon, and Sandra Bullock. Action scenes that look exciting. A Guy Ritchie, Quentin Tarantino vibe going on, with hints of John Wick inspired action sequences. And when I Googled about the film, I found out that apparently it's an adaptation of a manga called Maria Beetle. So when it came out on Netflix, I went ahead and watched it.I guess the best quality the film has seems to be the colour palette which looks quite fresh and eye-pleasing. The combination of bright, vibrant and neon colours used adds flavour to each scene. The 'mise en scene' of this movie is also set up nicely, following the same theme used in the manga. The action scenes are also well done, and most of them have interesting choreography. There is a bit of suspension of disbelief used here, but it's forgivable for a film like this.The protagonist Ladybug, played by Brad Pitt, is also very cool and funny. His nonchalantly lazy demeanor mixed with Brad Pitt's comedic timing strengthens the storyline of this film. Besides him the character Lemon (Bryan Tyree Henry) has a very interesting and unique quirk that makes him stand out.But that's about it as far as the film goes. Although it has a very interesting premise, the plot of this film is not executed well. It's like the plot is only there to complete the story, not to tell a story. It feels like the author creates all the characters first before thinking about the plot. It's generic and boring, making it easily predictable. And most of these types of plots can already be seen in other, better films.I feel like the film probably also follows the manga too much, where all the characters have a backstory, even though said characters only appear in 1 brief scene. Making the film feel empty and the characters exist not to move the plot forward, but just to fill a quota. Glaringly different when compared to the characters from the films of Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie, where each character has an important role. I also feel that some of the jokes can be executed better, as it didn't seem to stick its landing. The dialogue between characters isn't as strong as it should be.In conclusion, Bullet Train is a film that's a bit like instant noodles. It is only to be watched once, there for background noises. And to be peek at a few times while you were doing other more important things. A collection of cool characters without any real substance or importance. A textbook example of a Netflix film.

title: Bullet Train(2022)
text: Bullet Train is an extremely bloody, violent action thriller starring Brad Pitt about criminals and murderers who are trying to kill each other and stay alive on a high-speed Japanese train. It's weightless but well made and a fun ride, if you're up for the gore-fest content. Violence is almost comically intense, with guns and shooting, heavy blood sprays, knives, swords, and punching. Characters die ! Gratuitous and over-the-top! The film is shot wonderfully and is entertainingly stylish!Brad Pitt is the secret weapon. With gleefully excessive violence and little depth, this oversized action thriller executes its many moving parts with skill, but it's Pitt's dopey, languid performance that keeps the balance.In BULLET TRAIN, a career criminal codenamed "Ladybug" (Brad Pitt) has spent some time working on self-reflection and trying to live a more peaceful existence. But now he's preparing for his latest job: snatching a briefcase from a bullet train that runs between Tokyo and Kyoto. Unfortunately, the gig isn't so simple. "Tangerine" (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) and "Lemon" (Brian Tyree Henry) are supposed to deliver the case, along with a warlord's son (Logan Lerman), but they lose both. And "The Prince" (Joey King) is blackmailing a man (Andrew Koji) into helping assassinate the warlord, who's also known as The White Death. Meanwhile, someone is poisoning people with snake venom, and a killer is seeking revenge. Is all of it somehow connected? And can Ladybug get out of this mess alive?The movie delights in pitting its many trained fighters and killers against as many obstacles as possible. Thunderous, nonstop movies filled with constant fighting can get exhausting.... but director Leitch, a former stunt performer and coordinator who turned to filmmaking with John Wick, has a good sense of rhythm. His stops and starts, flashbacks and reveals all effectively build a rhythm that flows and doesn't feel repetitive . Bullet Train , is an extremely fun ride while it lasts.

title: Forget logic and enjoy the ride...
text:
RATED 8/10
Language: English
Source: Nil
RECOMMENDEDNice action comedy with nice cast. The movie is a clean entertainer without any lagging moment. There are lot of logical questions about the situation, if you forgive all these you can enjoy this roller coaster ride.... It is pure masala movie with all ingredients for the entertainment like, comedy, action, decent screenplay and little bit of story. The cameos are good surprises and the connection between all hitman is quite good....
The solid cast and colourful environment makes the movie as a perfect movie to watch with popcorn...

title: Crazy movie!!
text: This movie happens in a science defying bullet train where Brad Pitt and other hired killers are on a mission. The screenplay is entertaining with good amount of humour and action scenes.The philosophical treatment of Brad Pitts character works well, and the back stories of each character keeps us engaged. There is nothing serious throughout the movie. Special appearance at the end makes for a great twist.Every character is interesting and the girl kid is great psychopath. All the scenes give a good connect at the climax. Overall it's a good movie to watch that does not disappoint you and a fantastic entertaining movie.

title: Quirky
text: If I did not know who the director of this movie was I would take a firm guess and say Quentin Tarantino. The movie does indeed borrow with pride from the Tarantino-Esque quirky style of movie making, characterised by peculiar or unexpected stylised traits.The storyline is based on a novel by Japanese mystery fiction writer Kotaro Isaka and the movie fits nicely in the Japanese psyche and sense of humour embracing the silly, the smart and the surreal. ...."A goldfish biscuit? I don't understand it."Reservedly enjoyable, tad slapstick, the movie left me somewhat unsatisfied, with second viewing very much doubtful.

title: Hilarious Comedy with an Ensemble Cast
text: Brad Pitt plays a fast-talking special agent down on his luck who's tasked with a simple assignment: to board a Japanese bullet train where he must obtain a special briefcase and exit train with said briefcase.However, due to sheer bad luck, Pitt crosses paths with a cadre of hitmen who happen to board the same train, each with their own agenda and conflicting interests which places Pitt's character in their crosshairs. The movie's hitmen consist of a great ensemble cast with many hilarious lines that elevate the movie to one of the best comedies this year. "Bullet Train" is a superb action comedy with witty dialogue, full-throttle action and set pieces, not to mention a fantastic script with different plot threads woven together to form a huge plot twist at the end.A definite candidate for the best comedy of 2022! Check it out.

title: 1967 crycrimesgmail
text: 1967: would have been THE year to put criminals in prison. Crimes done to me for years and my lifetime. And others. I met, knew, and lived with the difficult criminals hurting me. As of 2023 they are not in prison. It would have made my life and, so many others normal. A life ptsd free. Imagine if in 1967 they were in prison? And, a more natural life for all of us! What was going on in Catskill N Y that the obvious didn't happen? No prison for them and mental institutions nearby to give to their witness when convenient for somebody!? Enough of real life. The movie's pretty good full of action I didn't get to watch the whole thing because those people made sure I was not happy and unhappy, Brad is imitating real anger. No money, no home double and afraid to be alive. Real credits for work since 1967, leftstolen. Criminals who escape prison do steal and never went to prison that is how they escaped prison. title: Just Dumb
text: Aside from a few funny lines, there was not much in this movie that helped me be excited to be in a movie theater for it. The boring, shallow plot line provided the weak foundation for this dumb movie.

title: Great action movie
text: This is a highly entertaining action-comedy. Five assassins aboard a fast moving bullet train find out their missions have something in common. The movie full of action. This is one of the best movie for action lovers.

title: Comic book esq style movie
text: What a fun movie to watch. With so many side story this film has the feel of a comic book film. While many comic book films fail with poor writing this movie excels with a interesting plot and action comedy that doesnt take it self serious. The director took what made deadpool great and applied it to this film.Great performances and great action sequences.Definitely worth a watch.

title: Pure entertainment !
text: Ok, a rating of 8 is probably a bit off the mark, since it's by no means a great movie. It is however madly entertaining, and I must admit i had a blast watching it.It clearly borrows a lot from Guy Richie and Tarantino, but I didn't really mind, because it does so with great style.The plot is nearly non-existent, and for some of those reviewers who complains about lack of realism, well go look elsewhere, there's no room for reality here.This is just a huge chaotic mess of ideas, thrown in a big pot and stirred, but it's great fun all the way.Great cast, great settings, fun dialogue and and delivered at break neck speed. Just turn off your brain and enjoy the ride.

title: Barely watchable
text: Rescued only by some semi-witty dialog and expensive, violent special effects, this is otherwise utter rubbish that would barely keep the attention of anyone over the age of 13. Disappointing that Brad Pitt signed up for this nonsense. If you have two hours to be spare it would be better spent watching The Bourne Identity or Kill Bill for the 10th time. Some might say its just a bit of fun entertainment but even at that level its still bad. The ridiculous, convoluted plot left me not even caring what happened. Tarantino does entertaining fun way better. This movie is a waste of space, money and the viewer's time.

title: What a ride !
text:
Before I saw the film, my friend's review was " Tarantino on acid " not the sort of film a
mum and daughter wants to see !However, what a great film ! Really enjoyable Tarantinoesque film, witty dialogue from
start to finish and excellent performances by every one of the cast. The violence is
somehow cartoonish and in a way ungory
Don't leave until the credits have rolled ! ......although as usual 20 minutes too long
A really well scripted, enjoyable violent romp......a great break from 33 degrees.

title: the fun is insane
