Fun in this movie is too much i guess but still great movie for the weekend. If you love brad pitt the comical chrater like snatch and fight club little you will really love this film. The villan is too stylish
the side charter there are whos make this movie complete in some sidesend of charter is some bad i guessbrad pitt in my opinion is too old for this Role my opinion say after inglourios baster brad pitt being old for his roles but but but his role will love it some pepolesprinces is the worest.The japan style is greattrain fight is great idea for me it is well action senceand thanks..

title: Surprisingly funny, felt like a mystery, action comedy
text: Very interesting story. It's a battle figuring out who is who, who controls them and what they want. Very unpredictable. Paying strict attention and your story will have many holes in it.There was a small usage of backstory which made the story and characters more interesting. You can see why they are the way they are.Relationships are an interesting and unexpected part of the story. You won't guess.Enjoy trying to guess what is going to happen!

title: What Luck, Ladybug?
text: What's not to like about this action flick cum crime comedy. It has all the ingredients for an enjoyable viewing experience. Plus the special effects are splendid.Although the main action takes place inside a bullet train (ala Train to Busan), you don't feel hemmed in. The flashbacks take the viewer to different settings and times.The cast is splendid. Each contributing his/her thespic talent to an entertaining ride. I truly enjoyed Brad Pitt's role here. It reminds me of his cameo in "Lost City" starring Sandra Bullock and Channing Tatum who have cameo roles themselves here reversing their roles. Likewise, I enjoyed the witty, funny dialogue. It put a smile on my lips. Add to this brew, the inherently dark humor of the film.You watch this film not to search for deep questions about life but to lose yourself momentarily in a movie in an escapist way. On second thought, it surely imparts a lesson or two on fate and luck. Isn't this right, ladybug?

title: Train, Brad, Action
text: It's like Ladybug doesn't really want to be there, and is determined to make it out alive while causing as little harm to himself or others as humanly possible, and Pitt's take on playing the character seems modeled after the same approach. "Bullet Train" may be going nowhere fast, but Pitt always seems like he's already there, safe in the knowledge that we'll happily watch him smile through all the chaos that crashes around him (including two standout cameos, one which nails an actor's star power, and another which completely misapprehends it). Pitt's stardom has never been more obvious, and it shines bright enough here for everything else to get lost in the glare.

title: Its Hell Of A Ride
text: A Prince, a Labybug, Lemon, Tangerine and A Father what do they all have in common, the desire to rid of White Death. Sound bizarre, damn straight it is but what a ride to get there. Probably the best "popcorn" film in quite some time. Set inside almost entirely in a Japanese bullet train five assassins become intertwined unsuspectingly by almost the same destination.David Leitch gives an almost Guy Ritchiesk film thanks to the sharpness of the direction and of course the hilarious screenplay. The best thing its a fun film with tremendous laugh out loud moments. Brad Pitt and all are excellent in their roles. This is a movie that surely you'll enjoy.

title: Bullet Train is David Leitch's latest action film, bringing us a stellar cast and an engaging story, with spectacular action sequences
text: David Leitch returns with another action film, if you don't know this genius, he has directed films like; John Wick, Atomic Blonde and Deadpool 2. He was a stunt double for Brad Pitt five times, flash forward many years later, with Bullet Train which has him directing Brad Pitt who plays an assassin who must battle five fellow assassins while riding a bullet train. The film also features an ensemble supporting cast including Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Brian Tyree Henry, Andrew Koji, Hiroyuki Sanada, Michael Shannon, Bad Bunny, Sandra Bullock and Zazie Beetz. I think my favorites of the supporting cast were Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry, great scene partners and the banter between them were terrific and hilarious. Loved them, laughed with them, and a spin off anyone? They bring so much entertainment to the film, so does everyone in the cast. I think Brad Pitt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Joey King and Andrew Koji have some of the film's best performances.Bullet Train is based on the novel "Maria Beetle" (titled Bullet Train in its UK and US edition), Zak Olkewicz wrote the screenplay and produced by Antoine Fuqua who conceived the film. It's an R-Rated action film and the comedic elements works so well with the film and story.Richard Roeper of the Chicago Sun-Times rated the film three and a half out of four stars, calling it "wildly entertaining" and praised the performances, "the creative and blood-spattered action sequences" and most of all the writing. I agree with all that, the writing is funny but also clever, a good script and story. The musical score and choices of songs were all perfect. I really liked the cinematography and thats understandable because he have worked with David Leitch on every project, a good partnership. In 4k blu-ray, the movie looks extraordinary and sounds brilliant. The sound design is perfect! Like the action sequences, they're choreographed to such perfection and it looks so satisfying, mostly because of how the cast is doing their own stunts. Aaron Taylor-Johnson lost a chunk of his hand and passed out after doing a stunt, whilst Brad Pitt did 95% of his own stunts in this film according to stunt coordinator Greg Rementer. I absolutely loved this film and can continue to express my love for it, but I'll end it with a criticism regarding the representation of race in casting: The casting of several non-Asian actors, including Brad Pitt and Joey King, prompted accusations of whitewashing as their characters were Japanese in Kotaro Isaka's novel. David Inoue, executive director of the Japanese American Citizens League, criticized the casting, explaining that while American actors would have been appropriate if the setting were changed to the United States, the filmmakers used the novel's Japanese setting while keeping Japanese characters in the film's background, strengthening charges of whitewashing. Honestly, I didn't mind it as the actors did such a wonderful job, both in action and drama. But it's right to criticize it as it would have worked as good if set in US, if not better, with this cast. Bullet Train is a great addition to David Leitch's filmography, a great action-comedy, and engaging from start to finish.

title: The Pain Train
text: Professional thieves and assassins are brutally pitted against each other on a bullet train from Tokyo to Kyoto.Expecting a dumb action romp from stuntman-turned-director David Leitch, I particularly enjoyed Bullet Train because of what it borrowed from other movies, and what it left alone.It's the action of John Wick without the paranoid gravitas of a world where everyone is a contract killer.It's the black gangland humour of Pulp Fiction but with controlled monologues that don't go off the rails.It's the freewheeling serendipity of a Guy Ritchie movie taken out of the English drabness into stylised neon Asian noir.While Brad Pitt well deserved the longest screen time, and all cast were amazing, the standout has to be Sanada Hiroyuki who transcended his usual stoic samurai role to provide some perfect comedic timing.At over 2 hours long, Bullet train also has room for characters to display grief and musings on how to process misfortune and malice. The surreal visuals support the notion of the train, its orderly route belying its in-cabin chaos, as a metaphor for life.Which would make it not just a pain train, but a brainy one too.

title: Fabulous
text: Funny , engaging action and rhythmic storyline.Brad Pitt is phenomenal as always . The direction is really good , the directior David Leitch has really done a good job as a director in addition to the work he has done in his previous films like Deadpool 2 , Hobbs and Shaw ,etc.Cinematography is really cool . Catchy dialogue delivery and situational comedy . It is worth watching.

title: Yawn...what were they thinking...?
text: Yes i gave this a 5 for it was a mess of a movie and could have been so much better. I have nothing against. Hiroyuki Sanada but was disappointed to see him again..i mean is there no one else in Japan who could have played his role? Andrew Koji looked tired and i could hardly understand a word he said, he looked sick really. Aaron Taylor-Johnson was good as Tangerine. Brian Tyree Henry was also good as Lemon for i have only seen him from the Atlanta series where he played Paper Boi. For all the people that could have played White Death..i mean Michael Shannon? Really? Zazie Beetz as the Hornet..i really wanted to see some actors we have never seen before i even got tired of her in Atlanta but here she was again.Bad Bunny as the Wolf...lame character seriously. All in all i expected so much more from this the director needs to seriously think if he wants to direct another movie again and if he does i will avoid it. $25 to rent this movie from Disney? Waste of money seriously.

title: Late to the party, excellent movie
text: This movie passed me by, It showed up on my radar after watching the fall guy movie from the same director.Bullet train is excellent, dialogue reminds me of a Guy Richie movie. Nice stunts, simple fun plot. Old school action with no political virtue signalling. Plenty of comedy and some really nice action scenes and visuals.They could do a sequel with a similar job in a different setting and I think this would work quite well.I will be keeping an eye out for new movies by this director. Hollywood should fund the likes of these types of movies more often and they wouldn't be haemorrhaging so much money.Would recommend!

title: Dark Humor Fun Ride
text: The main thing in this movie is it has lots of death from the star to the end. But even though the characters are getting killed throughout we feel it funny as hell. Brad Pitt in this movie is epic as he believes himself as a carrier of bad luck, but the movie shows the opposite. As the movie name itself 90% of the film takes place in the Bullet train, except from flash backs and some time jumps. The movie begins to pic off to a fun action thriller when a character name wolf comes in, from then on the movie is fast paced, with memorable action sequence, flash backs of characters, comedy and everything. Its really chaos in the bullet train and nearing the climax everything that has happened in the train connects to one another which was a total surprise. All other characters did their part well and there is a surprise cameo at the end that was totally unexpected. All together its a must watch movie if you want to sit back and be entertained for 2+ hours..

title: A wildly entertaining picture that is an absolute must see
text: Bullet Train (2022) is a movie my wife and I saw in theatres last night. The storyline follows a mercenary of sorts filling in on a mission for another mercenary who called out sick. He's been out of the game for awhile so they are trying to ease him in by assigning him an easy snatch and grab job of a brief case. Unfortunately for him, he isn't the only one who has been hired for this job...This movie is directed by David Leitch (Atomic Blond) and stars Brad Pitt (Se7en), Joey King (The Conjuring), Michael Shannon (Man of Steel), Aaron Taylor-Johnson (Kick-Ass), Brian Tyree Henry (Hotel Artemis), Hiroyuki Sanada (The Twilight Samurai) and Sandra Bullock (Speed).This is a very well done addition to the action genre. The filming style is cool, unique and original. This is a very stylish movie with cool cinematography, settings, circumstances and characters. The fight choreography is tremendous and the action scenes are fantastic. The dialogue is hilarious, especially Lemon and Tangerine. The film does a tremendous job telling backstories and this has an Ocean's Eleven, Snatch and Knives Out feel to it. My only complaint would be the CGI during the train crash but the rest of the film is perfect.Overall this is a wildly entertaining picture that is an absolute must see. I would score this a strong 8/10 and consider it a must see.

title: Not bad, actually pretty good
text: I had read the book last year and was looking forward to see the screen adaptation. I was definitely positively surprised that they managed to follow a good part of the book story. Happy to see that the characters were mostly faithful to their original personality. Of course, there were many changes from the book and it could not possibly keep all the plot points but overall I think the movie did a good job to bring this story to the big screen.The movie is fun, packed with action, a bit of gore here and there and while it could have been done a bit better, I am still happy how it turned out.

title: Just missed the mark
text: Bullet Train had the making of a great movie, but just didn't quite get there.The story had enough moving parts and some interesting characters. All the different story lines come together well. The fight scenes were all fantastic, nicely choreographed.What lets it down is the over acting and poor dialogue.Joey King's character was just annoying, over played and painful.Karen Fukuhara is a brilliant actress but wasn't given anything much to do.Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brian Tyree Henry have some of the best dialogue and are quite funny but still very much over the top.Brad Pitt is boring in places and great in others.

title: An Epic Movie
text: From start to finish, this movie was absolutely packed with hilarious comedy, incredible action sequences and stunning visuals. There were some truly graphic yet uncontrollably funny deaths and the plot was full of suspense and mystery. One of the best action movies in a long time! The soundtrack, acting, graphics and all other awesome movie stuff was spot on and I thought Brad Pitt was superb! There are multiple main characters including Lemon and Tangerine (my personal favourites), Ladybug (played by Brad Pitt) and the main antagonist- The White Death (played by Michael Shannon.) A definite must-watch for all action-comedy or Brad Pitt fans!

title: Over the top gun
text: I enjoyed it, it's a movie not to take to seriously, I loved how all the characters were some how connected with entire movie taking place on the train!Brad Pitt and supporting cast brilliant!Had the perfect balance of silly humour, great character types and lots of action - An easy enjoyable oipvirn movie!

title: A Promising Glimpse of "Bullet Train"
text: Though I'm sharing this review well in advance, my recent screening of "Bullet Train" left an undeniable impression. The film boasts an ensemble cast of beloved actors, a fact that had me eagerly anticipating a two-hour cinematic treat.The film's central elements, namely the storyline and direction, surpassed my lofty expectations. "Bullet Train" delivered an engaging and captivating narrative from start to finish. The premise was tantalizingly unique, executed brilliantly under the director's keen eye. The pacing was spot-on, ensuring I remained riveted and on the edge of my seat throughout. Unexpected plot twists added an element of delightful surprise.In summary, "Bullet Train" is a must-watch recommendation. Beyond its star-studded cast, it offers a thrilling cinematic journey with a compelling narrative that holds your attention until the very end. With a superb ensemble, a captivating plot, and adept direction, this film promises an adrenaline-fueled experience.

title: Lock Stock and Smoking Barrels moved to Japan.. Excellent!
text:
Great Movie...ridiculously complicated exposition for each character, ensemble cast, great direction,sometimes you would need a pause button for the sequences, I streamed this so had a break now and then, if you had blinked in the Cinema you missed something for the action going on and very spectacular ending...
I doubt there was very little left on the cutting room floor for a two hours plus movie. Some of the younger members of the cast have matured over time, and difficult to tell who's who, which added to the enjoyment.It seems that Hollywood does the best adaptations for Japanese novelists Edge of Tomorrow/Live die and Repeat and others...Definitely a Billion dollar movie,great when they get it right compared to recent others from Disney and the rest...Would be good if Brad Pitt's character had a sequel or prequel production...

title: What exacly happend ?
text:
Way too much information just for one storyline until the half of the movie everytihng it makes you not understand what is going on , personally it took me a long time to understand but anyway it was kinda a fun movie but nothing special just too genetic for my taste it was cool for the Sunday noon though
The action felt flat fast and basic and somehow they tried to make the movie like a comedy/action flick but i couldnt really see that the jokes were so bad that you could laugh beacause of that
But at the end i was like what the hell just happend and whyy ?So for me its a 4 ou of 10 nothing special.

title: Definitely not for under 15's!
text: Brilliant film, fast paced & gripping. HOWEVER loads of f-bombs & extremely graphic, so if you're under 15 kids have been happily watching 15's, this is not one to let them watch!Ryan Reynolds, sadly only had a bit part, so none of his usual wit or fast comebacks that we have become accustomed to. Sandra Bullock only seen for a few minutes (looks amazing), but heard throughout.Great to see Brad Pitt back on the movie scene & he's lost none of his acting ability & was brilliant as always, including the self analysis of his character throughout & how he tries to better those around him.Also, some awesome slo-mo scenes so we can really appreciate the action in detail.

title: Comedy Capers On A Train
text: Bullet Train: Comedy-Action caper with the emphasis on dark comedy. An interesting group of assassins are onboard a bullet train in Japan bound for Kyoto. While some of the deaths occur in a slapstick manner others are gruesomely carried out. All sorts of tropes/cliches are lampooned as each killer has a back story which ensues in a sidetrack. Best perhaps is the Cartel Assassin who was the only survivor at his wedding as everyone else was poisoned. There are also the bumbling English hitmen, one of which has a philosophy of explaining everything in terms of Thomas The Tank Engine. Ladybug (Brad Pitt) is undergoing therapy and just wants peace and not to have to use guns but his enduring bad luck won't allow that. The Prince (Joey King) poses as a schoolgirl, literally disarming her opponents. A few twists and turns will keep you guessing but you'll die laughing at this! Directed by David Leitch based on a screenplay by Zak Olkewicz (based on the novel by Kotaro Isaka) 8/10.

title: Garbage
text: Pretty bad. I should have just left the theater but I was waiting for my food order. Overacting. Not funny. A bunch of non Asian people being their normal obnoxious selves in Japan so it's a documentary I guess. Why were there so few Asian actors in a movie that takes place in Japan.

title: Good entertainment
text: My expectations for this movie was high because of brad pit and he didn't disappoint the movie is graet. I got to tell u, this is a very good movie it's fun the plot is very good and enjoyable and the actress are very good.The action sense are wonderful And funny.To sum up I recommend u to watch this movie if u bored and want a good comedy action kind of movie.

title: Funny movie
text: The peoples review saying that this movie is a copy of Tarantino or Guy Ritchie are a joke, don't take those weirdos seriously, they are pathetic, this movie is their on thing, Tangerine and lemon characters we're funny and my favorite part if the movie, the music and effects were also amazing, and the cameos work well, the comedy works well for the majority and im an expert in Thomas the rescue engine, like the biggest fan of that engine, so those jokes involving tangerine were funny to me, and Joe King it's a fantastic little sweet actress, she was a little sexualized a little to be fai, but other than that, funny movie and a lot of fun especially with fiends.

title: One Thrilling Ride
text: Before it started your warned "strong bloody violence" most definitely from start to finish. You will not be disappointed. Lots of action, humor, plot twists, good acting and special effects, cameos, a tight story, tension, and surprises. I love that they dove deep into each character and showed us their past so we understand how they became the way they are today as well as why they take certain actions and decisions. The music is fabulous & the Cinematography beautifully captures every moment. Also do not walk out on the end or you'll miss a very funny vital part of the ending. What an exhilarating ride. üöÖüî•

title: Get what you paid for
text: If you went into the theaters like me expecting a movie that was just set with dumb fun, good jokes and some pretty good acting. You will not be dissapointed from the beginning to the end I was very entertained from the jokes, to the action scenes, and the plot. Which was obviously written to go around just plain fighting scenes but I even found myself enjoying the plot and characters as well. If you're going expecting a classic or something with an amazing plot and scenes to remember you will be dissapointed. If you're going for an action pack feel good funny movie ? You will not be dissapointed.

title: It's git a bit of everything
text: Action, gore, comedy - thought it was a Tarantino! Equal to kill bill and pulp fiction. Brilliantly cast, great well pieced together story like (Usual Suspects). Though the story is non-linear (relies on flashbacks) it's easy enough to follow - the writer does a good job there. Excellent cinematography great tone! Think David Leitch is my new fav director - writer. I highly recommend this must watch movie for fans of the above listed genre. Brad Pitt is as ever brilliant in the leading role, noticed his appearance along side Sandra Bullock and Channing Tatum again - after The Lost City. I watched this with friends - without any 'toilet break,' or unnecessary talking all were totally engrossed.

title: This movie is awesome
text:
This movie is awesome. I think it mixes Comedy and Action very well.Brad Pitt gives a very good performance as the lead actor,I would also praise the performances of Lemon (Brian Tyree Henry) and Tangerine (Aaron Taylor-Johnson) as the twin assassins duo.The movie has good timing for comedy as well as very intense moments at certain characters death scenes. It paced good and it will keep you watching for the whole 2 hours that this movie on for.Also, a sequel for this movie could work very well for some character like the Wolf or Lemon & Tangerine,and I hope it happends in the near futureIt think it definitly the best movie of 2022
8/10.

title: Thank you for this movie!
text: Money well spent on these movie tickets, the movie is a real thrill. An excellent combination of lite comedy and action. The actors do their job well and it's a pleasure to watch. One big bonus of this film is that there is absolutely no woke content, a simple and original story full of twists and action. It reminds me a little of the movie kill bill, but very little in the background. The fight scenes are shown very well, in general the visual effects are excellent. Definitely a watchable film and I recommend it to all action fans, it's rare today to find a film watchable and entertaining without being contaminated with woke content to the core. Thank you for this movie!

title: For those who are feeding the machine, please stop!
text:
I'll start from the bottom-line. I absolutely despised this movie and anything that is stands for. Sony (SPE) should be ashamed for creating something like this. Please realize, SPE has no interest in entertaining you, educating you, or in improving our planet, their entire purpose when creating this is to make a profit. This is done through exact calculation of expenses and incomes, selecting the actors carefully and running multiple focus groups. This movie feels like it was written by a machine for a group of ultra-short attention-span crowd, which are also gullible enough to pay for it. BTW- there were 2 other people in my watch group, from different ages and they all held similar opinion to mine.What is bullet train about? Numerous serial killers are coerced by some mob boss into killing each other, on a train. While they are all unique, they commonly deliver a plastic-like performance using a flat and unpleasant dialogues. This entire movie was filmed in a studio in LA on a green-screen, and post-processed on a computer. The lack of story is apparent throughout, it is not thrilling or funny at any point in time.To make things worse, this movie also break the sacred 7 sins of movie making, and I will list all of them here:
1. Not filming anything on location, but making use of foreign language to try to convince us it is (Japanese in this case)
2. Overuse of unnecessary flashbacks
3. Mindless killing, violence over spirit
4. Sub-par and cheap CGI
5. Paying A-list actors for a small role just to have them on the credits (Sandra Bullock)
6. Shameless product placement (Audi, Fiji)
7. Adrenaline rush at the place of a storyAnd here we are at the bottom-line again, if you read this far (thank you) you understand why I plead with you not to spend you hard earned $$$ on this crap. If you get to watch it for free and you want to was 2 hrs of your life- be my guest. My exact score: 34 / 100.

title: Action, But Thoughtful and Creative
text: Let's keep it simple: Cons and ProsCons:-The beginning will have a lot scenes with characters walking and music playing in the background. It's not necessarily particularly good or bad, but it's just overdone.-The early scenes where there is just a bunch of killings and music playing is completely off both with the music itself, the acting, and manner of killing.-There is not a deeper message behind the story even though the movie sort of tries to go for it.-The story is not deep.Pros:-The action (with a few exception, mainly in the beginning) is fairly thoughtful and creative.-The twists are decent and not completely predictable.-The CGI is amazing.-It's a 'you'll be on the edge of your seat' type of movie.

title: Violent, bloody, and bloody funny!
text: I've never watched such a violent, bloody movie that made me laugh so much with crazy plot twists and blatant ridiculousness. The movie never takes itself seriously, and movie goes shouldn't either. Just sit back, try to keep track of all the unique characters and relationships, and you'll probably have a great time. There is a great deal of violence, but it's balanced with laughs and a surprising number of "Whoa!!!" moments. Haven't been to a movie on a long time that elicited as much audience reaction as this one did!

title: Boring Guy Ritchie-lite
text: Here's a slyly comedic crime flick, with a lot of dialogue, cartoonish characters with heavy accents, fitful editing, abundant flashbacks, bursts of violence as punchlines, too many characters, an overbearing soundtrack of 'cool' retro movies, a nonsensical story...And guess what?: It wasn't made by Guy Ritchie. It was made by a guy called David Leitch, who was apparently a stunt double for Van Damme. Maybe he sustained head trauma in that line of work, and that explains his movie's lack of focus.Not sure if Ritchie ever came up with an excuse. Did anybody ever put him on the spot for the fact that his movies make no sense? One thing that "Lock Stock", "Snatch" and "RocknRolla" had going for them by contrast to "Bullet Train" is that the action wasn't confined to one space. We feel restricted here, ironically, by the movie's constant flashbacks and cuts away, because we're always coming back to the stupid train.I also have no idea what the movie was about. With Ritchie, that can be part of the fun. You know it's not going to make sense so you just sit back and enjoy the movie adding plot point upon plot point. Here, it didn't seem that complicated, so maybe it just wasn't that interesting.Ritchie uses a lot of attention grabbing devices, typically flashy editing and special effects. Leitch uses a lamer device of celebrity cameos, namely Channing Tatum, Michael Shannon and Sandra Bullock turn up. They don't really do much - with the exception of Shannon who I can't imagine ever doing nothing - so you have to assume that they think we're just going to be happy they're there. They're on screen long enough for us to go, "Hey! That's Channing Tatum!" and then they're off again.

title: Surprisingly entertaining
text: Tried this movie having no idea what it was about. Expected yet another one of those movies where the star is desperately trying to stop a runaway train or maybe rob one. Instead we get a quirky, funny and sometimes ridiculously crazy bunch of characters all, apparently, hit men and hit women but none of them having any idea they are part of some bigger, complex plan. There are big name cameos everywhere Ryan Reynolds turns up in a three second scene. Brad Pitt is very good as the main character. Never been a fan, but he was terrific in Once Upon a Time in Hollywood and Burn After Reading, so is winning me over with his quirkier roles. So a bit of rollicking fun.

title: Don't be a Diesel
text: If you like action/comedy films, or even spy films then this film is 100% worth a watch, very entertaining and perfect for a hot summer day.And by the way don't be a Diesel.

title: Fun action movie, if you don't take it to seriously
text: Look, if you go into this movie expecting a serious story to be able to dissect and contemplate.. You'll be disappointed. This movie nailed what it was supposed to be, a fun, action packed, kinda cheesy, but overall well done movie.The story line is laid out very simply, with a few twists here and there. The characters are likable/dislikable as they were written to be, the jokes are funny, the actions scenes are ridiculous in a good way, and the story keeps you intrigued.Overall one of the better movies I've seen this year, and I will be watching it again. I suggest watching as a fun date night movie or with a group of friends.

title: Gory and Nasty
text: I wish someone had told me before I went to see the movie in the theatre, how gory the movie is. If you like glorification of violence and making fun of deaths, you might like the movie, but to me it was disgusting and left me with images I hope I had never seen.It's too bad because apart from that it was okay; funny characters, well woven plot, interesting directing... But why would anyone want to see dozens and dozens of people dying in horrible ways?

title: Action movie, Deadpool style
text: Is it a grand movie like the old movies were? Clearly not. It is however a great movie if you want to laugh, with loads of action. I laughed throughout the whole movie, with running gags, ones that are more elaborate than others... With a lot of guest stars that you don't see coming. It's a movie that mixes genres, if I wanted to describe it, I would say Kill Bill meets Deadpool meets Snowpiercer (in Japan). I will happily go watch it again with friends, I want to share a good laugh with them.

title: The Best Action Movie In Years
text: Bullet Train was a film I knew nothing about until recently when reviewer I follow discussed it and recommended it. The marketing for this film has been pretty bad, since I saw virtually no advertising for it. However, the film looked intriguing, and being that it stars Brad Pitt, I decided to the give the film a chance and see it in the theater. I'm glad I did because this might be the best action movie to come out since John Wick 2. I'm talking in terms of regular action movies, not superhero movies or anime films. I will say this movie is significantly better than every superhero film that has come out in 2022, especially the MCU ones. I would even put this over The Batman.Brad Pitt is one of my favorite actors, and the last several years have been good for him. I really like Ad Astra and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. I might even put Bullet Train Above those films. The other cast members are all great as well in their own way. This might be the best performance Aaron Taylor-Johnson has ever done. Brian Tyree Henry is not an actor I'm really familiar with, but he was amazing as well. Hiroyuki Sanada is a legend. Michael Shannon is okay, though he doesn't have a lot of screen time.The film is ultra-stylized, very much like a John Wick movie or a movie directed by Zack Snyder, which I've always been a sucker for. It has some great action, especially at the end, but it also has a great sense of humor. The film actually finds a good balance with the serious subject matter and the humor, which Marvel has been struggling with for a long time now. The humor actually feels very Tarantino-ish at times.If you're at all a fan of action movies, especially old school action films, then you should definitely check this out. Like I said, this is one of the best action films in years.

title: Out Go the Lights
text: Bullet Train is a highly entertaining action film with both humour and thrills that offers one hundred twenty-seven minutes of gripping entertainment. The movie is about a set of eclectic characters with different dangerous missions aboard a bullet train going from Tokyo to Kyoto.This movie convinces on numerous levels. First and foremost, the different characters are all very unpredictable, memorable and diversified. For instance, we have a seasoned but unlucky assassin suffering from anxiety, a seemingly innocent schoolgirl who is more manipulative than anyone else on the train, a Mexican assassin and former kingpin of a drug cartel, a German assassin disguised as a mascot who specializes in poisons and two criminal brothers with an obsession for media franchise Thomas & Friends.These different characters are perfectly incarnated by experienced veterans and talented newcomers alike. Brad Pitt convinces as charismatic protagonist in his strongest role since Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. British actor and martial artist Andrew Koji offers a particularly diversified performance as tormented father who wants to avenge his son's tragic death but soon gets manipulated by forces he underestimated severely. This movie's shining star is however an extremely charismatic Joey King who plays the psychopathic schoolgirl with much conviction.As mentioned earlier, the movie offers an intriguing genre mixture. This film is filled with dramatic action scenes involving elaborate duels with knives, rapid gunfights and brutal martial arts elements. Bullet Train is also a thriller with a plot that comes around with quite a few twists and turns regarding the different characters. The film uses flashbacks to tell us fascinating background stories about the relations between the dangerous assassins. This film however also includes some slapstick humour in form of hilarious running gags and quirky situation comedy. These elements are thankfully never exaggerated and are genuinely uplifting rather than unnecessarily childish.The settings are also particularly interesting and obviously give the movie its title. Aside from a very short introduction and conclusion as well as the occasional flashback, the entire movie takes place aboard a bullet train. There are certainly quite a few elements to discover from packed service wagons over play sections for children, first and second class sections and unusual restrooms to elegant restaurants. These locations are so diversified that the settings never feel claustrophobic and certainly don't get boring at all.Despite the limited space in the settings, the movie has been shot with much expertise. Shaky cameras and epileptic cuts are thankfully being avoided as the camera work is dynamic but balanced and makes this rollercoaster ride easy to follow without ever losing track of what's going on.The quirky sound effects and eclectic soundtrack blend in wonderfully and make you want to revisit quite a few catchy tunes. This sound is best enjoyed at your local cinema in its sheer beauty as home cinema simply can't compete with this stunning quality.As you can read, Bullet Train is a dynamic action movie with little comedy and thriller elements that entertains from start to finish and leaves a lasting impression with its unique style. Murder on the Orient Express has been repeated to death and feels outdated by contemporary standards. Bullet Train is a welcome contemporary alternative that should appeal to teenagers, young adults and anyone who likes a healthy dose of a cinematic rollercoaster ride. Make sure to enjoy this very good movie to its fullest at a cinema. A special shoutout goes to all those who understand what inspired the title to this review. Rock on!

title: Bloody but funny - we enjoyed the ride
text: One of the best I've seen from Pitt. It has a "Smoking Guns" feel to it -- bloody but with a lot of jokes and physical humor. Lots of great cameos. The story appears simple but has a complex thread through it where past incidents are pulled into context. Overall a fun movie with buckets of blood and body parts thrown in the mix. Calling the girl "The Prince" was confusing. The look at Japanese culture was cool. The Bullet Train making fast 90 degree turns was a bit crazy since it needs miles to make the transitions at over 100mph for the average speed. I wish we had one in the USA. Highly recommend the movie.

title: The worst that Hollywood has to offer
text: Violence! Gore! Blood! Lousy story line and honestly not worth the $3 bucks I spent. Won't be to long before some idiots will try and mimic this flick and wipe out an entire train. In my opinion, movies like this only add to the violence that's happening throughout the country. Garbage like this is one reason we've stayed away from the big screen. Sorry I could not give it a zero so I'll have to stick to the one star. The story line made absolutely no sense and it seemed like we sat there for the entire afternoon. My own damn fault for not reading the reviews. Wife days, come on to the movie to a Saturday afternoon date. Sure says I.

title: This movie game me Kill Bill Vol. 1 feels
text:
Here's The 4K Lowedown on "Bullet Train" (R - 2022 - Theater)

Cast=10 Acting=7 Plot=10 Ending=10 Story=9
Violent=10 Pace=7 F/X=9 Heist=6 Chemistry=9An unlucky assassin is determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate may have other plans, as his latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe."I think you might be forgetting what you do for a living...take the gun." title: A decent movie at last
text: Story 10/10Directing 10/10Editing 9/10Design 10/10Costume 10/10Lead actors 10/10Second actor 9/10Support cast 9/10Lead adversary's 10/10Sound 9/10Choreography 10/10Action 10/10Romance 1/10Sex 1/10Dialogue 10/10Make up 10/10Music 9/10Theme tune 6/10Trailer 7/10F/X 9/10CGI 10/10Worth watching on cinema? YesWorth watching on stream? YesWorth a sequel? No - stand alone perfectWorth a prequel? MaybeWorth a TV series/film? Prequel seriesOverall feel? Classic movie fun we lost many years ago.Worst bit? NothingBest bit? Flows perfectlyReminds me of? Real movie making without the PC inclusion rubbishOriginal? YesBoredom 0/10Excitement 9/10Make a video game - NoWorth a novel continuation - MaybeWorth a graphic novel continuation - YesOverall one word comment - BrilliantWorth mentioning - Pitt and rest of cast work perfectly together and this is Oscar directing and design worthy.How I do it differently - Not much to change. Maybe a distinct theme is all that is missing.

title: Holes. Holes. More holes. But very entertaining!
text: Holier than a holy thing!But then you get to the final action sequence and it becomes quite clear that you just need to embrace all the holes and cheesy moments because overall this is a very entertaining movie and to be honest the holes actually make the movie even more fun.Decent CGI, good fight scenes, plot twists from the start to the finish. With some holes too of course.There are of course some moments scattered through the film - some good and some not so good.Oh, and have to say that there is some very bad acting and equally bad accents - there is no getting around that. With this kind of budget you would expect better. Docking some points for that.

title: That's an INTENSE movie
text: First of all, when I first watched the trailer of the movie, I was so hyped because I knew it was gonna be an epic action movie. Eventually, it was an AMAZING movie as I had imagined! The plot of the movie was very interesting and kinda innovative, because there aren't any other action movies similar to this one. The storyline was very well written, everything was well-explained and I really liked the originality of the script. The characters were too many, but gladly they were all very interesting, well-developed and some of them were really likeable. The filming location of the movie was mainly, the bullet train which was very well designed and it was a really BIG train, lol. The casting of the movie was all-time classic and their acting was AMAZING, everyone did a great job. By the way, the cameos on that movie were totally ICONIC. Also, it was an unexpectedly bloody movie and there were too many brutal kills on that movie, it was a bloody fun. Of course, it was an action-filled movie, full of epic fight and chase scenes that kept me awake from start to finish. Moreover, I was surprised that each character's backstory was very well-explained and well portrayed. The plot twist of the movie was definitely unexpected and it was really good, I really enjoyed it. In my opinion, it wasn't a really funny movie, because it was meant to be an action movie, even though there were some hilarious scenes during the movie. Overall, it was an amazing action-filled movie, that I would definitely watch again and recommend it to anyone! Last but not least, that movie definitely deserves a sequel.

title: What is this?
text: I had read Bullet Train wasn't as bad as the critics had made it out to be... so I decided to give it a go as it has a decent cast and a concept I'd enjoyed in the past (Speed, Snakes on a Plane, Mr & Mrs Smith... brain dead action movies, that sort of thing).So I put it on. After the first 5 minutes I was wondering what was going on and a little shocked as to how badly the one liners were written into the dialogue and how badly said lines were delivered by (usually) good actors.The action sequences were also a little jarring, I assume they were a homage to the older kung-fu movies and Asian classics like Hard Boiled, but are just poorly executed.I sat opened mouthed for a while trying to decide if someone was trying to be Tarantino or Guy Ritchie, then I just got bored. The characters, apart from, perhaps, Brad Pitt's are completely uninteresting and I really didn't care which one would die next. The movie is actually still on but I've completely given up watching, as has my wife, quite a while ago in fact.This movie isn't worth watching and will be immediately forgettable as I couldn't tell you a single character name even with three of them interacting in a scene at this very moment.Sadly, like most movies made in the past 5 or so years for the streaming behemoths, is crap but at least it's getting me back into reading books.

title: This movie should go to Oscar
text: I have watched Bullet Train today , if you want to know the meaning of Incredibly strange film, this film is the definition.It is a star studded film . Almost 90% of the cast have minimum 5 films in their bags which are super successful.Starting from Bradd Pitt , Aron Taylor Johnson , Bryan Tyree Henry , Hiroyuki Sanda , Sandra Bullock, Ryan Reynolds and so many that I have lost count.Each and every person tried their best , it was like a galaxy of stars who are trying to shine over on eachother.The story is based on a novel "Maria Beetle" by Kotaro Isaka .The way director David Leitch directed it that it looked like a Quentin Tarantino movie , in fact it was so similar that for a moment I was confused about who was the director of it!It has VFX a lot , it has American touch in screenplay which I agree but the main story is Japanese and the director did not forget that and showed full respect . Since the beginning this movie reminded me of Kill Bill and till the end it reminded me of Kill Bill. Why I am saying this If you watch the movie you will know . I do not want to be a spoiler. All I can say that although it is an action with comedy kind of movie but it is a movie which is hard to forget and hard not to get impressed about .I will be saddened if this movie does not go to the academy awards ceremony in this year .I gave it 9.99 /10 .Go and watch !!!!

title: Very good
text: Yes very good and fun too see.The comedi and action in the movie is a good combo same ass in deadpool movies. But the trailer was not so good as the movie is so not to many People is going to se it.

title: love the visuals
text: Visuals remind of Wes Anderson. So does the wildly unrealistic violence. I thought the characters were great. However, the story really slowed down around the 1.5 hour mark unfortunately.

title: I gave this movie a TEN
text: It seems like really bad movies that are flopping at the box office are flooded with ridiculously high ratings so I give this a 10 too!! It seems to be a trend, I do find after a week or two the rating better reflect how good or bad a movie is, but i like to run with the crowd until then..

title: This movie was so much better than it had any right to be.
text: When I walked into the movie theater I was expecting a generic action what I got was a fun ride from start to finish. The characters are over the top in a good way and nothing is out of place. By the end everything is clear and it all makes perfect. By the end I was crying from laughter.By all means this is not the best movie of all time so why 9/10? Well simple I had fun. Something that is in short supply in movies these days.If you are a looking for a fun action movie with a lot of laugh this is the train for you.

title: Good (and recommended) fun
text: After watching tons of movie/TV production garbage lately, finally something fun and entertaining. Good cast, total nonsense of a story (although writing is good, considering), great direction, editing and music selection. There is a reasonable suspicion that Mr. Fuqua had much more to do with this than credited. He makes good movies. Acting is quite appropriate, although Mr. Pitt is really good (even here, where he didn't really have to be). Let the higher brain functions rest and enjoy the simple, pure, mindless, but well made fun. Claim back your two hours you might have lost before, on some other usual and (unfortunately) industry dominant moving pictures trash.

title: A Surprisingly Good Movie.
text: Bullet Train genuinely shocked me with how good it was. I must say that this movie was incredibly enjoyable from start to finish. Now unlike most movies i actually watched this with someone so that may have added to the enjoyment, but i still think the movie is a great watch.The movies story is pretty cool. From the character (and object) backstories to the whole reason for everyone being on the train in the first place, this movie was so very enjoyable. Not the best story in terms of hard hitting or anything upsetting (truly). However this movies story is good in terms of simply what it contains. Now that explanation was pretty whack however i am unsure on how to explain it. The movies story is cool and interesting but isn't anything hard-hitting. If you care about a hard-hitting story then this may not cater to you. However the story (whilst not being hard-hitting) is great. It has comedic moments that work and aren't forced and a likable cast of characters that make the story enjoyable overall.Speaking of the cast, the characters in this movie were very good it has to be said. Brad Pitt was absolutely fine in the movie and it's made me see the actor in a better light it must be said. I always thought he was overrated (and still do), but in this movie he was pretty good. Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Brain Tyree Henry were an amazing duo in this movie. As the lovable duo of Tangerine and Lemon i must say they were a big high point in this movie. Joey King was my least favourite cast member in this movie and she was good in this movie. This is simply how much i like the cast in this movie. Michael Shannon, Hiroyuki Sanada, Andrew Koji and even Bad Bunny, Logan Lerman and. Zazie Beetz were all great in this movie. Some of the mention barely got screen time and yet were great additions to the world. The little cameo(s) in this movie were also a big gobsmack moment for sure and i really enjoyed their appearance. Overall the cast of this movie is very good to say the least.The action in this movie was great and fit the movie perfectly. Now it's not simply action as you may believe looking from the outside in. I remember i thought this movie would simply be a lot of action after watching the trailer and seeing it advertised elsewhere. But it must be said that there is still a decent amount of action that is for sure. I feel that it's a perfect amount however. Recently after watching movies like John Wick and Nobody i must say i was getting bored of action movies but this movie made me enjoy the action for once. Now it's not constant (which probably helps) and is used in moments were it actually makes sense and doesn't impact on the quality of the movie at all. I thought the choreography in this movie was fine and at certain points pretty good. But it isn't anything to blow you away however. Pretty good action and in this department the movies is good.Story - 7.5/10Cast - 8/10Action - 7.5/10Overall i really like this movie and it came as a big shock. I was expecting a four to a six out of ten, but i'm here giving it a right.Definitely recommend this movie for a first time watch, 8/10.

title: Unexpectedly Funny!
text: I'll admit I originally started to watch this movie just as a way to pass the time. I thought it started a little slow, but quickly found I was in for a surprise! The dialogue got better (I thought) and the action picked up! The actions scenes themselves put a different twist on your typical Spy Action Flick. Brad Pitt was hilarious as Lady Bug, while supporting cast did a fabulous job stepping outside of their normal acting roles! Enough twists were added to keep you watching, while the comedy aspect kept you laughing constantly. The more serious parts of the plot balanced things out nicely. Overall, would recommend for a funny movie to crawl under your favorite blanket with a bowl of popcorn and watch!

title: Trying hard to be a Tarantino clone
text: It is obvious from the beginning how hard is trying to be a Tarantino clone, Kill Bill, Pulp Fiction and Heightful 8 combined, with some 007 style online operators.The plot is plain, the acting is childish.Flashbacks are all useless, with useless and poor violence.To put it in the context, this movie is so bad that the scriptwriter have no clue of Japan or Shinkansen trains. Just think of yourself u are in Japan take the train and see how many foreigners you will spot, especially such strange characters, and if you are Pretending to be as badass as Brad Pit is trying in here you should spot those caricatures one mile away.In a nutshell this movie is really really bad.Waste of time.

title: Fun and Action-Packed
text: All right, so I'm gonna keep this short. Bullet Train is a great watch for lovers of action films. Pretty much everything aside from the real plot is great or even perfect. When you go into this, you're not planning on really caring too much about the plot, you're really just there for the action. So, if you enjoy films like John Wick, I'd say this is a great watch.

title: My favorite director is back, and with one hell of a movie!
text: In short, one of the best films of 2022, and for a lot of reasons. First of all, Brad Pitt was absolutely divine: Ladybug was the perfect character for him, and every single scene with him was fantastic (one of my hidden dreams is to see a saga with Ladybug as the main character). Secondly, the plot is one of the most interesting and well written of recent years: a lot of people said that the plot was very simple and was only an excuse to stage the action of the movie, but in my opinion the plot was very intriguing and engaging, and every character is useful and has his own story and his own purposes. And last but not least, the superb direction of David Leitch and the amazing action. Every time a David Leitch movie comes out, I know I'll see some of the best action scenes ever. Since there aren't many shootings, there is more space for fighting, and every fight is fun and creative. I can't say enough about one of the best movies of this year and one of the best action movies of recent years.

title: Enjoyable movie
text: The movie was enjoyable. The acting was good and the plot was fine. It had funny parts.Frankly I find it dumb that they wasn't a long review when a short one is good enough. It's a movie, it's enjoyable, the acting was good, the plot was good, the filming was fine. Everything was at the standard you would expect for an enjoyable movie.I wonder if Brad Pitt will ever do a movie with Woody Allen, maybe he already has. Comedy action is a good fit for Brad Pitt. I'd like to see him in some romcoms. It would be fun to see him in a French romcom with Romain Duris and Vanessa Paradis. That's all folks.

title: What a letdown!
text: Was so looking forward to this movie based on the 7.5 rating and can't believe people thought it rated that. This was more dumb than funny, over and over again!

title: Gore train!
text: "Bullet Train" is a visual delight, a movie with well-executed cinematography accompanied by tremendous sets. The performances are good, highlighting mainly those of Joey King and Aaron Taylor-Johnson. The script based on the novel "Mariabitoru" is totally funny, full of black humor and gore, as well as comic characters and some endearing ones. The result of "Bullet Train" is excellent.

title: Started out questionable. Ended up loving it!
text: Such a brilliant film. Pure quality film making that really takes one on a journey with the cast. Doesn't take itself too seriously with good bits of comic relief in between. Has excellent reveals, and comes together well at the end. Brad Pitt's role is also just hilariously brilliant!

title: Another great action movie from David Leitch with a humorous side of fun
text: This genuinely surprised me even though I came into this with good expectations. Based on a Japanese novel by the same name, Bullet Train does a good job of keeping the viewer's attention all throughout the duration of the movie. Also it does a good job of mixing action with humor. It was a perfect combo, but what else would you expect from the man who made John Wick, David Leitch. It reminded me so much of an anime with some of the scenes and all the actors did a great job of playing their individual characters. Brad Pitt was amazing in his role and just the cameos in general were surprising. This is definitely recommended, but watch it in the cinema. Don't make the same mistake as me and watch it on the computer. This is definitely one of those rare movies that should only be watched in the cinema.

title: Instant Action Comedy Classic!!!
text: Pitt doesn't disappoint. Supporting cast hit it on the nail. Catchy story that keeps you glued to the screen. Best part was Tatum cameo. Movie was great fun.

title: An action comedy that quickly got derailed
text: Was hoping for an actionthriller, but when I quickly realized, that it's all about eye candy and cracking jokes while facing a life threatening situation I tried to accept the premise that it is a comedy. Just without any laughs.The first half, while there are still passengers onboard the train, and we are slowly introduced to all the characters, actually works rather well. Yes, there are the usual fist/knife/sword fights partly filmed in slow motion, and yes, there's dialouge that tries to pass off as slick and blood splattering that looks lifted of a Kill Bill movie. It just really didn't work for me. Because of the rather weak unengaging plot, all I was mostly left with was eye candy.

title: Absolutely loved Tangerine and Lemon
text: These 2 just rocked, loved them both, cool cameos as well. It was funny, chaotic, messy in a positive way. In a nutshell I had a great time watching it. And I really wanna see Tangerine and Lemon spin off movie about their backgrounds. I will tottaly watch it. The actors did a wonderful job. I have never been attracted to a man with a mustache before but Tangerine changed that. The only thing that I didn't enjoy is how they imagine Russians. Hollywood keeps portraying them unrealistically. Most of them are white as snow, blonds with blue or green eyes. I don't know why Hollywood portrays them like quite the opposite.

title: A great time at the movies!
text: I loved this movie there is a great mix of characters that all have great direction and good actors to Bering them to life. Mix in a winning combination of tragedy with light hearted dark comedy and some great fight scenes and viola... a great time at the movies. Will definitely watch this again.

title: Fun, fast-paced, slick action thriller
text: Oh, what a treat this was. I watched it in a 4DX theatre. The story was fast paced. Love the performances by everyone. The story is about an unlucky assasin who need to lift a bag from a train that's full of assasins. Joey was pretty effective as Prince. Bryan and Aaron as Tangerine and Lemon were perfectly cast. It was a perfect action comedy with a whole lot of twists. I highly recommend this to everyone. Brad Pitt as ladybig was perfect as an actor. There are cameos by Channing Tatum and Ryan Renolds. These guys are everywhere these days. Andrew Koji and Hiroyuki, as always, were pretty good.

title: An amuzing and humorous watch
text: First of, I think the 'official' or 'profesional' so called judges are way to harsh on this movie.. they are on most movies tbf. This movie might not be the best brad pit film ever, but it was super entertaining to watch. Sometimes a bit over the top, which would add to the laughs. I don't think anyone is going to leave this movie without a smile on their face, all in all a very fun movie to watch.

title: Ho Hum
text: I can't believe all these reviews! Who wrote them? The production staff? Did they watch the same movie as I did? The movie was a long drawn out boring movie. I had deja vu watching it. There were a few cute scenes like the fight scene interrupted by the flight attendant with the sparkling water bottle, but it was really stupid or slapstick. I'm not sure which. I'm not a fan of slapstick. There were a few things I liked, like their code names, the few twists with the girl, and how Brad Pitt kept trying not to do this without hurting anyone. But I was bored throughout the movie until the end, that's when it got better. Would I watch it again if it came on streaming? Definitely not. I asked other moviegoers what they thought, they said the same as me, it was okay.

title: Like Smoking Aces, but funnier, and just better.
text: Remember Smoking Aces? It was, IMHO, an above average action mashup where a bunch of assassins are after Ari Gold, and features an ensemble cast. It was equal parts Oceans 11 setup, and a battle royal of the assassins and police. It was fun but not great. Lots of the lines had that "we think we're so cool" kinda writing that can make you roll your eyes.Well enter Bullet Train, a similar concept that takes itself far less seriously, and this is why it works. Brad Pitt is fantastic as always as the reformed bumbling pacifist who still has his Assassin chops. The Englis Duo also ham it up while giving depth as two "brothers" growing up together. Joey King surprised me as she's well known for doing bad Blumhous YA horror. She worked here, and being American, her British accent didn't bug me. The rest of the cast also were great.It's rare these days that I find this action comedies work as well as this one did. It walks the line so well, I throughly enjoyed it.If you want a bonker, fun action flick, I definitely recommend this.

title: I ve liked
text: Great great action, great pllot and a bit too slow in the end but beside that was perfect for me.My wife only liked as 7.5 the movie.Worth the price 100% guys üëçüèº

title: A Fun Thrill Ride That Gives Out Quentin Tarantino And Guy Ritchie Vibes.
text: The film from start to finish feels like john wick if it takes place on a bullet train and gives out a Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie vibes throughout the entire film when you watch it all the way through. However the plot for the film was really clever but sometimes hard to follow, the cast and characters including Brad Pitt as ladybug was nonchalant and a great main character. The twins (Lemon and Tangerine) are very comedic and well connected at this point. Especially the banter was absolute god-like in this film, also the comedy was very decent and balanced. As well as the cameos for this film felt like a return the favor type of cameo and it was wonderful, the action scenes was well shot and choregraphed only Guy Ritchie can pull off in his other films (and possibly in his future films). The acting was quirky and one problem about the film is the dialogue was not only forgettable but also hard to understand, but at least the film itself was fast paced filled with action, comedy, twist & turns that keeps you guessing. I think the movie is both fun and a thrill ride with Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie vibes, can't wait for it's home video and streaming release.

title: Extremely entertaining !
text: With a title like that, you go in expecting an entertaining ride and that's exactly what this movie is. Every time I watch a movie set inside a train, I always wonder as to why don't we see more movies set inside a train. It's difficult to explain but there is something unique about stories set in high quality trains; for some reason the proceedings become very exciting to watch. Bullet Train is an extremely entertaining black comedy that is guaranteed to give you a good time.This movie almost feels like a Tarantino movie with multiple colourful characters, their stories being told in chapters and everyone coming together towards the end for an explosive climax. There are so many twists and turns in the screenplay that no character feels safe and the surprises don't stop till the last few moments of the film. It seems this film has been made keeping in mind the evolving audience of today, who gets bored too easily and wants to be surprised at all times.'Bullet Train' is visually amazing; the cinematography and vfx are of top quality. The train in which this movie was filmed looks extremely beautiful and I really hope someday we get to see a train like that running in our city as well. I did not expect to see so much vfx towards the end of the movie; it almost feels like when the vfx team asked, "how much cgi do you want towards the end", the director replied with "yes"; Bullet Train literally has an explosive finale! The action choreography throughout the film is outstanding but the fight sequence in the climax is just mind blowing.I loved the characters of this universe and the actors who portrayed them. Aaron Taylor Johnson was wonderful to watch as the foul mouthed Tangerine. This is the first time I have seen him and I was super impressed by his acting prowess and screen presence. Brian Tyree Henry was brilliant as Lemon and his scenes with Tangerine were quite funny. Brad Pitt has not only matured physically but also as an actor. When you think of good actors of Hollywood, Brad Pitt's name doesn't come up in your mind but he has been performing consistently well in the last few years. Brad's comic timing as Detective Ladybug was impeccable and the scenes that he shared with everyone, especially Aaron Taylor Johnson were extremely funny. Hiroyuki Sanada added a lot of weight to every scene that he was in with his powerful voice and screen presence and his sword fight sequence towards the end was absolutely stunning to watch.This action adventure movie is packed in with so much comedy that you won't feel bored at any given point. This movie is not at par with , which was quite an experience, but it has enough in it for you to watch it multiple times and have a great time.

title: Boring
text: This movie was totally boring until the last 20 minutes. The guy next to me got up and left halfway through. Skip seeing it in the theaters and wait for Netflix.

title: Ahhhh what a great film.
text: I was still very upset and angry about how bad Halloween Ends was, but this cheered me up no end, it was funny, exciting and so well acted I laughed out loud a lot.Every single one of the cast was brilliant especially Brad Pitt and Aaron Taylor-Johnson, but special praise goes to Joey King, she was phenomenal.I'd been waiting to see this for a long time as it looked exciting, I'd heard mixed reviews though, some said it was brilliant, some said it was terrible, but I'm so glad I trusted my gut instinct.Bravo to everyone involved in this thrilling, crazy, action packed thrill ride.I will be thinking about this for a long while.Oh and what they did with the bottle of water was hilarious.

title: You get what you would expect!
text: A fun romp with a dozen or so zany characters having over the top skills to provide mayhem and carnage. Brad does what Brad does best and provides the comedic glue to keep all the various subplots on "track" with his wit and charm.It is quite entertaining!

title: Deadpool meets Murder on the Orient Express
text: Deadpool meets Murder on the Orient Express with a Tarantino feel.Witty, exciting, fast-past, funny, and slowmo gory all mixed together - great casting, great script, great wardrobe, great movie!! Brad pit is absolute brilliant in this role and plays the part bang on.Deadpool meets Murder on the Orient Express with a Tarantino feel.Witty, exciting, fast-past, funny, and slowmo gory all mixed together - great casting, great script, great wardrobe, great movie!! Brad pit is absolute brilliant in this role and plays the part bang on.Deadpool meets Murder on the Orient Express with a Tarantino feel.

title: Fantastic
text: The content of the movie was great, but I feel nauseous by the intense racism of the person in charge of SNS. As anyone who has seen this movie will understand, the Asian cast has a long appearance and plays an important role.(It's just the order in which the casts on this page are named.) However, SNS images only cover white male casts, while white female casts and black casts also look down on them. It has been pointed out by Japanese fans who are also on the stage of the movie, and although some images have improved, there is no apology or explanation. We Japanese are angry.In addition, bottled water costs less than 1,000 yen in Japan.

title: Too busy and so much going on
text: I get what they where doing with the film but it overall just turned out to be a headache mess. I like Brad Pitt a lot in it and he's really the only good thing about the film. What's wrong with the film is alot of things. They tried to hard to be over the top without being too over the top and that's where it failed. There was so much going on it gave me a headache. Too much too much that is what the film is.

title: Bullet Train - Review
text: This was very good. Super-entertaining action flick from my favorite director of action movies, David Leitch. Amazingly looking movie, with beautiful use of color pallets and with a Ritchie/Tarantino-like screenplay. This movie has a lot to take, but man I was on board the whole time (no pun intended). It is just pure fun, with Brad Pitt in it and some very interesting characters. The Twins were great! Like, I felt that this has a lot of fun elements, and every single one was too enjoyable. Very rich movie from that standpoint. Maybe the ending was a little too rushed but enjoyed it anyway. A one nice.

title: Bizarre Ultra-Violent Funny Non Stop Action SPOOF
text: Very fast and enjoyable film with many great stars.This was a mindless Bizarre Ultra-Violent Funny Non Stop Action SPOOF with endless plot twists of Quentin Tarantino and James Woo type movies, with multiple Hit Men, Mexican Cartel, Japanese Yakuza, and Samurai in a Speeding Train in Japan, with Joey King as the Evil Cute Girl. Best seen and enjoyed on the Big Screen.

title: Fun to the end
text: Brad Pitt has a great time entertaining us as a reformed hitman who seems to be in the middle of every other assassin on the appropriate named Bullet Train. Some murders are just hysterically funny. The plot isn't important, it's a train ride gone askew filled with top notch acting (This is Pitt's movie and he owns it.), and full speed ahead action.Some of the killings are gross but because of the circumstances, you have to laugh and wonder what happened that evoked such laughs.And whatever you do, don't get up to leave when the credits start their crawl because. . ., just don't be impatient to leave.

title: Oh lord thank you! Finally!
text: Lately most of the movies Hollywood has been churning out has made me cringe and curse while leaving the theater (for both wasting time and money) but for the first time in a long time I almost wanted to be like one of those people who applauds at the end of the movie as I walked out of Bullet Train with great satisfaction. Well written story, cast selection, plot twists, witty dialogue, soundtrack, fantastic action scenes, and a much deserved great ending......this film has it all. It is sure to become a cult movie much like Lock Stock, Snatch, and Pulp Fiction. Well worth the admission fee.....is not something I say lightly but Bullet Train certainly deserves the praise. Thank you to all who were involved for restoring hope in action movies and providing us with such a masterpiece.

title: pulp fiction meets kill bill
text: This is an two hour roller coaster of twists and turns that keep you entertained from beginning to the end. It has a strong feel of Q. Tarantino movies, so much it feels like a tribute. Charters are fighting and having conversations similar to the one about "quarter pounder with cheese" in pulp fiction, there are flashbacks explaining characters motivations and background same as in kill bill, main two characters are goofy assassins just as in pulp fiction, over exaggerated amount of blood very much resembles kill bill. There are much more similarities, but the bottom line is that if you liked kill bill and pulp fiction you are gong to love bullet train. Just have fun and enjoy the ride, this movie delivers no message other than pure entertainment and does it well.

title: Fun, action and philosophy. As a good action movie should be
text: This movie grabs you from the beginning to the end. The characters are deep and well designed. A good mix of action and dialogues. Also love the art style behind the direction. Also the best, best way you can see the nowadays Brad Pit in action. An unlucky b4st4rd, victim of the events, but who can still kick as many -ass as he wants.

title: Don't compare with Bahubali!!!
text: Bahubali was fiction fully. This movie not. Also this movie is not epic action movie. It's actual epic political drama. Pls understand that. PS1 is novel adaptation. In Bahubali hero can carry the lingam and dance which is totally nonsense.In Bahubali people can fly using a tree to land in castle top, which Is utterly stupid, maybe in looney tunes can.Also in Bahubali he can hold and big statue about 100 tonne prevent it falling, also again not logic and very childishly made.So many scene doesn't make sense in Bahubali bcos it's a fictional movie in whole not like PS1. So pls don't don't don't compare with PS1..

title: not what i expected but great movie
text: I really enjoyed this movie it was so funny i couldn't stop laughing and i didn't expect this movie to be like this i though it would be just some normal action comedy movie but it's was great the action, comedy the story the scenes such a great and fun movie i really had fun watching this movie in the theatre i really recommend watching it. My rating was 8.5/10.

title: I laughed so hard I barfed my popcorn
text: Have you ever laughed so hard that you barfed? If so, don't watch this movie.I consider myself a professional barfer, I know, that's bragging, but I have been barfing since birth, so I think I know what I'm talking about.At first I wasn't sure what this movie was about but soon discovered it was actually a comedy. I found it insanely funny, probably because I'm a bit twisted. I actually had to rinse popcorn barf out of my mouth twice during this movie. Since I consider myself a professional, I never re swallow - it's an unwritten rule in the profession. Ewww.Right in the middle of a fight scene one of the bad guys guts hoisted by his waist so he will hit his head on the ceiling (I guess) but instead his head pops through a sky light just in time for a set of signal lights to relieve him of his cranium. Tylenol ain't gonna fix that dudes headache. Why did I find that funny? Don't know, just did. The movie is absolutely loaded with hilarious antics resulting in death just about every time.If you are into strange comedic violence then this movie is for you. Popcorn optional.Signed, your friend Ralphy (my real name is John, but I just couldn't help myself)

title: Crowded tram of famous cast and cameos
text: Stylish action comedy with larger-than-life personalities. Despite few suspense throughout the ride, David Leitch kept its thrills amusing and scorching at the same time. A crowded tram of high-calibre cast and cameos certainly provided great entertainment.

title: Tarantino & Ritchie
text: If Tarantino will ever made a movie totgheter with Guy Ritchie, it will look like that. It is great fun, completely unreal, absolutely and utterly inimaginable caracthers that have no connection with real.world, stories within stories, situation that will never happend, good music, blood galore, useless violence an no politically corect situation. Absolutely enjoyable, just do not confuse it for a serios action movie.

title: Could have been much better
text: The movie is influenced by Agatha Christie's most famous works, but fails, or doesn't even try, to build up tension and suspense as they do in its entire first half. I found it quite boring that the characters could act as violently as they wanted with no consequence as if they were not in a constrictive space filled with people. I mean that, in my opinion, the peculiar setting was not quite used to its full potential.The best part is surely the cinematography, well-finished in almost every scene (except for a single one where there's way too much "sunlight") . The neon lights of Tokyo and the futuristic look of Japanese bullet trains were delightful to watch. As for the director, I strongly suggest you watch Atomic Blonde instead where he sure did a much more praiseworthy job.Lastly, the cast is full of skilled and/or charismatic actors and actresses, which feels like an overkill for this script (too many cameos I may add).Some neat action scenes in the last act do their job but have no power to solve the lack of pacing and the several script inaccuracies for which the film seems to limp along most of the time.

title: No idea why critics are so divided in this one.
text: Had a blast with this one. The first act can feel a bit convoluted with many dialogues and flashbacks, but for me they didn't ruin my experience or anything, and I quickly got invested in the story, and had a lot of fun.I liked pretty much all characters, which is pretty impressive, and Lemon and Tangerine Twins were standouts. This is a very stylish film, I'd say this has a lot more personality than this years another action film, The Gray Man. (even though I did enjoy that one too). The comedy was great too, and the Thomas the Tank Engine stuff wasn't as annoying as people say, it actually got used in some memorable dialogues and scenes.Apparently this was adopted from a Japanese novel, and the themes and concepts regarding 'Fate' was portrayed in a very interesting and satisfying ways in the film. A lot of great set-ups and pay-offs. Will be thinking about certain plot points regarding those for a while... Leitch's previous film Atomic Blonde suffered from weak script, but while having a similar issue of convoluted first act, I'd say Bullet Train has a much stronger script.But this isn't a perfect film, there are some noticeable bad VFX work during the final 15 minutes, and although this isn't the movie's fault, I'd say the trailers showed way too much. Don't watch the trailers before watching the film. Like I previously mentioned, the comedy was overall good, but at parts it felt like the movie was trying too much at being funny, slipping into the Reddit / Deadpool territory.Nonetheless, it is a good film - despite some issues I don't understand how this movie is so divisive among critics. 53% is lower than Thor 4 lol.

title: SO MUCH FUNNN
text: In this different action comedy, Ladybug is an unlucky assassin who's determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs has gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans as his latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe -- all with connected yet conflicting objectives -- on the world's fastest train.Bullet train is set in the train and the train only, and for a movie that is set solely in one place, it's super fun. Filled with really funny moments, tons of action scenes, and exciting plot twists from beginning to end, the movie doesn't get boring at all. The movie also has breathtaking photography and exquisite transitions between scenes. Additionally, the music that accompanies the action scenes suits the mood perfectly.The movie starts with multiple disconnected storylines, which get really confusing. However, as time passes the parallel lines start getting closer and closer to eachother until they become just one big storyline. The main reason behind the connecting of the stories is the extremely shocking plot twists that are very frequent in this movie.The cast is by all means perfect; From Brad Pitt to Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Joey King, Michael Shannon, and many more to the big cameos in the movie,most of this cast is hilarious and interactive, especially Lemon and Tangerine (2 of the best characters in the movie).Score:9/10.

title: I usually find action comedy is boring, BUT THIS ONE ENTERTAINED ME SO MUCH
